Review: The material is a medium weight jersey knit that is slightly thicker so it provides enough coverage and support to be flattering without being bulky. i think this clothe is true-to-size, or maybe runs a little bit big, but only by a little bit. i bought a medium and am a size 8 in tops and 10 in trousers. the clothe hugs nicely on the upper body (arms, chest, ribs) and flares just a little bit on the hips/tummy/butt area. it is forgiving of little bumps or lumps. the scoop neckline is a bit lower tha
So happy i purchased this - it's a gorgeous piece, and excellent for fall and winter. the colors are soft and beautiful, and i feel like this will pair well with a lot of shirts in my closet.

Review_Title: I wish it looked like it did on the model
Review: To be clear i am not built like your models but the biggest problem was the way in which it tented out from the bustline down

I picked this up in the store during the retailer weekend sale. i used to have a similar long black stretchy skirt that i wore until it fell apart. things i really like about this skirt are that it's simple black, but has some interest in the small swiss dots in the top layer, and it's stretchy. the yoga-trouser-waistband seems like it will be very comfy and also allows you to adjust the skirt length a little bit, depending on whether/how much you fold it down. it is lined, which is a big plus. i was

I'm in love with this clothe! i have seen the chevron pattern of this clothe on many women and i can honestly say that i haven't seen a body that it doesn't look good on. i am a busty girl and was afraid the shape of this clothe would make me look as if i was expecting and much to my surprise it didn't at all. this is such a magnificent transitional piece to have in your closet, i highly recommend it!

This shirt has a magnificent fit and a nice change from the swing style. short in front and longer in back looks magnificent with the higher waisted trousers and traditional skinny. nice details on buttons and trim

I love wide neck & off-shoulder tops. i think they are very flattering. at first i thought the fabric was too thin but then realized since i want to wear this with a fuller party skirt, its nice that ir is not too bulky.
i actually think it will be really cute with white jeans in the summer and magnificent way to clothe up a casual outfit.

This romper is so dang cute. i normally wear a m/l or 10/12. i took a medium in this though either size would probably have worked depending how loose you like it. it's not too sheer and the shorts aren't too short (i'm 5'9). my only complaint is the front toe came off on one side as i was trying it on, an easy fix but still it should come off that easy.

Review_Title: Flattering if you have a tummy!
Review: I've got the post-baby bulge and this clothe makes me the hottest i've looked in a long time! fitted, but skimming where i don't want to be accentuated - it's a rare clothe that can pull this off! the cleavage is there, so i think it's more of a night clothe, but i'd wear it with a sweater during the day. very comfortable.

I typically wear a size xl in retailer clothes. i'm a size 16 in tops and this sweater in xl fit really baggy with no form fitting. it's super soft and i love the color, but it was just unflattering on me.

I ordered this sweater in the pink color in a small and xsmall, in order to see which was the best fit. i was really looking forward to getting it because it looked so magnificent online - like it had a nice flow, the cute zipper and was a good match for a pink and grey skirt that i have. i was really disappointed, the sweater doesn't flow like it does in the picture - it kind of billows out in the front and back and isn't flattering. i have a small build, and, frankly, i usually look good in sweaters

I thought this would be a cute business attire skirt. i hate to say it, but i felt like it flared out as if i were amelia bedelia or some whacky children's book character and not retailer. the fabric made it look bulky. i sadly had to return it.

It's like a coat for your legs, and lined with some silky fabric. the only flaw is a slight bulkiness where the fly hooks up.  i am a little sad that they don't have a petites, because i think this is proportioned for women 5'5" and over, and i am only 5"3". also not recommended for anyone with a tummy pooch. so tall women with somewhat flat abs - snap it up. it's a fabulous look for you.

I saw the shirt at my local retailer store and loved the color and print; however, the shirt had way too much fabric!  i was swimming in it.  it was not flattering whatsoever.  plus, it's overpriced for a shirt.  i'm sadly returning it.

Review_Title: Long sleeves and too long for shorter gals
Review: I tried on the regular size at my store and it was too long for me, te sleeves were enourmous, and the clothe fell mid-calf. but, i love the feel of hte mateiral, and if it were to fit properly, is very falttering. i will order the petite size later on to try, i liked it enough for that. the "blue" is a nice teal color. double layer, and extremely comfortable. the finish is laser cut, no stichting.

I just received this jumpsuit and was so excited.  unfortunately it is too small and will have to go back.  the top is so cute and the material is thick so no need for a bra which i really liked.  it runs short in the stride and also in the top.  i ordered a petite since i am only 5'0" tall and was very surprised how short the stride was.  the length was magnificent and would love to have been able to kept it.

This is a crop top but super boxy and wide. i expected it to be more fitted in the waist. since it sits out away a from the body a lot, it was not flattering. i also felt the stitching to be a bit matronly for me. too bad as i am having such a hard time finding tops and i'm willing to pay full price for something that works.
This tank is excellent. it fits close to the body, but does not squeeze. it is super soft, smooth, and comfy. it layers excellently under blouses. this is by far my preferred simple tank!

I purchased this top in an antro store last week. the quality is wonderful and the greenish blue color is very unique. the blouse has a beautiful stretchy camsiole that is attached at the shoulders, but can be removed by snaps. i tooks magnificent when worn two different ways. i wore it with the campole out, and it peeks through the blouse at the bottom. it also looks magnificent when the camisole is worn in. my only wish is that it would come in a petite size as it's a touch big at the shoulders and neckli

When i first tried it on, i was worried it would add 10-15 lbs to my hourglass frame, but if worn correctly, it actually has a flattering, slimming effect. i recommend wearing it open (like in the photo) with the same type of outfit underneath...looks very chic! or, to give yourself a defined waist, use the provided ribbon belt tied to the side or use your own large, statement belt. also looks magnificent with vintage sunglasses! the fabric quality can't be beat. it's nice and heavy to the touch. i ca
Remarkable clothe, so much so that people stop me to remark about it!

These are form fitting and have a magnificent wash. the size runs large so i would say consider to go down one size than you usually wear. the bottom tapers so they are magnificent to wear wtih flats or can easily fit into boots.

Picture definitely does not do this vest justice.  i saw it on a rack and had to try on and instantly loved the look and feel.  i am 5'9" - 135 lbs - size 6 and the small works for me.  the vest will work with ivory, black, grey, and red underneath.  i love the little bits of fur sticking out of the seams.  the back has fitted seams to give it a trim look.  there are small pockets in the front as well.  definitely worth the 108$ asking price.

The price was worth the splurge, free shipping and a special discount helped. the minute i laid my eyes on this sweater i was hooked. light, airy weight and that handmade texture make the overall design something special. this is the kind of sweater that has enduring style. the big kangaroo pockets scared me a little, which i have determined to be not a distraction after trying it on.

Review_Title: Will order more in different colors!
Review: I am 5'5 about 110 lbs and the size 0 regular fits me well. sometimes i order petite, but the regular fit me just right. they are higher waisted than most trousers i wear, but they are completely adorable and comfortable to boot. love the pattern. the sturdy quality is tangible. definitely going to order more of these trousers in different patterns as they become available.

I was nervous about this clothe, as when i ordered it there were no reviews yet...and shortly after they, they started coming in and were only negative. yes it runs pretty big (i'm usually a large/12 but could tell from the model it would run big) but it's supposed to be loose. i wouldn't say it's the most flattering - but you can tell it's shapeless from the picture! it's a magnificent casual clothe, excellent for hot days when i don't want my clothing touching my skin.

Review_Title: Magnificent in photo... not so much on
Review: This clothe looked like something i would wear and covet for years. unfortunately it was loose in the places where it should show shape and was tight in others. the bodice is incredibly small and not meant for bigger chested women. while the fabric is beautiful, overall the clothe did not look like much. disappointed.

As with most retailer tops, this sweater is boxy and baggy through the middle.  i ordered an xs.  it's a very nice, pretty sweater that i'm going to try in an xxs.  the v-neck does go down rather low so it will need a tank underneath. the lace accents are very delicate and make the sweater look more upscale.  the white is a soft winter white.

Love this coat! saw it in the store and waited a few days before breaking down and buying it in the peach color. glad i did as it sold out super fast. it's soft, flattering, versatile, and has magnificent detail in the stitching. excellent layer for fall. i'm usually a large, sometimes medium in hei hei coats and the large fit very comfortably with room for light layers underneath. the style is a little boxy and slouchy but the fit in the shoulders and elastic ribbed waistband give it a flattering f
Recently received this and was very disappointed with the quality. the fabric was very thin, easily stretched out of shape. price is ridiculous for this item!

This clothe was exactly what i was looking for- a rich, luxurious fabric, a deep neckline, and a tightly cinched waist. i have a full bust and, while the snug waistband was a negative for some reviewers, for me it is a little miracle. this clothe fit like a glove and was flattering in my usual size. thank you!

These trousers are not lined. there is a wide elastic band that runs along the inside of these slacks that is not tacked down, which is a little cheap and probably to keep the price down but doesn't affect the overall fit. and they do fit nice. when your putting them on the fabric bunches at the crotch but then slims out after you zip them (zips up the back.) the fabric has some spandex in it but the lyocell makes them a magnificent choice for work. they hit my ankle a bit lower than on the model. i'm

Could not resist the fit and detail on this piece - couldn't wait for it to go on sale. the material is so soft and comfortable. it's "just" a black sweater - but the neckline and back details make it unique! thought i would need a large but the medium fit fine. 5'7" 147 lbs

I tried on these trousers and was instantly in love. they are very flattering and stylish, but also incredibly comfortable. i am 5' 6", and the length is excellent to wear with 3" heels. i highly recommend these!

These trousers are so magnificent;style,beautiful soft fabric and love the length (i am 5'10"). i found the rise to be low and like the fact that that they sit at the hips. i had to size up from my usual size in this brand. very flattering and comfortable.

I had to review this because i purchased before any reviews were up and now that i've received this clothe i'm appalled by all the positive reviews!!! this clothe is hideous in person. seriously hideous. and even if you can get past the drapery fabric, it's incredibly restricting. the picture online is so misleading. the clothe isn't even an ivory it's more of a pea green! so disappointed.

I was really excited for this clothe to come and hoped it would work well for a couple of holiday parties that i will be going to this season. i wasn't sure what i thought when trying it on, but i am thinking it will go back since i still am not super excited about it. for me the waistline was a bit high, and it had a bit of a frumpy feel. i love the floral pattern but overall it just wasn't amazing.

Just bought this clothe in a 6. i'm 5'7" 138 lbs (32b, 29 in jeans). this is *so* much better than pictured. it's an empire waist that really flatters my small bust and accentuates the thin part of the waist. i have an hourglass figure, but can see this working magnificent for pear shapes. i wish the material felt softer, but the fit was so excellent, even for my broad shoulders. will transition nicely to warmer weather, but for now, i plan to wear it with leggings and a cardigan.

The heart version is very pretty, i can't speak for the striped one as i have not seen that one in person. i ordered the xxs after trying on the xs, as i felt the petite would be perhaps too short. the xs was a little big on me. the only problem with xxs regular is the sleeves are longer on me, like 3/4 length, not to elbow as shown on model. but i don't want the shirt to be too short so sticking with that size.

for reference, i am 115 lbs, 30dd chest, 26.5 in waist, and short.

Review_Title: There's something wrong with the arm hole
Review:
There's something importantly wrong with the way the armholes are cut. i can't move my arms in this clothe. otherwise the fit was fine. the a line cut of the clothe is magnificent if ur trying to hide a few pounds. other than that the does nothing for your figure. i found this clothe to be true to size in an xsp im 107lbs and 5'1".
don't buy it. i know it's tempting with the sale price.

I buy almost ever top tiny puts out and so i grabbed this one in the last tops sale since i'm a sucker for embroidered flowers. everything about it is gorgeous except it is so flimsy i can't even believe it. like when i held it up in the clotheing room, i could see through the entire shirt, front to back, before even putting it on. once on, i could see everything through it. i actually thought i was going to tear the thing to pieces trying it on, it's so frail. i own so many tiny shirts and while

This clothe fits awfully. it's not short, as pictured in photo. it hit just above my knees. it looked like sack. i would've, also, felt like i was choking  all night with it clasped around my neck. it, potentially, may look okay on someone who is very tall, skinny, and lanky, but i have my doubts about that too.
The buttons on the side give this top style. magnificent color and fabric make it excellent paired with denim.

Purchased this top in the store on sale. love the material. very soft and comfortable. love the black and white combination. i am petite so the top is a magnificent length on me. i can see that if you are tall it might be to short.

I bought this coat shortly after christmas and am in love. it is meant to fit oversize but runs true to your natural sizing. i am a m/l in most retailer clothing and that is what i bought. it is magnificent for layering for a clotheed up look with a skirt or clothe for work and also clotheed down with jeans a t-shirt. and, although the arms are 3/4 length it is super warm! so happy i purchased!

This sweater/coat is magnificent. it super comfortable. it's excellent for my california winters! it could be layered for colder areas. this piece definitely runs large- like really large. i went with an xs instead of my usual small or medium. it is meant to be boxy, and still is but sizing down allowed for it to be more flattering. i'd definitely say go in store and try it on, you'll love it!

This clothe is the excellent length and so comfortable! it's conservative enough to wear to work as a teacher but also so cute! i'm 5'6" and the large hits right above my ankle. medium fit as well but i wanted a little extra room in the torso.

Love this clothe. i'm wearing it as a bridesmaid in a fall, casual outdoor wedding. i think it's fancy enough and can also be clotheed down later. 

i'm 6' tall and skinny, with large breasts and this clothe fits. beautiful! not too much cleavage. :)

it's not real lace but no one could tell. magnificent quality and nice weight to clothe. magnificent for dancing and spinning!
I am 5'8" 140 lbs and the m fits excellently. it is flowy and feminine but the tie in the back keeps it from looking boxy. pattern is really nice. magnificent clothe!

This is a nice year round weight sweater. 
i am thrilled with small details, true to retailer pieces.

Review_Title: Simple, well-made clothe, but needs a slip
Review:
This clothe was almost excellent, but the white was just a bit too sheer to be worn without a slip. i wear a lot of cloth and stone pieces, and i generally like the fabrication, which is a bit thicker than some. in a top, the white of cloth and stone is sheer without being vulgar. however, translated to a clothe it becomes a bit too sheer in certain areas. even with a nude bra and underwear, i could see everything. it might make a good bathing suit coverup, though.
the fit is tts: 36c, broad should

When i first saw this in the store, i loved the idea of this shirtclothe with a twist. i tried it on in my usual size 4 but could not get it over my 32d bust. i wrote it off and moved on. back in the store shopping for a party clothe, i saw this was now on sale. although not right for the party, i decided to try it in a bigger size. a size 6 was not available but a size 8 was. excellention! if you are willing to size up, you will be rewarded with a comfortable, versatile clothe that can be super casu
Just lovely!  gift for my daughter who has two other vegan leather coats from retailer!

Review_Title: Didn't work for me, but it is beautiful
Review: This skirt didn't fit me right--i'm 5'6" and the hem hit too low, making for a frumpy rather than classic look. the fabric and color are lovely, however, and on a taller person this could be beautiful. the draping is beautiful and slimming.

I like the pointelle feature in the front. i end up wearing a lot of black, but this at least gives me the option to do a bit of color underneath if i so chose. i've worn this with white, black and blue jeans w/ boots. looks magnificent. i'm 5'3" and 125 lbs. i got a medium, but i could have possibly gone with a small. my only complaint is that it might be a tad bit too long. since i'm on the shorter size, i can't imagine it would be too much of an issue for others.
Fits true to size. i am a size 4 and it fit excellently. nice quality. fits like a glove.

They ripped on the inside upper thighs of both legs less than two months after purchase. i've washed them once, and wear them a few times a week, so they're certainly not worn out. i've never had a pair give out even close to this early. i loved the cut of the jeans and the softness, and they hold their shape well after multiple wearings. the color is lighter than pictured. i paid full price (the most i've ever paid for jeans) because i'd heard good things about jean shop quality. even at sale p

I wanted to love this clothe. i saw it in the catalog in blue, and wanted it. however, for some reason i took my sweet time in ordering it, and by the time i did, only the orange was available: but on sale. i was so excited when it arrived, and as i was trying it on, i thought, this is a bit shorter in the skirt than i usually go but it's so pretty... and then i couldn't get my right arm in the sleeve at all. i wondered if i had caught some of the lining as i was putting it on or something, but n

These looked really interesting online and with the multicolor stripes i thought it would pair nicely with many tops. 

the fabric is nice and sturdy. the colors are more vibrant than online. 

the design however is terrible. when i put them on i double checked to make sure they weren't on backwards- the back is flat as a board but the front has these poofy pockets. the poor fit with the bright stripes gives a "1920s circus diaper" look which is not good. 

they're also really tight compar

I bought this clothe thinking it would be cute for christmas in florida but when i received it i wasn't so sure about a christmas clothe. i like it for a casual night out with high boots. super cute!! i received many compliments!

I ordered this clothe to wear to a summer wedding in san francisco. i liked that it had sleeves, a plus. when i was trying it on, i found that it was a little snug, then realized it was the slip, which is not too tight at all once the clothe is on. it helps to smooth those little bumps. it is drop waist style, which skims the torso, then flares out prettily. all in all very complimentary, beautiful color, well made. very pleased; it will be comfortable and excellent at the wedding.

As a lazy one, i have to confess i barely leave any reviews even though i rely on the reviews from others to make my online order decision. yes! i owe a big "thank you" to anyone who wrote a helpful and honest reviews here :) and thank you!! now it is my time to pay back to the community. this pair of jeans are just excellent - excellent design, excellent fit and excellent material, soft, cozy and hip with a good spirit.. i don't want to take it off once i put on! i am 108 pounds and 5' 3" ordered size

I bought this in both the black motif and the ivory. i got a size 2 and i would say it is true to size. the fabric is very comfortable and doesn't wrinkle easily. it does have a "flowy" look to it but i didn't find that it had too much fabric. i wouldn't tuck it in though. i find it looks really good with skinny jeans/trousers and i love throwing a cardigan over it for cooler days. the details in the double buttons and on the back are really cute and make it more unique. i recommend the shirt.

Review_Title: So close! but one fatal flaw.....
Review: I really liked this clothe in so many ways. i'm tall and pear-shaped so the flowy shape is magnificent for me. however, the deal-breaker was how the armholes were cut. it isn't that obvious in the photos, but they are cut in around the bust in the front in a way that was really weird looking on me, and it was too expensive to keep something that's unflattering. too bad, if they had just had a normal armhole it would have been a home run. lovely fabric and nice that it has pockets.

I love the pilcro line and these leggings (yes definitely more a legging than jean) did not disappoint. however, i did think the material would have a little more substance and weight.  they are pricey, so i am hoping that the thinness of the material will not prevent them from holding up well.

Review_Title: A little too boxy vs swing
Review:
Love the design and style of this clothe when i saw it online, however, it falls a little short once in person. it was a bit boxier than i wanted and the lines didn't make it appear as a swing clothe, highlighting your figure.

i wish this could have worked, however, it felt a little too unshapely.

I didn't think anything of this top online (i really don't care for how they styled it) but in store it was more interesting. i'm currently anywhere between a 2-4-6 / xs-s-m, depending on the style, 5'3" 120lb 34b. size 2 regular in this top fit me excellently. for some reason, on me, the sleeves were elongating and flattering (closer to my elbow) and the overall length hit me excellently at the hip like on the model, the fabric is lightweight and therefore slightly sheer but, due to the color and p

I gave only 4 stars because i really wish the fabric was not so sheer. unless you are very unmodest, you will need to wear a slip. 
i am 6 feet and it hits just above my ankle. slits on side and front. i know it is 'supposed to' be use as a beach cover-up..but forgot that! this is way too pretty not to wear out at night(with a slip {:>). 
i am not a fan of the tie waist, so i at wear a belt to cover it. 
overall, i recommend. enjoy!

Review_Title: Not for those curvy on bottom
Review: Love the material and style - a very versitile skirt. however, doesn't fit well for those who don't look good in the slimmer looking pencil skirts.

Review_Title: Feminine alternative to your shapeless puffer
Review: I am obsessed with peplum down coats because the ones you usually see have no shape and are extremely unflattering. i was excited for this to arrive. this is quite nice and it looks more feminine than the other down coats out there. the coat itself runs just true to my shirt size but not what i want for a coat. i will be returning this for a size up because i will want to wear a sweater or at least maybe a thicker shirt under this especially for winter or fall. the fabric is decent and the weigh

This silk skirt was not the best look for me, but may work for others. i purchased the med, which fit fine. i just wasn't in love with the print/colors. the skirt has quality material and is well made. it's very light and airy. i did return it.
I got the blue and love the color. it's bigger than it looks here! almost like the model has it pinned in the back...but it's swingy and super cute and fun!!
A $200 piece of polyester with no shape and looks good only on the model. avoid ! mine went back the same day it came in the mail...

Love this top for spring - magnificent with athletic leggings, regular leggings or jeans. it is a lot longer in the back, which i like as it covers my butt and makes leggings work-appropriate. magnificent quality. true to size - i am 5'9" and 128 lbs - xs fits excellently. fabric is a little wrinkly but that is intentional. lighter material so it is good for spring weather, but sturdy enough not to be see through at all.

Review_Title: Magnificent quality, but not for my age
Review: This clothe is well made and of good quality it just looked a little too old on me. the skirt was heavy and the fabric was cozy, excellent for a fall outfit.
True to size, very pretty.  as pictured expect that it is more peachy and not this light.  i like it and will keep it but just be aware that it is not a pale pink as in the picture.
This is so much better than wearing a grey sweatshirt. i love it and it makes me feel pretty.

This sweater is incredibly soft and pretty, but there is just no way to get it to lay the way the model does in the picture. i found myself constantly tugging at the top to get it to stay off the shoulder - otherwise it just bunched up top and make a weird funnel neck. i really wanted it to work, but it was just so impractical.

Review_Title: Nice quality trousers at a magnificent price
Review: I found these at my local retailer on the sale rack, in a moss green color. the material, cut, and overall quality of these gauchos is excellent. they will be a nice transition into autumn with a light top and a coat. i got them in size 26, and they fit excellently. highly recommended - with the 40% off of sale items, they cost $42 + tax.

This is a magnificent throw on and go clothe. it would work magnificent with a sweater and tights or by itself in the hottest of weather. it looks a lot less awkward on than the picture online indicates.
Ordered this as a gift.  she said it is magnificent!  nice fabric, magnificent fit.

I love this coat over a clothe! it's snug fitting so can't wear anything bulky under it, but super stylish and comfy stretchy material. it's a bit pricey but i get a lot of wear out of it so worth it to me.
Completely love! wear it with suits, jeans...anything. the orange color is super unique and the lace is so pretty and seems like it will hold up over time. so glad i purchased!!!!
This is a magnificent casual skirt for summer, color pairs well with many tops.

Review_Title: Runs huge,could work for someone taller?
Review: First of all, mine arrived in a regular denim shade, not the dark wash shown. also, the style is more like a blazer, and it was huge. i am 5'2" and ordered the petite xs but even xxs would have looked like a baggy blazer. as well, the sleeves came barely past my wrists, they are designed to cuff as the model has done? perhaps on someone taller and younger it would look edgy and chic! the quality is excellent with some nice details. this might be one to try in person, if you can.

I recommend this clothe because it is beautiful, stylish and well made even though it did not work for me. i tried the small and extra small. the first - way too big, lengthwise (hit my knees) as well as in the shoulders - the latter to tight across the chest - not for me but worth a try. i am typically a small with usually never have a problem with length.

I took advantage of the summer tag sale and bought a few tops including this one. i've been eyeing this online for quite some time, so i was pretty excited to get it at such a good price. it came in the mail the other day. it's like christmas morning when you see an retailer package at your door, however, this time wasn't so magnificent. the top is fine. average at best. the top fits true to size. maybe it's the pattern or the cut, but it didn't work well on my body. i recommend trying this on first.
This clothe is flattering, comfortable and beautiful. it hides my imexcellentions too. currently my preferred clothe!

Review_Title: Pretty but just okay when worn.
Review: I love the back detail but doesn't feel that comfortable on. i bought in green. it's fitted so get size larger if you plan to layer up. i'm 107 and bought xs size. i should have ordered the s.

I put this runs small but it's a little more tts, except the arms are very slim! if you like to push your sleeves up like this model, you will have to wait for a while to see if the sweater loosens up. length wise it fit me a bit longer than this model and i'm a petite. the color is also darker and not as red as in this sweaters, which i actually prefer. the sweater is much thicker than my other cashmere sweaters. some of the stitching seems stick out as if the sweater is worn inside out, but th
This is just as cute in person. i wear it with black jean shorts, boyfriend jeans, washed out jeans like the model, or khakis. the colors are magnificent and so is the fit. love it.

This shirt was just really missing something for me. i originally liked the patter of the small dots all over the fabric, especially with the sleeves being more sheer than the rest of the blouse. i also am tending to gravitate toward clothes that hide my residual baby fat in my midsection. however, the tie is very high up on the neck and it made me feel like i was wearing a turtleneck. i rarely wear turtle necks because they make me feel like i am choking. in addition, the bow seemed to be too t

I feel like snagging a pair of these was the equivalent to standing in line for black friday, as they always seem to be out of stock. now i know why. these are soft, comfortable, and slimming. they're somewhere between the hold of control top trouseryhose and spans--they don't fall and sag throughout the day and are nicely slimming without being pain-inducing.

I don't usually write reviews, but i loved this clothe in the store and would have passed it right over online. the skirt is a charcoal color and the top is an antique white. it gives the appearance of a separate crop top. i would usually wear a small (5'2" and 125 lbs.). i'm wearing a small in the photo, but ended up going back for an xs. the clothe could go more casual with flats or boots and a scarf, or clotheier with heels and jewelry. i think i'll get a lot of use out of it.

I am petite and ordered size small, and it came looking like gym sweat trousers. the material was very nice, but in terms of the waist and length size, both run incredibly large. the cuff of the joggers are also not elastic at all, and hangs loose widely. will have to return this item, unfortunately.

I am usually a 32a. i ended up with a 34 b based on sales assoc input and what was available. the 32 gave me back fat ( i do not have back fat) so she said the 34 would be better, it ran small etc. the 34 also fit ( had to be ordered and mailed) but it still gave me "flab" over the back band. comparing it to my other regular bras, i can see that the band has too thin fabric and rolls and has "harder edges" compared to wider , thicker band on my other bras. very pretty but i will be returning. sa

I wanted to love this clothe so much and am so sad - it just didn't work for me. i am 5'2", 138 pounds (still trying to lose that last 5-8 from my third daughter) and the chest/back of this clothe was so tight i was afraid if i hugged someone it would split up the back. i am normally a size 6 and tried the 6 p, 8 p and 8 and they were all too tight in the chest/back. it sounds like this is common for these holding horses clothees. :(

The first time i wore this tank it started pilling around the arms and down the sides. it is terribly quality, and gets worse with every wear and wash. possibly the worst wear on a new clothing item i've ever seen. like the design and fit, immediately relegated it to a weekend/home shirt because it was unprofessionally pilly and the pills are small so can't be shaved off.

Got this clothe in the mail today, and it's definitely a keeper. the material is high quality, and i can see wearing this clothe on all but the coldest days of winter. it'll be magnificent to wear today in 90 degree weather, and with a cardigan and booties, it will easily transition into cool weather. the colors, patterns, and lace are all just beautiful. for reference, i always order xs for loose fitting clothees, and a size 4 for close fitting styles. the xs in this clothe is excellent.

I ordered this clothe looking for something to wear out for an evening. after seeing the other reviews i wasn't sure about it, but i was very pleased when it arrived. i find it is elegant and sexy, but also modest enough when i sized up by 1. i normally wear an xs in clothees but found the small fit excellently. it is form-fitting particularly in the waist and back without being too tight. i'm excited to wear it and think it would look beautiful with a long necklace.

A beautiful classic!
love the denim fabric in such a pretty style.
this top has a more flattering fit than appears in the pics.
the fabric is soft and the fit very flattering.
ordered my usual size medium and fits excellently........very true to size.

I am a curvy girl and bought these jeans in a size 31. i don't have stick legs, and the jeans have worn right through were my thighs rub together. with the old pilcro material, this did not happen! this is a super soft jean, and although the fit was good, they just didn't last.

I was looking for a clothe to conceal my post baby body but wanted to be able to wear it once i lost the extra weight and this clothe does the job! the fit is very flattering and it hangs nicely. magnificent material.

This is a beautifully designed and made sweater clothe. really love it. however, there's no way that model is 5' 10" in the photo because i'm 4 inches shorter than that, and the clothe is 2 inches shorter on me. it's really not a clothe, it's a tunic. i'm happy with it because it's so pretty, but i did think i was buying a clothe. i just wore it with leggings and i'm happy with a beautiful tunic!

I love this clothe as far as the fit goes. it makes my curvy figure loook even better with how it's cut. that being said the different patterns over each boob made the clothe look crazy. it makes you look quite lopsided in the chest. wasn't just me, but my store people also agreed. had the pattern on the chest been the same it would be magnificent, but even though my boobs are of "mostly" equal size, they looked too crazy. it's quite noticeable on. so sad:(

I love the idea of this shirt-- the embroidered pattern is fun and summery! the fit of the shirt is a little strange. i saw that in other reviews, but i had to see for myself. it is rather boxy. i think i may keep it, though. i will look cute with super fitted skinny jeans to balance out the boxiness of the top.

Tried this on in store and it runs very small. i am a size 4, but have curvy hips, so i sized up to a size 6 and i couldn't even button it. i was hoping it was more of an a-line, but it's fit more like a pencil skirt. not very flattering on my body type. overall, cute design, but not for me.

Review_Title: A magnificent piece to throw on
Review: This coat is unexpectedly soft and comfy. i'd been debating getting a leather coat in this style but when i saw this it seemed a magnificent option. seems to be very versatile.

I followed the other reviews and sized down. normally, i'm a small/medium in retailer (5'8"/135 for clarification) and i expected the garment to be a bit roomy. i ordered the small and when it arrived i almost called the corporate office to ensure i didn't have to pay rent on the romper, given that you could comfortably fit a small family of five in it. oddly, the arm-holes were normal sized? i returned this mess.

Love this sweater! beautiful detail, thicker yarn and well made. sweater has more structure to it than i had anticipated, which makes it look more tailered while being soft and comfortable. hits my lower hip and i'm 5'6". receive compliments every time i wear it.
This is so cute and i love that it is not heavy or bulky.

A while back the moss ikat print appealed to me online but sometimes these style tops look maternity on me so i passed up. well abt a month ago i spotted the 'moss' in the store & had to try it! it really is cute & love the print even more in person. the size 4 was fine but the armholes exposed the bra a little & i wondered if it wld be a little too short after washing. well, the size 6 was a little longer & a tad more flowy, & oddly the armholes covered the bra (the 4 didn't). i went w/ the siz
Love this shirt, magnificent fabric and fit. trying to wait for a sale to buy several others in additional colors.

Review_Title: Color not as pictured on website
Review: I wish i had read the other review about the color of the pink version of this sweater before i ordered it. she was completely right - the color is completely different in person. it is this garish pink and brown that looks like it was knit together with remaindered yarn. it's too bad, because the cut of the sweater is cute and the zipper adds a funky touch. maybe the blue is better in person...

As another reviewer pointed out, although the tag inside the clothe says that you can machine wash in cold water, the color around the popsicles will bleed! this is extremely disappointing. i'm hoping it can either be fixed with dye remover, or that retailer will take this item back. would only dry clean this item.
Love love the fit and material. a must fall wardrobe.

I love that this tee is so soft and is not boring! when i originally took it out of the bag, my teenage daughter did not like it. then i tried it on and she was wowed! the longer length in the back makes it very interesting. i am looking forward to wearing this with jeans.

These jeans are fantastic! i've worn them once and got many compliments. definitely keepers. i am 5'8" and weigh about 135. normally i wear a 29 but i sized down based on reviews to a 28. they fit excellently at the start of the day, but as all jeans with a bit of stretch do, they get bigger as the day goes on, but because they're a boyfriend cut it all works. really happy with this purchase. my only regret is that i didn't get two pair.

So, ordered online. tried this on, boyfriend asked me if i was buying maternity clothes. 
back it goes. super cute but huge.

Review_Title: Not what i had hoped for...
Review: Like others, i finally received my size 6p black trousers after months of waiting.  for starters, these trousers run small, so i ordered a size up but still in petite, because i adored the red ones i got this past summer.  when the black trousers arrived, they were a full three inches shorter than the red ones (which were also 6p), and the fabric did not feel anywhere close to the same quality.  i'm debating ordering the regular length, but i'm not sure i'll bother, based on some of the other reviews.

This skirt is really beautiful and well made. the color is a cream/off white like other reviewers mentioned. it fits mostly true to size--i have a straight build with a wider stomach and no hips and my usual 4 fit a tad tight in the waist but excellent in the hips. i just love this skirt.
Very comfortable and easy to clothe up or down. i get tons of complaints on this clothe- it's a definite win!

This blouse is easily one of the nicest i have bought in recent times. the quality is excellent, the design demonstrates that design and nature are extremely compatible. i have worn this blouse with jeans and in a more formal situation and with a little more jewelry, the blouse fits in excellently anywhere. i highly recommend it.

Review_Title: Photo friendly old school retailer clothe
Review:
I love this clothe. my preferred retailer purchase in years. it is excellent. looks magnificent- no need for ironing and is really sexy for the length and amount of material. i would buy it 10 more times if i could. 

yes!
Not flattering if your have large top. made well and very cute for thin no boob person

Beautiful - ordered a s, i wear a 2 in most retailer items. hand washed in cold water, shrunk inches, yes inches! love maeve clothing, this shirt is gorgeous. before hand washing in the sink, it was large and flowy. now it barely fits.

This is a cute waffle t-shirt material is very thin and see-through it's a cute shape and style but it runs completely huge 
 is not a shirt for petite people
 the extra extra small was huge

I picked these up the other day looking for a good jeans alternative. i love them. they are the excellent fit of slim but not skinny. i went with my normal size (26) and so far after one wear, they are still in good shape. a little bit of stretch, but not too much. the moss color is so crisp and goes with a lot. they will be excellent for transitioning into fall.

Recently started loving rockets. i own a pair in black and a pair that are distressed. i've found that the 27s fit me best. i am 5'7", 34c, 28 waist. this particular pair seems to run true to size, meaning i could get the 28s on (which is typically what i wear in other brands), but the 27s were embarassingly too small. while the 28s fit, and are made of a magnificent weighty denim, with very little stretch, the wash was really not appealing. due to the distressing of the wash, all the lines butterfly

Got this top in the blue/orange plaid. its super cute and i love the style much better than your typical straight button down plans shirt.
i highly recommend it!

This coat has a nautical look which is a refreshing change for this year. it is double breasted & a stretchy cotton, which i love. i am a big fan of cotton. it appealed to me so much that i ordered both the white & the navy in the regular size small. i am of small build at 5'3", 117# & expected that the sleeves c/b a little long. i avoid ordering petite size coats b/c sometimes they are snug in the shoulders. ok, so the regular s was a good length at the bottom of my hips, but arms were bagg

Tried this one because the ruffled detailing at the collar and sleeves appealed to me, as well at the cute button details along the back and the overall color and look of it.
_____________
pros:
- love the ruffle trim along the collar, bottom, and wrists. it gives it a really romantic feel to it.
- a definite winter piece. it's extremely warm and very thick and heavy, which i found covered any lumps and bumps nicely.
- ran tts. i'm 5'9", 36c, hourglass, and 170 lbs and tried on the medium and fo
Love the look, beautiful color, magnificent length.  but with many of retailer's lace skirts, clothees and shirts the zipper did not eat to cooperate.

Saw this online and thought it would be excellent for my upcoming plane ride. originally ordered the teal color, but when it arrived, i was disappointed that it was more of a muddy greenish teal and not the light bluish teal like in the photo. exchanged it for the black version and i couldn't be happier. the black goes well with everything--looks magnificent with jeans and yoga trousers. love it!!

I love trouseries. i love the prettiest, softest, most adore-worthy trouseries i can find. these are my preferred boy shorts--i can always put them on and feel pretty. no weird tight spots and the lace has a excellent amount of stretch. im a mom and my body isn't excellent anymore, but these trouseries give me confidence, with excellent coverage. i choose them more often than any other in my lingerie drawer. my only warning: wash these pretties as delicates, or the lovely lace colors will fade.

This is a very beautiful clothe, with the detail of the inside lining, with a very beautiful fabric as well, creating a double layer effect, it creates a magnificent flow. i am not sure i would use it with the belt (which is beautiful, a part of it is crochet), but if i don't, the clothe would be too long. i am a size xl and 5'6", so if you are shorter than that, i would try it before buying it. since it's getting cold here in colorado, i'll have to wait for next year to really experience going out with
Magnificent peplum top, beautiful whine color. very thick material. i'm hourglass figure, 36d top so it was very flattering

Beautiful clothe! love the colors and fit. can be clotheed up or down. the only negative is that the buttons fall off. this is my third clothe and it too lost a button the first time i wore it. i don't live near an retailer store so i will be keeping it anyways, as this is already my third clothe :( my advice would be to reinforce the three buttons as soon as you buy it. there is one at the top, front of the clothe and one on each sleeve.

These are the excellent higher waisted skinny jeans. high enough that there is no muffin top, but not so high they look like mom jeans. typical ag super soft fabric. they are like wearing sweat trousers. so worth the extra money for the ag jeans. love the length too.

If this product was in petite, i would get the petite. the regular is a little long on me but a tailor can do a simple fix on that. 

fits nicely! i'm 5'4, 130lb and pregnant so i bough t medium to grow into. 

the tie can be front or back so provides for some nice flexibility on form fitting.

I am 5'3, curvy and wear a size 12 and these trousers look amazing! often i struggle with wide keg trousers bc they make me look short and plump, however, the material is buttery soft and hang in an elegant way and most important they are quite flattering. even if you don't think culottes will work for your body type- i suggest you give these a try.
Unfortunately the clothe is pulling apart after the first wash ( gentle hand wash cycle). also, there are no bra-straps holders, and my bra straps did show up a lot...
This is a cross between a sweater and a sweatshirt. not a heavy weight but very warm. the color is vibrant. many compliments.

This is a magnificent looking top but the sizing is way off. in the photo it looks a little oversized. i am normally a medium but this one was very small, sleeves several inches too short and it is more like 25" long instead of the 35" listed on the description. in the right size i think it will be magnificent but i'm not sure whether to go up one size or two.

I was hesitant to buy this due to the price but so i glad i did when it came in the mail. magnificent quality and unexpectedly thick silky fabric. very comfortable and the shimmery thread detail is beautiful. could be very warm in the summer due to the thick tweed like fabric. fits and looks true to size just like it does on the model.

First, i received mine with the back button (by the neck) busted (the part where you insert the button was loose, so could not button). 
i ordered the yellow one, and was surprised how yellow it was when received. it is brighter than the picture shows, not bad though.
the cut of the clothe is nice, very "sweet", i liked that it was flowy and the lace was beautiful to me. arms were a tad tight, only because i have muscular arms. stil lable to wear it.

i ordered the 0petite, and it fit. i am 1

I love this top. i got it thinking i'd wear it mostly with jeans but turns out i have worn it with a lot more. it pairs magnificent with cut-off shorts, white jeans, denim jeans. i have worn it tucked in with high waisted jeans for a more polished look and also un-tucked for a more casual look. i get lots of compliments on this top when i wear it. i think it could be worn into fall with a coat over it. very happy with it!

I love this clothe! its feminine, sassy and very comfortable. it fit my body type well--i'd say i have more of an athletic build (broad shoulders, 36c, straight in waist/hips) plus i have a lovely left over tummy from two babies.... the top has stretch and is a higher waist which is slimming on my body. the bottom material is a thick and high quality with a design that is beautiful in person. it sits out from my waist and hips and easily covers the left over tummy and is super easy to move in. po

I am going to keep it. i think it will be a magnificent "throw on and go" piece you can wear with many different types of shoe/sandal. the detail on top is excellent and it is a flattering cut. two complaints: runs a little big on bottom, a little "genie" looking...like there is too much fabric above the elastic around your upper ankles. but the bigger issue is that there is no zipper or elastic on top so slipping the top over your shoulders is super tight, to the point i thought i was going to rip it

This clothe is so pretty. the tulle underskirt was a fun surprise and the subtle striping in the clothe so classy. the clothe is true to size. my main concern was making sure the top part would fit around my chest. it fits excellently.

This is a beautiful cardigan. its effortless, lightweight, with some cool detail to keep that low key look extra stylish. the moss color is very subtle with a small lined print. i wanted to love this...the detail, the length, the weight and the color are all so dreamy...but for me, the arms were super tight. normally i'm a l or xl in all retailer tops and sweaters...and i do have larger arms which is always a struggle for me when shopping. i couldn't even get the cardigan on my arms. there is no s

This top is beautiful but beware there is a lot of extra material on the sides. it was not flattering on only because of all the excess fabric. clearly the model in the picture has it pinned behind her. it would be a keeper if it was cut closer to the body but sadly it's going back.

This clothe is really stunning - can be clotheed up or down with a jean coat really easily. runs quite a bit small in the bust (i ordered a 16 to accommodate) but it is really very pretty. i love this brand- they always have such lovely pieces.

This is a bit more coat-ish than i expected. the material is kind of scratchy, and it was heavier than expected. it has a lining in it, like a coat lining. i wasn't a fan of the clasps on the front. i guess they are meant to be invisible, but they are literally little metal clasps. it is more cropped in the length than i expected, and i don't have a particularly long torso. i like the embroidery. the pattern is lovely. the fit is about spot on. i am about a 12/14 with a 38c bust and the l fi

One of the best tops i have ever bought! i love he material and the style. the satin trim around the edges adds a classy touch. i wore this top with yoga trousers and then with jeans and it was excellent for both outfits! the shirt is true to size. i wear a size small and it fit excellently (5'7", 145lbs, 34b).

Review_Title: A supportive, comfy bralette? actually, yes.
Review: I'm a 32dd, so i wouldn't normally wear a bralette out of the house (not enough support). this bralette is actually very supportive and comfortable. i'm probably going to get at least one more. for reference, i'm a 32dd (small back, big boobs) and a small fit me extremely well.

I was so excited to try this clothe, but after ready the reviews,i though they were all over the place! i descided to order my typical retailer size small. i'm 5'6" , 134 lbs, and wear a size 6. well, it was a snug fit! i have a slim build and this was just to snug for my taste. i imagine a medium would have been better. however, i was very surprised by the length and slit... the clothe hit at my knee cap with the slit going all the way up to mid thigh... .!?? i've seen pics of this clothe on instagr

This top looks magnificent and feels magnificent. got lots of compliments when i wore it for thanksgiving. i pretty plan to wear this for every holiday event this year and will layer it with sweaters and scarves to mix it up.

Ok, so by now, we know this is a cute top that is simpleally true to size but a little clingy. i prefer to wear it with a tank top or tee shirt underneath. it would also do well layered under something. for refernce, i am 5'7, about 120, and xs was the best fit.

but what i really wanted to mention is that i washed it in the machine on cold delicate and dried it on low, and it survived just fine!

Like the other reviewer said, the print is more beautiful in person. i am usually a small in meadow rue, and this fits well in a small. my only issue is that the lining hangs out from the bottom, and hangs out unevenly! hopefully i can exchange it or get it sewed up evenly.

I'm 5'2", weigh 120 lb.. i ordered p6 and found the torso too short. if i bent forward or kneeled down that fabric would ride ride up into my butt big time. the top was a little loose too. i'm 35ab cup. i love the colors and geometric design. sadly i have to return.

I found this jumpsuit at my local retailer it must have been a web order return i love it the fit is true size the colors are excellent it's very comfortable and gorgeous on and at the sale price i could not pass it up
I loved this skirt. they didn't have my size anymore so i tried on a few others. i really needed a small p. otherwise i totally would have kept it!

The print on this clothe is gorgeous---but the material does not stretch whatsoever, and there are not zippers or buttons to ease in the fit. i always, always, always wear a size zero. it was a massive struggle to even get the clothe over my head and on to my body. i felt like i was getting crushed! once on, although awfully small, the clothe is just beautiful in every way. so chic! i just returned it and ordered two sizes up---here's hoping it fits!

This is a beautiful, simple, yet feminine top. a little tight in the bust on me - so i had to size up (and i am not busty). for reference, i am 117 5'3 34b. i'm probably in between a small and x-small on this - but went with the small.
This has a classic tunic style silhouette with delicate gold threads. it looks even better in person than online.

This clothe is everything everyone said it was in the reviews. so cute and beautifully made. fully lined.
i felt it ran a bit small as i had to return it for the next size up, more so in the bust area. but the fit and length was excellent in the size 6. 5"10, 125lbs. i will say that all the raving reviews made me purchase
the clothe without hesitation and i'm sure glad i did!

Review_Title: Lovely but the cut/sizing is not good
Review: This is a beautiful spring/summer clothe, and the quality of the materials is magnificent. i wanted to love it. but the sizing is ridiculous! i'm 5'3" and 115 and i think you could fit three of me comfortably in the xs. while the pictures of the model in the clothe don't suggest it has a shapeless cut, it definitely looked like a sack on me. a sack with a lovely print, but still an ill-fitting sack.
I had high hopes with the other good reviews, but you just don't know how amazing this is until you put it on! just so soft and cozy! i am so excited for more saturday/sunday products at retailer!
I was so excited to get this top..but it's boxy and a little itchy from the design. i just didn't think it was worth the hefty price. i'm normally a small in retailer clothing

It really is such a cute romper. took it on s trip to italy and it was airy and comfortable. that is in till i washed it. i'm in europe so there aren't dryers... washed it in cold water, line-dried it and it shrunk. significantly. it still fits but the top doesn't blouse over like it previously did. and the shorts feel really short. so disappointed. my advice would be to hand wash it in very cold water

Love these! loose and comfy everywhere. delighted to have found a 32, and delighted that they are roomy, even at the waist. i exchanged another pair of pilcro's and was afraid of a shipping/pricing conflict, but as usual, retailer customer service was excellent. earlier sale price was honored, easy returns in the orignal shipping bag.. 
retailer design, fashion and company attitude excels!
My preferred jeans i have ever purchased! they fit just right. i wear them everywhere.
I really wanted to love this piece but it was very large. i'm 5'2 and ordered xs/s and i have return due to size.
Magnificent tank top! loved it so much that i ordered 3!
Soft and stretchy denim. beautiful color. i do wish they had a tiny bit higher rise but they fit like my other paige skinnies.

The shirt is a heavier weight than how it looks on the product page which was a nice surprise. it has a boxy shape and was shorter than expected. i'm 5'7" and the front of the shirt above the hips. the design and color is magnificent. very happy overall.
Was not flattering on my body - i have a fuller figure, and this just made me look like i was pregnant.
I tried it on and it fit like a glove. it was a little strange having a different fabric on the back, but it worked and i am keeping it.

I do wish this came in a 30dd sizing, purchased he 32d and it fits, though the band is looser than desired. i am still keeping it. i love the back, will be magnificent for some of my clothees ti used to wear strapless bras to wear. recommend.
I bought this in blue and can't wait to wear it, feels so soft. exactly like the picture.

This coat is amazing! i at first bought the medium because that is what i usually wear on top. when it arrived in the mail i put it on asap. it fit but was definitely too form fitting to wear a sweater or long sleeve shirt underneath. so i called the store and asked them to reserve a large and that one fit excellently! it's loose enough to wear something underneath but not so loose that it looks to big. it is so soft and cozy, and the hood is my preferred part!
Makes me feel like a sexy ice skater. true to size, i am 5'0 and 120 lb and both the small and medium fit. i kept the medium. love it!

I adore this skirt - it is so soft and flowy. i was not sure if the mesh would be a bit stiff, but it's not at all. the dots are soft as is the main fabric. i could wear this all day long and be very comfy. the underlying fabric is a bit more taupe than gold in color. i am between sizes to i sized up and was glad i did- no pinch at the waist. i love that it's feminine yet funky and could be worn formally or in fun. it is midi-length, as you see on the model. completely a magnificent buy!

This is a magnificent clothe. i purchased the red and gold motif. i like that it is versatile and very comfortable. plus, it has pockets!!! love that! i am fuller in the bottom, so i was concerned with the pockets adding bulk. so far, so good.

I was so excited to get this robe in the mail but was beyond disappointed when i opened the package. the fabric is extremely stiff and thin. the fabric felt like something curtains would be made out of and the white background was see through. the robe is very short and cut small in the shoulders, therefore it looked like i was wearing a piece of children's clothing. i also ordered the matching pj trousers but didn't even take them out of the package after seeing how rough and see through the mater

This is a magnificent silhouette and the red/black plaid will be excellent for fall. it will look magnificent with black bottoms or with jeans. the only reason i gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is that the outer shell fabric (the plaid) is a rayon twill that is a little bit lightweight for the silhouette, so it is bagging out a little around the zipper and the pockets. i'm hoping the quality will hold up. i bought this same coat in a heavier weight camoflage printed tencel this spring from the same brand, and

Review_Title: Just what i needed in a summer short
Review: I was running low on good summer shorts and thought i'd try these based on having a pair of the pilcro cropped trousers i got a couple months ago. i tried these shorts on in-store to make sure they fit right and that i liked how they looked but then bought them online (more colors were available in my size than what they had in store). i bought these in 3 different colors and i completely love them all! they are my go-to shorts now, they look good with the legs rolled up or down, and i will be wear

I'm a 34c and 136 lbs. i bought this in m in two colors because i love it so much! the fit is so flattering and the material is so soft and comfortable. i continue to get the best quality and fitting clothees from retailer!

I love this top (so cute and comfy!), but i wore it twice, washed it once on gentle and layed to dry.....now there are 2 small holes in the front. for as much as it cost, i would have expected it to be more durable. very disappointing, especially since i don't live near an retailer and can't take it back easily......

Love these! i am a medium in shorts or 29-30, and the medium fit excellently.. true to size, very soft, flattering cut and color. love the embroidery. magnificent for travel, very light and can be jazzed up a little with nice sandals, almost like a flirty little short skirt. the fullness and non fitted look is magnificent for a less than excellent tummy.
i am very happy with this purchase.

I am short, on the heavy side. 5'1" 156 lbs. i always wear large petite. this beautiful blouse swallows me. lots of fabric on the front side of the shirt, causing a boxy look. i could totally do a mp if not sp. i am going to try and exchange..
beautiful blouse, magnificent quality, breathable fabric. colors are deep and rich. so comfy.. highly recommend.

I purchased the purple t with letters all over. magnificent fit, long and not clingy at all. i love the 80's motif/style of the letters. excellent t-shirt for a teacher.
the black design was strange - hearts, fox, cats... it just seemed random and no theme. i would buy colors of this t-shirt because it fits so well, but the black "green" design was too off.

The colors weren't what i expected either. the dark blue is much more vibrant and i just couldn't find anything to really go with it. fabric is thick and good quality. has nice weight and movement to it. the skirt just wasn't for me, in the end.

Review_Title: Gorgeous - needs a belt if you aren't tiny
Review:
I adore this clothe, but i never would have bought it if i didn't wear it with a belt. as some reviewers have said, it's a sack. the belt takes care of this. it still isn't a slimming clothe, but i really don't mind--the elegance and comfort make up for it.

i'm 5'10", 34c, and curvy in the hips, and the medium fit excellently. i could see this fitting strangely if you were larger in the bust.
Very flattering, not too short, beautiful. i'm 5.6, 36d, usually wear m in clothees, wide hips. the 8 fit very nicely.

Bought this clothe on sale in the orange as i feel like everything i have is black. it is a pretty orange not too bright, more of a rust color. it is very soft as stated in other reviews and has a nice built in slip that is very comfortable. i worry about pilling down the road but will have to wait and see. i am not crazy about the seams down the chest area. i think they could be more flattering but overall the clothe is comfortable, cute and easy to wear, a excellent clothe for the fall/winter with

This clothe is completely stunning!!! i'm 5 feet & curvy. it's flowy, lightweight & has some sparkle mixed in with the gorgeous print. it fit everywhere except when i got the zipper up to my chest. i'm a 36dd & it wasn't going to finish zipping. i was very sad! i even tried the biggest size they had - a 12 & it didn't work. if that zipper had been able to go all the way up & would own this clothe.

Review_Title: A girl and a pretty skirt...
Review: This skirt is excellent. i'm a size 10 and i'm 48 years old. i've really been wanting a tulle skirt, but didn't want to look like baby huey in it a bip puffy tutu above my knees. this skirt is indicative of the quality that is bailley 44. the fit is magnificent, the length is excellent. i plan to wear it with a chambray shirt and the burgundy colored obi belt.

I received the moss skirt today. the material felt very soft and like good quality. i'm 5'4', 125 lbs and had ordered size 4 regular. unfortunately the skirt was huge and also very long, below the knees. the cut was not flattering for me as the material stuck out very wide on the sides. possibly a smaller size and petite would help but are sold out already in moss. plus i'm not sure the sticking out would be fixed, that might be the cut of the skirt. it didn't work for me and i will be returning

I bought these almost immediately after touching them in store; they were so soft i didn't even need to try them on to know i would love them. i now wish i had tried them on in the store, so i could have learned that the elastic band on the inside isn't sown in, meaning the band will constantly twist and get tangled whenever i put them on/take them off. it's unbelievably annoying. i have to fix them every time i wear them. if i had known this i don't know if i would have purchased them. they are
This product is incredibly comfy and excellent for getting cozy however the sleeves were sort of loose and did not look cohesive with the grey. props on the draping though, that was lovely.

This shirt was better than expected. the fit is fitted but still flows. it's comfortable and the material is magnificent. it goes with anything, ive tucked it into trousers and skirts but i've also just worn with leggings. looks magnificent either way! im going to buy more of this shirt.

I really like this top.  for reference, i am usually an xs or s in retailer tops since many of them run large, however, in this top i ordered a size m and it fit nicely.  in any brand other than retailer, my usual size is m as i am 36d bust, 132 lbs., 5"5.

Review_Title: I think pilcro are my preferred jeans.
Review: I love the serif jeans and these stet mid-rise jeans fit excellently, too! true to size and i really like the wash. i am 5'4" and a size 2, and the 26 fits just right. because of my height they come closer to the ankle on me than what you see on the model. i have more of an athletic build, rather than curvy.

So flattering! the length is excellent and hits just above the knee in front (slightly longer on sides).  i was looking for a versatile clothe that could be worn to church, work, luncheons, or casual evening events.  this one fits the bill. i love that it pays homage to the boho/peasant trend without being shapeless or making me look too wide. i am 5'6" (long torso) 132 lbs, 32d and the small fit excellently. i got the black motif print.

Love the unique details and neutral color scheme. top is boxy but i liked the way it looked on my 5'2" 115 lb. frame. it's comfortable and well made. thicker material.  seems to be holding up fine after one washing.  looks magnificent with skinny jeans.  highly recommend!

These trousers are the excellent color, and i love the detail of the zippered pockets... i was so excited when they came in the mail and fit pretty well. they were slightly loose, but i thought they would hold their shape and the size smaller would be too small. after an hour of wear, i was swimming in these! i can almost pull them down without unzipping them and the seat of the trousers looks particularly, um, saggy. i am in-between a 4 and 6, and since the trousers are detailed as slim fit, i thought it

I expected to love this, since i usually look good in this style of coat. it's definitely comfortable and the fit was fine, but i really don't care for the wooden buttons and the overall look was just "meh." it's going back, unfortunately.

I'm pregnant (2nd trimester) and really wanted a beautiful, non-maternity clothe. i got this in ivory and it's just excellent. the lace on the sleeves is really comfortable, i love the fit, and i love the length. i got tons of compliments on it. my only regret is that i didn't also get it in slate and i really wishing it would get re-stocked.
I am wearing a medium in the photos, my measurements are 38-30-40 for reference.

Review_Title: Cute but not appropriate for work!
Review: I wanted this skirt to work! it is soft, comfortable, and cute! unfortunately, it runs to short.  i am 5'8" and would not be able to pull it off at work. i ordered a bigger size and it still didn't work.
Love this skirt. i love that it is pleated and sheer on the bottom. i'm so happy i found it online! love anything maeve, you can count on the quality and simple elegance.

This is a super cute t-shirt!  it runs a little big and not as long as some t-shirts which is good.   it hits mid-hip on me and i'm 5'7".    i got the gray at my retailer store and liked it so much i ordered the black one too.   warning:  the black one is actually a brownish-black which i didn't like so back it goes.

Review_Title: The only fall clothe you need
Review: The cream color in this clothe is divine. such a stunning clothe that can be worn with a vest, coat or alone. it looks very luxe and expensive in the cream color. because it's a knit, can go smaller in size. i tried on both the x-small and small. opted to go with the x-small. found it fit better.

I am so in love with these trousers. i generally stay away from wide legged trousers because i think they make me look shorter (i am already short) but these are awesome. the fabric is not very thick so they are moveable which is magnificent, but not so moveable that they feel like palazzo trousers-they will hold their shape. i love the polka dot design so much and i actually really love the whole outfit with the black tie-top. these trousers are long on me, but it isn't surprising since i am pretty short, i am t

This clothe is beautiful and classy, well made, the fabric is thick and substantial, soft and stretchy. unfortunately it did not work for me at all, i'm somewhat thick in the middle with a few "lumps and bumps", and this clothe was not forgiving despite the thick material. i normally wear size 12 or large, i actually ordered a 12 online which i didn't receive yet, but i tried on a size 14 during an unexpected trip to the store (12 was not in stock) and it was just not flattering, showing all my mi

I love the look of this top. i'm usually a size 12 or 14 and i tried on a size l and it seemed really big, and looked a little like a maternity top. i thought maybe it was too big and ordered a size m. unfortunately, it still looked maternity-ish. i think the bottom of this is flared so much that if you have a big bust at all, it will look like a maternity top on you.

I am floored by all of the positive comments about these culottes! i can see that they would work for someone who is rail thin and has no hips... but for those of us with curves (i'm a size 12, hourglass), these are very unflattering. they made me look like i was carrying an extra 20-30 pounds, just around the hips! so bummed because they look so cute on the model.

Caught my eye because of the colorful graphic print, in my closet because of the super sale price.  it fits as expected in size medium, a little bit long since i'm short.  i'm unsure of the longevity since it's a viscose mix.  feels a little scratchy so if you're sensitive, be aware.  i don't really wear tank tops without layers so this is a magnificent addition to my casual wardrobe.

This looks magnificent on the model but when it arrived, i couldn't believe it was the same coat. it looks a bit like a really loose garbage bag on me and no amount of adjusting drawstrings is going to fix it. i really wanted to like it, but even the xs/s was too baggy. also a bit worried based on other reviews that it isn't actually a rain coat and wont keep you dry.

I love these trousers, but they are a bit too long. like the reviewer below, they hit me right at the ankles. i am 5'6". i am going to hem them a bit. also they were a little bigger in the waist than expected--could have ordered a size 28 instead of a 29.

I bought this clothe in three different patterns, i love it so much! i am 5'7" and around 135 pounds. usually a size six or eight in clothees. ordered the small and fits excellently if a little bit. curvy frame. magnificent for women on the busty side. fits beautiful and is stretchy but not too clingy.

I got this coat to throw over slacks at work with the ac, and it's excellent. the picture online is less flattering than in person. found that the medium was too large in shoulders and arm length, small was right for 140lb, 5'8", typical size 6.

I really like this top. it's super cute - excellent for a football game or fairly casual event. the material is ribbed and is thick enough that you can't see through. i purchased this top in red and initially in petite but ended up returning it for the regular size. i love this top!

I adore this clothe. it has a fairly thick material, which helps the skirt stay full and is very flattering if, like me, your thighs or tummy can be a problem area in clothees! the only downside for me is the fact that i have fairly narrow shoulders, so the seam for the sleeves tends to stick out a bit! i get lots of compliments on this one!
I always go w/ black, but deviated this time & so glad i did! quality fabric, not sheer at all. a magnificent layering piece and new staple for the wardrobe. fits tts, sm (i'm 5'2", 109lbs)

Tried this in store today and id say it is exactly as pictured (length is similar on me at 5'7", colors as shown, cut is loose but not overly sacklike). my normal size s fit loosely, but not in an unflattering way. sizing down might have been too narrow in the shoulders. the embroidery seemed to be good quality, but the fabric itself was on the thinner side with no lining. i would have liked to see a liner at this price (and probably would have bought), but i think i'll wait for a promo or sale

I bought this top about 3 weeks ago& love it! i like it because it's better than a plain t-shirt so it's excellent for running around doing errands or shopping. i like the material and the length, i'm 5'8" and sometimes i feel like shirts are to short. i wash it and hang it to dry, no shrinking or pilling so far! i am ordering this in at least two more colors!

Wasn't sure what to expect - but got this on sale, and glad i did.
it is much prettier in person. soft and silky.
magnificent fit also - and versatile (mix and match)
I like the look of this tee and the fit is fine but it's described as a "cotton-rayon jersey" and in fact it's 50% polyester. i would not have ordered if i had known and now have to take it back.

Denim, faux fur, flannel... hooray! i completely love this coat and i'll wear it all winter (even under my warmer winter coat). i'm 5'6"/130 and usually a 2-4 in retailer and the small in this coat was plenty big in the waist/chest and even had room underneath to add a second shirt or light sweater. it seems a little shorter on me than in the photo... maybe that's the only drawback.

Review_Title: Beautiful design but not magnificent quality.
Review: I'll start with saying that it's a beautiful coat- i get tons of compliments and love the color. it runs a little big but it's meant to have to a slouchy, oversized quality to it. my only complaint is that i've had it for about 3 weeks and already one button has completely fallen off and the two inside fasteners already feel loose and very delicate. there's no extra buttons to replace the old one with and i'm worried more of the coat is going to fall apart. super bummed about the construction qu

This clothe in the blue motif has a really flattering fit and look. the clothe especially in this color, hides the belly area well and does not make you look wide if you are heavier in the bottom half. it is not too short and goes past my knee. i am 5'3'.'' the material is also really soft and the clothe is easy to pull on.

My store got this magnificent tunic in white and i loved it so much. excellent tunic length, swingy, detailed...but as soon as i saw the orange option i knew i had to wait for it. i just got it and im in love! the orange print is so lovely. the excellent fall color and the print is timeless. the fabric is light and easy. the fit is definitely bigger, but i usually wear a l or xl in retailer tops and i preferred the xl. i have a lot of curves so i love a top that has some room, but i needed the xl for room i

I really like the color of this and the feel, but that is where it ends. it does not come with the gorgeous flattering belt that it is pictured with, and is cut without shape so it does not fit to your body and show off any glorious womanly curves. i could purchase the belt with it, but i don't prefer to purchase products that cannot stand on their own.

Well-made and well-designed tunic top. looks magnificent over trousers. not recommended for tucking in, as the pin tucks hit right at the waistline. the ivory is a bit see-through so i wear it with a cami underneath. be aware that your bra will likely be visible through the cut-outs in front. i didn't realize that the first time i wore it and was amazed to discover, at the end of the evening, how tacky it looked. to avoid that you need a low-cut bra. with the proper undergarments, this is a magnificent top tha

I tried this on at my local store and immediately had to buy it. the picture does not do it justice. it drapes wonderfully in front and sticks out a bit at the pockets to give some added personality. fabric is very soft and light weight. highly recommend!

This button down is to die for! the material is incredibly soft and comfy. it looks magnificent with my retailer leggings, and is also a magnificent look with my casual denim, paired with a cardi and flats or booties. i've worn it several times for different looks and always get compliments on it! definitely a head-turning piece.

Don't pass this one up ladies....the fabric is casual and relaxed, but the drawstring-like collar gives it class and flirt all at the same time. i paired it with a jersey mini skirt and the way the banding at the waist falls on this top made it look like one whole clothe. i can wear this with cropped jeans, shorts, anything! truly a homerun. i'm 5'10", 138lbs and small fit excellently.
