Love this tee! lightweight, airy and comfy. i think it fits true to size. so soft and summery. can't wait to wear it this summer!

This is the first one piece swimsuit i've owned since i was a toddler. i'm 5'3" and 120 lbs 34b bust with short torso and athletic built legs...so i wasn't sure how this would fit. was i ever surprised!! i bought the size small in the mint chevron pattern. the material is substantial but not overly thick. it is double layered and the cups are padded for extra coverage. it was a little tight to pull on but after having it on it conformed to my curves like it was cut to fit them. the top offers an
Loving this jumpsuit! i normally a medium top small bottom i bought the medium it fits right. soft fabric and nice color.

These are nice, comfortable summer trousers that travel well. the material has a nice feel to it,lightweight, but not too thin. they are easy to wear with any summer top, and look just clothey enough. i like the elastic waist, but the trousers will stretch out a bit, and run a little large.

Review_Title: Gorgeous style but very very itchy
Review: I love the style and the look of this sweater. i wanted to love it and keep it but could not because the itchiness was too much. the style looks so comfortable and easy going, but it was not, it was clingy around the waist and backside. for reference, i am 5ft 4in and 128b and i ordered the small - the sleeves were too long on me, not "cool" long like some other sweaters this season.

This clothe is gorgeous, but i should warn all the tall ladies out there that it fits quite awkwardly. i'm 5'10" and tried both the petite (thinking it would fall more like a midi), and the regular, hoping it would fit like a maxi should. both hit at a very awkward spot on my mid-shin... as much as i loved and wanted it, it looked too weird to justify buying.

This top is magnificent under a blazer for work, can be tucked into a skirt and looks magnificent with jeans.necklaces work magnificent with this neckline unless they are short. the sea green is wonderful! i like the snug armholes but may be a problem for some. my hips are larger than my bust so i had to be convinced to try this on and i'm glad i was overruled. i am a small or medium in retailer tops and i got a small.

Review_Title: Beautiful in the pic, fits kind of funny in person
Review: I was really hoping that this clothe would fit excellently because it looks beautiful on the model! however, when i put the clothe on, there is a seam where the top portion meets the bottom portion and it made the skirt stick out a ton. i ordered the 0p and i am 5'4" 110lbs. maybe ordering this clothe in a larger size would prevent the skirt from looking so full at the top.

Per the other reviews i sized up and got the medium. it was still tight around the girls (and i'm not that well endowed), but too big in the armholes. the fabric is a kind of thin tee shirt material. i kept it (because i'm lazy) but not sure how much i'll wear it given the strange fit.

Do not buy these trousers!  the first time i washed these trousers i ended up with big faded spots, and i followed the washing instructions.  i bought another pair and the same thing happened.  i'm out a bunch of money!
Very flattering, the material is not the softest but it's an easy one to throw on with jeans

I had such high hopes for this, but the fit was really strange. i ordered my usual size small, but it is huge. the sides of the top are very wide and boxy, and the back hangs far from my body, very droopy. even if i got a smaller size, the design/fit is not for me. i like the linen front of the blouse, though it is quite sheer. the fabric on the back has a pretty design, but it appears to be stamped on thin black cloth, rather than the richly-colored fabric i saw in the picture. i am truly disap
Saw this in the greenville, sc store, and it caught my eye. i ordered a petite a week later, and i adore it. nice embroidery. a little sparkle. the sleeves are voluminous, but it makes me feel sassy.

As always, these ag stevies are excellent. i was worried they would run small, but they are true to size on me. i'm about 5'2" and ordered the petite length and the length looks like the model on me. just above the ankles.

Review_Title: If you love cotton and feminine details...
Review: This is the kind of blouse you want at your reach when clotheing on a humid day. cotton enhanced with beautiful detail. a very classic timeless, ageless piece. i bought the medium, which fits excellently (size 8 top, 34f). my only ding is that the neck opening should be stitched less deep; there is a gap. funny thing is that, in the photo, the model's blouse is pinned exactly where i'm talking about. i didn't take off a star because i had a clothemaker fix the problem, but this was annoying. i wore

Love the texture and color of this tunic. it does seem to run large - i could have probably sized down to a pl without an issue. i do agree with other reviewers that the pockets are strangely placed and add bulk. i'm going to have them removed. overall, i really like it and have already worn it multiple times.

Review_Title: Cute top, but back is more of a jersey material
Review: I really love the front of this shirt. however, the back of the shirt is more of a jersey material so it doesn't seem to match the front of the shirt. i still wear it and it looks cute, but it threw me off a bit at first.

I bought this to wear for my baby shower at 34 weeks. i was able to buy it in my size and still get a magnificent fit, and the skirt hits right at my bump with the band just above it. magnificent option for expecting mothers that can be worn after baby, the top is also snug enough to feel like it covers properly (could be too snug if you are large chested though).

The fabric clung to my body i expected it to flow and be breezy, it was too flimsy, the arms were too wide and overall for $100 this clothe didn't cut the mustard. i'm 5'7" 135 the clothe was long enough, just didn't flow very well.
These trousers are so fun! i use them to sleep in as they are see through. i had to size up as the waist band gave me muffin top. i normally wear a small and ended up getting the large.

Review_Title: Love the blue in this top
Review: I love the tie-dye look! i ordered the blue color in my usual size small. fit is tts. love it!. just a fyi: 1. on mine, one arm is a darker blue tie-dye, the other is very light (color variation). 2. the white band on the mock-neck doesn't give much, so be careful when putting on/taking off.  i think it's pricey, but ordered during the promo so that made it better. it came yesterday, put it on w/ my washed blue skinny jeans, out to dinner we went!

This is the most comfortable beautiful clothe/cover up. i can't believe the sale price. when i ordered, my reg m was not available so i ordered a small. it fits except the top button (36c). i just called and got a m since there was one available today online. hoping it ships! so impressed with this! i'll wear in summer and spring with a white slip underneath.

I know a lot of folks thought this top was too big/boxy, but i'm pretty slim up top with a big booty (quintessential pear shape), and i think the shape is totally flattering. your mileage may vary, but with free returns i'd just try it on first.  i sized down one size, which helped, and got the raspberry  colored one. i adore the color -- it's impossibly vibrant, and beautiful for spring summer or fall. the eyelets don't have any cloth underneath, just bare skin,  but they're so small that i don

Love this tank! the purple motif is gorgeous, and the carbon color is a rich dark gray with a slight blue tinge. at 5'4" / 130# with a fairly proportionate torso to leg ratio, i sometimes need a petite in tops like this to avoid the armholes being too long. in this top i found the petite small too short, but the regular small was excellent. the waist hits right above my natural waist, the hem is just a skosh lower than the model photo, and the armholes are the right length. beautiful flattering cu

Review_Title: Seems to run a bit small
Review: I love the length of this and that i can wear it with skinny jeans or leggings, but it does seem to run a little small and it is not as long as on the model. i do think it is a cute addition to my wardrobe though.

I knew i would love these trousers because of the cute sailor styling, but the unusual green color. i am 5'5" and thought i would be stepping on them, but i am fine. they are longer than the picture with the model on the website which i expected, but they are fine. the fabric is beautiful and i can't wait to wear them with my white-on-white sneakers. i will also mix it up with sandals. i wrote below that my style is bohemian, but truthfully i clothe in all the ways listed below...classic, romantic,

I'd been eyeing this clothe since i first saw it in the clothe catalog when it came out. when i saw it in person, it was just as beautiful as i remembered! i'm about 140 lbs and usually wear a size s or m, but i tried the s on and decided to size down to an xs, because the linen flowy fabric lays a bit wide when on the body; however, the s would have worked, too! i'd say size down if you prefer your clothes a tiny bit more fitted. the fabric is beautiful and lightweight, even though there is more

This is a beautiful top, the fit is very flattering. i'm tall with broad shoulders and the sleeves hit just above my elbow. i wear it on the weekends and to work...very versatile. i washed it in the washing machine and hung to dry, it's the same size and no fading..not sure about the others below with shrinkage issues. highly recommend it!

Review_Title: Pretty clothe - for the right skin tone
Review: This clothe is easy to wear, lined and feels like it could be a wonderful summer staple. i love that it's so colorful. but for some reason, the pops of color on the white background did not look magnificent on my very pale skin. i'm sure on someone else this will be beautiful. i also thought it ran just slightly large in the bust (although, to be fair, i am small-chested).

My wardrobe craves lush detail-rich clothees like this beautiful maxi.  knowing that the clothe is expensive and made of all synthetic fabric, i took the plunge and purchased the largest of my size range.  i've noticed that most indian labels commissioned by retailer fit tighter in my chest/shoulders, so i'm glad i trusted my instincts and bought the 12p as it fits excellently on my 36dd chest and wide shoulders.  this is not a casual clothe--there are sequins, beads and rosettes decorating the bodice.
Wouldn't have given them a second look but tried them on in store of a whim. love, love!!

This shirt is gorgeous. i bought it for my engagement party and got lots of compliments. the only thing negative was that the particular shirt i bought had one of the stones on the sleeve that the prongs were bent so it snagged the beautiful embroidery on the front of the shirt.. of course my local retailer exchanged it for a excellent new one without hassle. it's an expensive shirt but excellent for a special occasion.

I am 5'8" and 130 lbs and bought a size s. it fits, but is not as roomy as it appears in the model and the sleeves are not as long. the collar fits strangely on me. the deal breaker was that the sweater is not soft, but is itchy and kind of coarse. i am returning this one.

This is a beautiful beaded shirt. the quality seems good. i just didn't like the shoulders. they are pleated and puffy. the picture doesn't really show them very well. also the collar is a little floppy. i was hoping it would have an option to stand up but that is not the case. the beading is well done and looks to be stable. i just thought it ran a little large and the shoulders looked puffy. i returned it.
I like this shirt and think its very feminine.

Review_Title: As pictured, but not slimming as i hoped
Review: These are cute, comfy and just as pictured; a soft greenish-gray but i didn't find them to be super flattering on me, or at least not slimming in my view. i'm 5'3" about 105 lbs., and got them in s/m which fit just right, but they do go all the way up to my true waist. they are "tube legs", meaning they're not contoured tights. so there's excess fabric at the toe (it'd be all bunched in flats) and there's a tiny bit of looseness at the ankle. there's also no distinguishable front or back (and no
Ordered med petite. love the print & design but it runs really big more like a large and length of top is not flattering . returning

I love the look of this clothe but the length feels a little awkward which might be my height (5'4"). i'm thinking about having it altered, not sure if i will do that or return it. i love the colors and the back cut out, it may be a better length for taller individuals.

I got this top in white/rust and it is darling. the lining keeps it from being too see through. the bell sleeves add style without getting in the way thanks to the shorter length. i get many compliments each time i wear it. i am 5'1", 103 lbs and take xs- fit was true to size.

Review_Title: Exactly what i was looking for!
Review: These trousers are so comfy and excellently casual without being sloppy. they're the excellent summer trousers.
These trousers are so excellent, i bought 3 pairs. excellent for casual friday's, a night out or the weekend.

Review_Title: Adorable take from the typical flannel!
Review: Love this top b/c it's very feminine! got this at 20% off and it's very flattering!

I'm liking this jumpsuit, it's not love but it's definitely a like. i typically avoid the elevenses brand since it never seems to fit right but i gave this a try. i usually take a l in other retailer brands but sized up to xl in this and it was a good choice. first off, the material is awesome, super soft and drapey. but i agree with another reviewer who mentioned the zipper being short and it being tough to get into. i found that to be right on, makes it a little hard to get your arms through the

I purchased this piece in store in a size small, ivory. i am usually a size medium but the small fit excellent! material is soft, lightweight, and very comfortable. collar can be buttoned to create more of a turtleneck look or unbuttoned to create less of the same look. i'm so glad i grabbed this because it is a magnificent cold weather staple and i doubt they will last long!!

I bought the mosaic pattern in a small. the pattern and colors look much better in person. the design and quality are solid. the top runs small. it is difficult to put on, but stays in place. i would recommend.

This is interesting material- very heavy and smooth. it is fits magnificent, i was able to size down. the color is a brown/copper and should match most things. overall, it is a magnificent skirt for colder weather since it is thick material.
Love this clothe. excellent for spring and fall. magnificent material and well made. lovey design. the clothe has a built in slip.
The top was very nice and i liked the material. my problem was getting it on with the cami being attached to the top. it took me a while to figure it out. and for that reason alone i returned it.
Not a pretty blouse - it's quite utilitarian in design - and it runs enormous.

This is a very cute clothe! the sweater material is not itchy at all. i love the bell sleeve and how the seam at the top of the bell matches up to the waistline of the clothe. good quality and well made. i am 5' 9" tall and this clothe falls just above my knees. so for me, it's the excellent length. i bought the black clothe and i look forward to wearing it throughout the fall and winter.

I had high hopes for this top but once again it is just a big boxy too much material top. i get the style but if it adds 10lbs to your middle area its not for me. it is a thin material so it does hang nice.

Love, love these jeans. being short they come right to my ankle. super soft and don?t require any hemming. i ordered my typical jean size of 26 and they fit like a glove. would love to have these in black and grey.

This shirt is amazing. it's soft, comfortable. i can't speak yet as to how well it will hold up but i plan on wearing it a lot. the cut is magnificent, the shirt flutters away from under the empire waist line and the nylon patch in the back, creating a flattering shape without clinging anywhere. the sleeves are nice, long, and fitted.

this shirt will work magnificent as a winter/fall simple piece but the texture, color, and contrast detail in the back make it interesting on its own. very versatile.

the col

I love this clothe. the fit is spectacular and if there were any problems with the hook and eyes in the front coming undone as stated in previous reviews, it has been corrected! the clothe does not come undone and it moves beautifully with you walking, sitting and bending. i wore this to a holiday party and the color is just amazing! a coppery and brown/gold pattern. very flattering! i will purchase more byron lars clothees for certain!
Sheer and lightweight. excellent for summer. magnificent detail could not justify paying full price.
This clothe was a disappointment. not black, but brown. and it was very oddly made, with a weird, seam right across the belly. on its way back...

This clothe looks better in person. nice navy with subtle pattern - looks super cute with a really lightweat pale yellow sweater! i thought that wiastband area would hit in a funky spot (my problem area) but it doesnt and looks magnificent. super comfortable and i love this neckline. also has a decent lining so no bra necessary if youre cool with that. i have packed on some "after 50" lbs and wear a 12-14 shirt and 10-12 trouser and the large is roomy enough.i received a number of compliments and let's fa
I love this shirt!!! the front is a little shorter than i thought it would be, but overall, it is so cute and comfy!! wish they had it in more colors!!

This is such a cute and flattering top. it isn't a style i would normally gravitate to, but i liked the color so i thought i'd try it on. i ended up trying on the medium because they were out of my usual large and it fits magnificent. it drapes really nicely and looks super cute with jeans and booties. the little stripe of ladder lace around the middle is a bit see thru but not revealing. it's a nice top for transitioning from summer to fall.

I decided to splurge. i would not normally spend $200 for a pair of jeans, but when they went on sale, i decided to go for it. i am so glad that i did. mother has a customer for life. these jeans are the best by far. i normally wear a size 4 (27) in most jeans, but wear a 28 in j brand and some others. so i was a little nervous by previous reviewers not just on this website. i decided to go with the 28 since in mother brand this is actually a 4/6. they fit magnificent!

I'm 5'1 and a tad busty and this sweater i found to be most flattering. i saw it i. the store on was drawn to it. i love the shimmer but perhaps that's because the holiday feel is already in the air in nyc. the m fit magnificent in both length pans width. it looked magnificent with my straight black jeans and boots. i felt it made me look thin. thankful i bought it on a discount day! it's a fabulous sweater.

I returned this clothe because the material is so flimsy and thin. i was expecting higher quality, especially for the price. i was disappointed. it is a pretty clothe and fit magnificent, but i felt like i was wearing tissue paper.
This top is soft, flattering, modest enough to wear to work, but subtly sexy (and i'm amply endowed at 36d). i just wish i'd gotten one in every color.

Review_Title: So cute, but not for me
Review:
This suit is so adorable! i love the retro style and the two patterns and i really wish it worked for me. the suit is comfy, seems well made and fit nicely. but, although it fit technically, i don't like the way it cuts me off at the thigh. it's not flattering for me at all. 

the suit is kind of a neoprene material, so it's thicker than a normal bathing suit, so i think even though it isn't lined, it might not be see-through, but i didn't get it wet to test it out. in terms of fit, i think it
Love wearing these, i see them getting a lot of wear in the winter

Review_Title: Not for me... and not at this price
Review: I thought this top would be a nice addition to my fall wardrobe, and while the color didn't disappoint, everything else did. it's a very loose slub so it's very see through and thin, i'd have to wear a cami under it. also the tie front has a very high slit! like it went almost halfway up the shirt and definitely would have shown skin unless you layered the shirt. i do think this top would be a cute throw on top for yoga/ gym wear, but definitely not at this price. pass for me sadly...

Yep, i used to have a nice body, but now have the dreaded menopause stomach... and some excess baggage. this clothe was very flattering. wore it today, easter sunday and had literally a dozen people seek me out to tell me how magnificent the clothe was or how nice i looked. it is a bright pink, think pepto bismol! heavy brocade type fabric plus a magnificent cut = hiding my stomach and rear!! plus the lower neckline emphasized my nicer areas! very pleased to find a clothe for us older women to look fresh and f
Very good quality. love the length of it. i wore it with a belt, since on me without it looked a bit too big. i bought the blue one.
I love it. the fabric is a heavier denim and it has a nice stretch. being tall i appreciate the length. the sizes run a bit large; i'm usually a 10/12 but the 8 is excellent.
Completely love this clothe! fits true to size and makes anyone look fabulous
This top is excellent!! i am small chested and it actually makes me look like i have a chest! plus for me!! it's also magnificent for work and casual.

I completely adore this shirt, it is such a comfortable material and goes magnificent with a pair of jeans! i love how it fits tightly in the sleeves and flows out at the bottom just the right amount. i highly recommend adding this to your wardrobe.
Nice print and comfortable shirt.

I loved this clothe and it fit magnificent on me: 5'7, 115 lbs, wore an xs. it was a little tighter than i wish, but the s would have been too loose. unfortunately, when i received the clothe the arms were already pilling. it is made of a mix of polyester, and while it's machine washable (yay), i can imagine this clothe would be pilling very easily, and i wish the fabric was a higher quality for the price, so i returned it.

I got both colors as i'm not sure when a style that is so excellent for me will come around again. these are beautifully designed and very slimming. they are described as crops but i am 5'5" tall and the length is excellent, approximately 1/2 above the heel of my shoe. no alterations required!!! usually retailer trousers are extremely long for me but these citizens of humanity cords are the excellent length. the colors are just as pictured-i was surprised by another review that described the navy as

Love this top!!
magnificent colors and fits magnificent
reasonably priced

I ordered this clothe for my daughter. she wore it to a wedding and it was beautiful. looks just as it does in photo. fabric is a nice weight and hangs magnificent. my daughter had her hair done and look right out of an retailer catalog. well made true to size beautiful clothe!!!!!!!

I tried on this romper when it was still full price and loved it, but wasn't sure i wanted to splurge at the time. at the new sale price this romper is definitely worth it for the quality and style. i am 5'2''/103lbs and the xs fits pretty well, but truthfully an xxs would have been better if it existed. the top part of the romper (above the waist) is a bit long--- the waistband hits maybe an inch or 2 below my natural waist, but perhaps this can be tailored. overall very happy with this purchas
Material is too thin and quality is poor
I was so impressed with the style & boning on the sides for the excellent fit! it's truly a classic staple in your closet for that lbd!!

I ordered the clothe on-line. this clothe looked pretty, the material was soft and comfortable, the length was excellent, but the zipper was totally out of place. it bulged out in a weird way which made it look like the clothe was torn. i had to return the clothe. i normally don't see a problem at this level in retailer clothes.

I adore this clothe, the excellent summer clothe that you can clothe up or down. the color is vibrant and the fabric flows and feels fantastic against your skin. i love that you can still wear a strapless bra with it, but with the adjustable shoulder ties you can have it go as low as you want for a more sexy look. the bottom hem is this super cute fringe, so fun and feminine. and while it is a loose fitting clothe i did not feel like my figure was drowned out by the fullness of the fabric. this clothe

Review_Title: Puts me right in the mood for spring!
Review: The peach color is beautiful on this coat, and the quality and comfort is excellent. i wear a medium and the sizing was spot-on. i may get in another color if a sale comes around again.

Lovely feel to this almost-cowl neck turtleneck. it's quite thin, and has 3/4 length sleeves, so it won't keep you warm. but the fabric is soft, the ribbing is flattering, and the fit is loose without feeling frumpy. overall, a good staple that's a bit more interesting. the mauve-ish color looks magnificent with grays.

Love love love this jumpsuit! normally i stay away from jumpsuits because i hate to have to completely unclothe to use the bathroom, but this was too cute to pass up. fits magnificent, extremely flattering to my athletic build, super comfy. it sort of looks like a maxi-clothe due to the wide legs. length was excellent. i am 5'3" and did not have to hem it.

Love the way this top layers under my coats and sweaters! so romantic and pretty. i am not experiencing the over pouf at the waist that a previous reviewer complained about. the fabric is slightly itchy and the top shipped to my house has misshapen shoulder bumps from the store hanger. all the beautiful styling pics done by retailer employees on ig is what made me want this blouse. whatever is going on with the model shot really really really does not represent how cute this top looks. in fact,
A truly gorgeous clothe. ran a little too small in the shoulders for me so i had to reorder the next size up. its is very long, but i won't hesitate to have it altered. it is stunning!

Review_Title: Pretty but don't like this fabric
Review: This is indeed a very flattering clothe and looks magnificent - unless you move in it. the fabric shows every little lump and bump on your body as you move and clings to tights (only a little but just enough to make it annoying). if you have any jiggle at all, i'd steer clear. would have definitely kept it if the fabric were different because the cut is amazing but alas.

This clothe has magnificent details and fit well on my hourglass shape. it just felt too covered up at the arms/shoulders, though. if the sleeves had been shorter or it had been sleeveless i think it would have felt a little more modern. the waistband on the one i tried on was also twisted, so you might want to check that before you buy. 

fit is tts. a little on the short side.

This clothe is pretty, but there were a few things i disliked.

the overclothe is fairly shapeless; however, the slip is fitted and well above the knee. since the overclothe is sheer, the shortness of the slip is visible the fabric of the overclothe felt rough on my skin. i did like the contrast of textures between the overclothe, the slip, and the lace. finally, as other reviewers have shared, the buttons are not functional, and the v-neck of the overclothe is deep. 

i recommend trying the clothe

I tried this clothe on today and ended up buying it. its a thicker material and looks better in person. more red and white striped with an uneven hem. the back of the clothe is a bit more like a swim suit. i probably is best for smaller chests. i'm guessing it runs a little bit big - as the medium fit nicely on me and lately i'm a large medium/small large.

Review_Title: Too short in length and boxy for me
Review: Just not my style. it is light and the color is lovely and summery. but the cut of the sweater just did not work at all for me. and it wasn't overly soft - though that wouldn't have mattered if it fit me better.

I am so glad i returned this clothe for a size down. i am 5'10", and 160 lbs (curvy and muscular build), and the medium was unexpectedly much too large on me. i returned it for a small, and oh my, it is excellent. i plan on wearing this to two summer weddings this year, and will then wear it for work. it really is a go-anywhere-do-anything sort of clothe.

Very attractive pattern and color. the black is so soft that it seems close to sepia. the length was fine. the fabric, meaning the clothe, is quite heavy for not having a lining except just around the bra area---even though the facing didn't successfully substitute for a bra in my opinion. the arm holes are cut in quite a bit so one would have to find the appropriate bra.
the clothe runs very large. i ordered an xs petite. it was about 2 inches too large (4 inches total) on either side across the
One of my first rompers, it's super cute. i need to get used to the puffy sleeves but my husband also really likes it and he's definitely got an opinion about these things.
This does run a little large, but it's light and flattering for me. the material is a very light/thin chambray, but it's also lined.

This is a cool relaxed style with the benefit of an open neckline to add a bit of femininity. i tried on the faded blue and striped colors in the store. the faded blue goes well with the style, but the stripe is cute too. the sleeves are quite long and too tight to roll up, so if you are petite like me you will definitely want to order the petite size- and probably even those you who are in between petites and regular sizes. the sleeves may also be too narrow for some people.
The color, heft, style & quality are excellent. i did go down one size since my usual size was too large in the waist.
Just a cute, casual tee that i grabbed on sale, but i love the bow in the back! something unique for an otherwise plain tee!

This top is so much prettier on. you can clothe it up or down. it does run a tad large. i'm 5'7" and 145 lbs. i am usually in between a small and medium but usually a medium. i went for the small on this and i loved the fit of it. still pretty flowy and the medium would have been just too big. it is a tunic so it runs kind of long. a tiny bit too long for me but i will still wear it a lot.

I tried this on and think it will look magnificent with leggings and boots. it's very flattering without being too tight or too baggy. some of retailer's clothes are just too full and baggy for me and make me look large. i am 5'4" 140 lbs and ordered the medium which fits excellently. i ordered both the navy and yellow, but the yellow has not arrive yet.

This is my second pair of pilcro chinos. their trousers and shorts are so soft--even those who love to run around trouserless might relent. this brand tends to run a bit large so if you like your trousers form fitting you may want to size down.

Tried this after missing out on the very similar terra max clothe where petite sizes sold out. the medium is excellent and the style can be clotheed up. wore it on a day out and two strangers complimented me on the 'magnificent clothe'!

I made the mistake of ordering a medium instead of large and have the same fit issues as other reviewers. it is tight in the back through the shoulders, so if you're considering it i would stick with your larger of your size range. the print is beautiful as is the fabric. it looked okay on me from the side but i am short waisted. it fell at the excellent length on me too. there's just something about the fit that didn't wow me so i don't plan to reorder, but i do think it would be lovely on thinne
Beautifully made trousers and on trend with the flared crop. so much cuter in person. love these!
Love this t-shirt. i rarely pay full price but love this and it's already out of stock. fits excellent. i tend to be short waisted so the length is excellent.
I completely love this clothe. beautiful, flattering shape with flowing light weight fabric. i'm so in love with this color. a magnificent clothe for a special night.

I love this clothe! i was worried it would swallow my petite frame but it is flowy yet flattering. i have worn it to several different occasions. it looks magnificent with tights and boots and just flats. the lace detailing makes it unique.

The quality of the shirt is top notch. the fabric is lightweight and comfortable.
now the cons:
this top is cut like a square and fits wide which is not apparent in the photo. definitely not for me.

Beautiful clothe and so delicately well made!
5'1" 95lb - xxs petite or the smallest size possible worked for me
it accentuates one's curvy body and covers up any excess skin in the belly area. i could eat on freely at a formal occasion. words just cannot describe how beautiful this clothe is.
Everything about this top is excellent! quality is magnificent which is number one in my book. color is awesome! excellent color for fall, summer and spring! a must have!!

Love,love, love this. it is so different and unique. definitely not something you will see in any other store. wore it last week and have never received so many compliments on one piece. so retailer!!!!!! it was very warm and comfortable. i did wear a turtleneck under this, because of reviews of itching. i did not have any problems.

Saw this online and went in to try on. fit magnificent and is true to size, but i should have known there would be issues as three out of six on the rack had the sewn in tags were all but hanging by a thread. i bought this for my bachelorette weekend in napa and when i put this on i noticed the straps had a few threads coming out and i thought, better get this to the seamstress as soon as i get home to secure the straps. well, literally five minutes into the car ride to the wineries i noticed the seam
Terrible fit for a longer torso.  runs small in hip and lining, huge in the waist.  not good for an hourglass figure!

Review_Title: Elegant and casual at the same time
Review: This shirt can look very elegant thanks to the nice duffs and hidden button line. the material is pleasantly substancial and very soft. the only thing i did not like is that the bottom button broke it two pieces the tirst tme i buttoned it. no spare buttons included, but as the buttons are not visible i think i can find a similar one to replace it. not big enough of an issue to return,

Magnificent pair of work slacks with a flare. wear these with boots give a very rich look. super flattering cut and flat waist.
highly recommend these for fall through winter!

Review_Title: Get it before it's gone girls!
Review: I'm 5'7 and 137 pounds and i tried on this clothe in the store. i got the small as it has a little more material in the medium and the small fits like a glove. this clothe is magnificent quality and feels good, looks good and can be clotheed up or down. like the model in the picture i like the flats with this clothe. high quality fashion and total comfort on a hot summer day. go anywhere with this clothe and you look like a million dollars. one more little hidden detail it has a detachable slip underneath

I got this clothe on line - i ordered several sizes after reading the reviews. it does run small. i usually wear a 2 in clothees and needed a 4. i love the fit and it is a beautiful clothe - however the little black pin dots are easy to snag. i wore it once - didn't feel like i was wild that night - ha! - but when i took it off that night it had 3 places where it had snags - ugh!

I ordered the neutral one with the fine stripe. it will layer nicely with neutral colored sweaters and blazers. the fabric is soft. the quality is good. the neck is cool that you can wear it two ways. overall, it is a good top. i think it's a little clingy, which highlights every flaw, in the back especially. i wouldn't size up. i still think it fits tts.

The blouse looked better on the model. i liked the way it fit, just not how it looks. the fabric made me itch, which was one of the other reasons i returned it. i wished it had looked good and the fabric didn't make me itch. i really liked the unique look to the shirt.

I was extremely disappointed when this arrived. it's nothing like the red color shown, rather it's a very dull reddish color. as other reviews have suggested, it is very thin and runs large. i have to return.

Love the colors!! i'm 5'2" and the regular goes down to my ankles like a petite clothe would normally. if you get petite, it would be as high as it is on the model. the material is comfortable and i can see this as a pretty versatile piece.

I have this color also in the grey - flattering, interesting shirt. i have think hips but a fuller waist, the vertical lines of this shirt design suggest otherwise. magnificent to pair with torn up skinny jeans! love the petite line now in portland.

I needed a tee refresher, i had a good feeling about this one so ordered all three colors when they were on a promo, and i'm not disappointed. the neckline is different and works magnificent to emphasize your preferred necklace. the tee holds shape after washing and drying. my preferred is the blue which i like to wear with dark wash jeans as styled on the model. the white has a cream tinge to it and i'm able to wear it with a nude bra without looking indecent. there is a cute little button detail at th
Tiny collar and short bodice length. lovely fabric, soft and silky.

I really liked the style of this top but it's way oversized! i'm petite and drowned in this top even though i got it in an xs. the material is nice but i can't see i had a feeling for the cut because it runs so big. this one is going back to the store!
This vest is excellent! i live in florida aka where it is hot almost every day of the year. it makes a magnificent layer piece, but isn't too warm!
Love the fit. nice and warm and good quality material.
I completely love this coat. as a 36 year old woman, i want items that are on trend but don't look juvenile. this coat hits the nail on the head for me.

I ordered the medium pink in a size small. the color is more of a hot pink. it runs small through the shoulders and bust (i'm 34-d). i like that it covers your bum and the detail down the back. but it is going back, i may try a medium petite in a different color.

I usually wear size 4 for clothe, but this is the first time ever i have to go down to size 0, and it fits excellently. well made, maybe a bit stiff around armholes, nothing important. i love the length as i don't like to show my knees. magnificent color combinations, although this supposed to be a summer clothe, it looks magnificent for fall, just need to add a coat, a pair of boots and i'm good to go, feeling pretty!

Nice dark indigo with minimal fading. medium denim thickness, with stretch. i bought size 25 and it is snug, but doesn't squeeze. my hip is 34.5" and 28" waist. love these. i will be getting them hemmed up to ankle length. i am 5' 5" and find the little kick out at the ankle (from getting them shortened) to be very cute and classy. if you keep them full length to your shoe, they will have a slightly baggier bootcut look. these remind me of my point sur hightower straight leg jeans, with maybe an
This trench coat is the best fit and feel-true to size and cozy! excellent material!

Review_Title: Very stretchy fabric has fit issues...
Review: I love the color and cut of the trousers. they are more a dark indigo twill than a jean, to be sure. a fit issue is how the front pockets pop out because of the excessive stretchiness of the fabric. i wear them and love them, but stitched the front pockets closed to avoid the unflattering pop-out pockets.

I saw an outfit post of a gorgeous lady in this clothe so i had to try it. it's so flattering and well constructed, if a little longer than i usually prefer. i'll just have to wear pumps with it. i don't have the right bra so i just pinned the straps to a bit of ribbon in front to pull them underneath the clothe. it does have pockets, also. i ordered the 12 and it fits beautifully. for reference i have a 40" bust and 33" waist.
Tts. i'm 38c, 8-10 and m fits just right. nice and fitted at the top, flowy skirt. i got the cream and love the skirt pattern.

I purchased the white in the store in a size 6. 34d. i ordered the black online in a 6 and the lining was a bit snug. (i can maybe remove the black lining) however, i really like how the peplum looks. the v neck and bra friendly design are a excellent marriage. i see wearing these through the fall with a denim coat or cardigan. for now i am enjoying how floaty and feminine i feel. i think this is a excellent top for women with a larger chest as it gives a nice shape but doesn't look maternity or b

I started stalking this clothe when i saw it on a store's instagram feed, and i was so thrilled to get it in the mail. however, i ordered it before reviews started popping up, and i was concerned it would not fit in the bust. however, when it arrived, the fit is excellent. it's not exactly loose in the bust, but there also isn't any pilling. the high-waisted nature was also suited to my shape. i'm usually between a 4 and a 6, and the 6 was magnificent in this clothe, and a excellently joyful length--appropr

I love this clothe! it's super comfortable and can easily be clotheed down with a jean coat and some sandals, or clotheed up with leather and a good pair of heels. the fit is spot on and very slimming, and i like that the length isn't too short as well.
I love this clothe. the quality of the material is very nice - good weight and softness. the clothe hides my baby belly and feels really comfortable on. i got tons of compliments when i wore it!

This skirt is wonderful! the price point seems a bit high for the average office gal, but the quality is impeccable. i really enjoy looking at myself in the mirror when wearing this skirt. it can be clotheed up, clotheed down, worn during all seasons. the design/pattern is artsy and whimsical without being too "out-there" (unless you want it to be, of course!). the fit is true to size, and the delicate details are just lovely.
Cute shirt. i'm 5'3" and 120 lbs. size s fits excellently. a little shorter in the back than i'd like but magnificent for layering.

I tried on this shirt in the small and the xxs - both were ridiculously wide. they were also both cut really short - the peplum simpleally started right below my boobs, though the small was maybe a little bit longer than the eex. the stripes are really cute, the cut is just very strange. 

for reference, the black and white is the small, the taupe is the xxs.

When i got this top in the mail i was impressed by the colors. they were very vibrant and i loved the feel of the material as well. however the top did not look good on. i have an hourglass figure with a dd+ bust, and the peplum just made me look like i didn't have a waist. the arm holes were also very big and showed my bra. overall i think this is a very cute top, but would probably be better on women with more athletic figures.
Product was exactly what i wanted. very soft, but very wrinkled upon arrival. will wear it with skinny jeans or even leggings.

Clothe appears to be slim fit, but that's far from the case. usually wear an xs regular because i have a long torso for my 5'3", but it just hung on me like a heavy sack. i have a hard time finding clothees now that i'm not working and like to have a couple on hand for all purpose occasions--weddings, memorials, special occasions. i hoped this one would meet my needs. disappointed.

I love how comfortable this fits and the fantastic pops of color. goes with just about every slip and tank clothe i own! a excellent lightweight clothe or layering vest with my hot weather wardrobe. can't wait to take this with me on vacation!

Tried it on a whim and could not leave it behind. 5/4', 135, size 4-6, took a 6. something about the pocket placement, fabric weight, cut, and color make this one a real winner for me. plan to wear it with a creme windowpane coat.

Review_Title: I wish they came in more colors
Review: I'm 5'10" and have athletic legs. these jeans are so comfy, long enough, and look good on the booty. the photo is deceiving as they are much longer. i wish they carried more colors. it's hard to find a jean i really like and i really like these.
Beautiful skirt! clothe up or down! colors are lovely and enable one to wear many different tops. lightweight. excellent for casual or summertime work.

Review_Title: Went out and bough it in a second color
Review: I read the mixed reviews on this tee but i think the fit is flattering and comfortable. i sized down as i do in many retailer tops and it is fitted in the shoulder and chest and then widens away at the waist. the length hits me at the hip--i have worn it layered with a longer tank underneath.

These are a soft and lightweight material. the photos here don't show the tiny beautiful pattern on them. look closely through the photos and you'll see it. way better than a normal pair of black summer trousers. these are very log so i plan to hem to flats to wear for a more casual look but they have the ability to go either way. the pockets flare out a big so i'm going to have those sewn shut when i do the hemming. it is a higher west so magnificent for that look or to wear with some cropped style summ

The picture does not do this swing sweater any justice. first of all, the colors are much more vibrant in person than in the picture. the description says it is a "yellow motif"; there is completely no yellow in it. a bit of khaki in two rows of plaid, but no yellow. the predominant colors are a rich maroon, which is so popular this season, some bright blue and salmon colors, which does not come out in the picture. rich and beautiful.

secondly, the sweater is sassy on -- just plain fun. i am

This tunic has really cute detail. it is hard to see in online photos, but there is dark brownish beading over the embroidery. the fabric is not as soft as i would have liked, but it's still a keeper because of the two patterns, embroidery and beading. also, it is long and does run large, but i think the measurements given in the description are accurate. it is a tunic after all! i ordered an xs petite, and it will be very cute with leggings and boots.
So pretty & comfortable! love it!

Review_Title: Image does not do it justice
Review: This is the cutest sweater. i bought it today in black. i cannot wait to wear it. it is a lovely, distinctive knit & just the right weight to layer as shown with a white blouse or with a turtleneck. i tried both the xs and s; and i decided to go with the s as it still emphasized that i have waist, but i could layer it nicely. i am 5'4", 130 lb. you can always count on angel of the north for magnificent style.
Cute shirt, nice for layering.

Did want to love this coat because i have so much black and white, but i saw it on my daughter and had to have it. i usually take a large, but i needed an extra large, and the fit is magnificent. the material is not too heavy, so i know it can wear it year round by adjusting the weight of tee underneath.

I'm always on the hunt for good white blouses to pair with business casual attire or everyday wear. this was a magnificent tank. i love the fabric. it's nice and sturdy and you don't have to worry about wearing a cami beneath it. this fabric does wrinkle some so bear that in mind. i really like the shape of the top near the shoulders. it's a magnificent conservative cut. the little criss cross detail on the back adds a bit of charm to the top. i would definitely recommend this to others.

Lovely sweater. it fits baggy and form fitted somehow. i like the multi-fabric look. however, the main body of the sweater does shed!!! like, i just held it up to my body to look at it in the mirror and the shirt i had on was covered. haven't washed it yet, so can't speck to that, but i'm guessing it will lose some of that in the wash.

The photo doesn't do it justice. the detail on the neckline is adorable and looks fantastic with jeans. texture is light and gauze-y, but i don't find it too see-though. sizing was tough- i'm 5'10 but thin on top- usually between xs & s, and went with the xs on this (ordered both to try), sacrificing some length for a more flattering width. magnificent for the sale price!!!
These trousers run small by two sizes or so. nice material, color true to picture.
Very comfortable to wear, love the overall look of this clothe.

You have to try it on to see, it fits really well and looks stylish. i love it.
my only concern is the fabric is rather stretchy, not sure if it will hold up well in the long run.

I ordered the taupe version of this tee, which was a medium brown with black stripes. the fabric felt itchy and rough, and was pretty sheer for not being light colored. i didn't care for the fit, which was extremely boxy and wide; from the picture, i expected an a-line fit, but not a wide drop with webbed underarms. i ordered 2 sizes, and could have worn the smaller if i'd kept this tee. it runs on the larger side. what astounded me most was that both tees i ordered were sewn with completely cro

These embroidered jeans are very nice. they also exist in a lighter wash which i prefer because it shows off the embroidery better. the embroidery is dark navy which is almost not visible in these darker jeans. i guess if you like something very subtle these jeans are for you. i personally would have like a more contrasting color either white or red for the embroidery. these jeans are loose and expand with wear, it is excellently ok to size down.
I agree with the other reviews - runs small. would have been excellent if it actually was comfortable. waistband doesn't stretch all the way around. bummer.

This romper originally caught my eye in the beginning of the summer with the sweet back bow detail. i had originally planned to purchase for a trip to paris in june, but waited until the last minute and my size wasn't immediately available at my local store. i had honestly forgotten about the romper until i noticed it recently in the sale section ... at that price i couldn't pass it up. again it wasn't available in my size at the store location, but they were able to ship it w/in a few days. i p

These trousers fit comfortably and are really nice on! they're not too bulky and can be worn in a casual way and/or with a formal look. i just wish black jeans didn't always have that odd rubber smell. other than that, these are magnificent!

I am short waisted and i still thought the pleats started too high on me. also, the whole thing was a little bit big. i always wear a medium, but in this top the shoulders and everything was just a bit large. since i bought it online, i couldn't size down. the fabric was a nice quality.

Ladies don't let this beauty get away. never paid much attention to it on-line but went into local retailer today and it was returned by someone. i couldn't get it on fast enough. it is gorgeous. runs tts. i took the small, for reference i am 36c top and petite. this will work on any body type. you won't be sorry. well worth the money for the style and fabric.
This clothe has become a preferred in my rotation. the cut and print flatter my body and accentuate my waist. the print is subtle enough to pair with bold accessories.

This top may be labeled as a part of a sleep set but i threw a cami under it, styled it with skinny jeans and a top knot and this became a very effortless/chic so cal look. love that pop of hot pink too! i went up a size for a little extra wiggle room across my shoulders. overall this is a magnificent summer top!
This is better than the original tla t shirts from last summer. better quality/not sheer. magnificent fit! i bought both the white and the purple. love tla tees!
Love the tee but it is very thin. best for layering

Review_Title: Really streeeeetches out so size down
Review:
These are my first pilcro. love the tuxedo seam and notch at the side, and the noni green is a verstaile, yet unusual green. thicker soft cotton with just 3% spandex.
.
ordered sizes 25, 26 and 27 regular which are a excellent full length for me. i'm 5'2", currently 33-25-37, longwaisted and pear shape. i wear a 26 in ag stevie cords which are snug first, then stretch to a excellent size and often a size 27 in their less stretchy stevie jeans.
.
in these the 27 were so big at the waist that they sli
This clothe is beautiful. fabric is thin but the details are excellent.

I'm curvy on the bottom, and i think this is quite flattering for curves. i'd definitely advise sizing up on this one. because it's flared, i can wear it higher up on my waist. but that's not ideal, and i think a bigger size will fit better. it's a very lightweight fabric and does wrinkle easily. the color i got was a faded denim blue. this is a lot lighter than what i'd call "dark denim".
It's a beautiful skirt. the color is vivid and the skirt is flattering.

Magnificent coat for night time in the south this time of year ... very nice fabric, magnificent classic style with a little twist... love retailerplogy ... being an older female, sometimes things can look boring ....i love to clothe in fun clothes ... finding something that will work for all ages and that is a "little out side the lines " is very nice!!!!
I know i will be wearing this a lot! i wore it on tuesday for work with some clotheier trousers and opened, i wore it on sat and sun for long walks :) magnificent piece

Review_Title: Nice addition to my fall wardrobe
Review: Well fitted kinda slouchy sweater. matches photo and product description. looking forward to cooler temps!
The print doesn't necessarily works for everybody.
I loved this blouses when i saw it on-line, but when i saw it in on me it looked totally different. it runs really large and i didn't like the material of blouse.

I completely love the way this skirt looks and fits. i have a smaller waist and larger hips so it is hard to find a pencil skirt that fits, but this skirt fits magnificent! the material has some stretch to it but is still thick and looks really nice. the colors are beautiful, i bought it in the "red" which is really just multi-colored. i want it in the green now, too!

This pair of age stevie capris is everything that i could want in a pair of jeans!! soft, sexy (without being skintight) and the excellent color of blue!! i am 5'3"/108 lbs and the 25 was a excellent fit!! these hit about an inch above my ankle and looked amazing (think legs that look a mile long!!) with booties one night and nude heels the next!

The clothe is as magnificent 'in person' as it shows in the pictures. if you usually buy petite keep in mind that you may like the regular size if you prefer the llonger look. if you prefer a shorter length go for the petite size if this is what you usually get. i am 5.3, 117 lbs and tried both, xs regular and xs petite. i ultimately went with the regular size as i preferred the longer length.
everything about this clothe is excellent, the color, the material, the cut. highly recommended as a transition
This clothe fits excellently and is travels wonderfully through the seasons! the color and cut is really flattering and flows nicely!

The fabric is really soft and the cardi has a cute and comfy slouchy, loose fit. reminds me of free people cardis with the extra long sleeves and loose fit. magnificent to throw on over workout clothes or with jeans and a tee shirt. easy piece. would size down. i'm getting lots of use out of it.
The clothe is beautiful but runs small so unfortunately i have to return it.

I'm surprised to be unhappy with this... reading all the rave reviews. but, i had a different experience with it. the cut is funky... and seemed much more tapered on me than on the model in the picture. i think if you're very slim, this may work well, but for any curves or hips... not so flattering... imo. i think it's a pretty coat... but not for me... it's going back. and ps... i paid $448 for it and see it's on sale for about 1/2 that just a week later. the discounted price may be a good de

I usually wear an xxsp in retailer brands. i bought this coat in a regular size 0 and it fits like a glove. even the sleeves are the right length. it really accents my narrow waist. i imagine it runs very small for those who wear regular sizes. if you are petite this is the coat for you. the coat is unlined so i cant wear it in cold weather. it is very nice over a clothe with black boots and with skinny jeans. i receive complements every time i wear this item!

I didn't have high hopes for these, because things seem to 'ride' on me- but these stay put! and i love the adjustable sides... these are a pretty color, i ordered the raspberry and the silver grey and love both! i normally would not pay a ton for undies, but these are worth every dollar! i have a larger bottom, so purchased the large, but sometimes i can wear medium, so this is magnificent, being adjustable.

Like the previous reviewer, the biggest problem with this shirt is how short it is. i'm 5'4 and ordered a 12, which is usually what i wear at retailer. even only being 5'4, this shirt is much shorter than i anticipated. it fits everywhere else, though. i'm obsessed with the back so i'm going to keep it and wear it. i'd say it's worth it at the sale price.
Love the print of this fabric & the length. the buckles at the waist add a unique look so no belt necessary.

If you're not a petite and are reading this, read on :) i'm always on the lookout in the petite section because many times us fuller girls can fit into these. 
________
pros:
- tts for me. i'm normally a size 10/12 (m/l) in the regular sizes. i tried on the 12p and it fit everywhere excellently, especially at the bust in which i'm a 36c.
- fabric is on the thicker side, but that's what gives it this adorable shape, besides already being fit-and-flare.
- pockets :) i always lean towards clothee

I purchased this poncho online in the cream color. when it arrived i tried it on to decide whether or not to keep it. i immediately went on line and purchased the taupe color , as well. thank goodness it didn't come in 5 more colors! this sweater is so versatile and beautifully detailed, plus it is very soft. you take one look at it and you know the quality! i think you could wear this clotheed up or down and it would be excellent either way. i do agree, it is not quite as long as pictured , but pe

This coat is a real treasure and i could never have seen how substantial the embroidery is from the photo. also from the pic the coat looks like a thin cotton, but on the contrary it is a wonderful weight with a feel like denim. the embroidery is a wonderful texture like heavy string or thin rope so it really has dimension... . i loved it so much i got the sweatshirt also by the same designer. can't wait until cooler weather so i may live in it! also when you have it on for a bit it seems to

Review_Title: Looks magnificent, not the easiest to wear
Review: Love a gray sweater and this one is stunning. layered with a plaid tunic and worn to work, with many compliments. the only downside is the poncho shape, with the large wing like sleeves, makes it impossible to wear a coat over this sweater. if you wanted to wear in the winter cold, you would need a cape. also not an ideal piece if you need to lift your arms for any reason. keeping that in mind though, i still really like it for days when i want to look cute and won't be don't a ton of moving aro
Magnificent soft tee. got the blue and really love the color.
This clothe will unfortunately be returned...so cute online and looks like a sack in person.  runs very large, arm holes are very low.  not flattering.

This is a truly beautiful coat that goes with so much - clotheed up or even over something casual. and either way it is comfortable without looking frumpy, soft and conforms to your shape without being sloppy. i would say it does have more of a 'sweater' feel to it but with the zipper can easily pass as a coat. it's lightweight but enough to keep you warm on a spring or fall day. i would say it fits pretty true to size. i got the ivory during the big weekend sale (extra 40% off) but even at $

I agree with the other reviewers; this sweater was strangly shaped in the waist, in an unflattering way. the rest of it was beautiful though. looks too much like maternity, even in a petite xs, so it's going back.

Really magnificent pair of trousers/leggings. considering a second pair. magnificent flattering fit. i ordered the petite as well because i was concerned about the length but the stride on the petite a was to short and the regular was not too long after all.

This clothe hits all of the high notes for me. it is crisp, elegant, and it looks like something a european coutour designer would create. i am so glad i have this clothe in my wrardrobe. it hits me just above the knee which is super flattering. wear this to a fancy party when you want to look feminine and classy. it is a clothe that will serve you for a lifetime.

Seeking the excellent "go-to" clothe? this one will work for day or night, and it's an ideal match for transition seasons. the best part? the cut. swing clothees and shifts can "tent" my slightly "top-heavy" frame. this clothe brags a side-zipper and slight tapering through waist to create an a-line. the small petite fits tts for me at 5'4 size 2 to 4. the fabric is a high-quality, textured fabric - wrinkle free, and a magnificent pick for travel. best investment i've made this spring.

This is such a magnificent addition to my fall wardrobe. this is so cute! i'm 5'9 and this fits excellently. i don't usually do well with some of the cropped pieces but this one has such a complementary cute. the sleeves are just the right length. i've had lots and lots of complements on this one! it's a keeper!

I loved this purchase. the clothe is beautiful. it?s classy, very feminine and rich-looking. the colors and fabric are exactly as shown on a picture. it is tailored and non-stretch, so size has to be right. i am between 6 and 8 and my size m clothe fits well. had to spend time shopping for a belt as the clothe definitely needs one. gorgeous clothe!

I wore this for a few hours, and while it i got compliments i ended up needing to return it after the seams opened up over the shoulder blades. the fabric is so fine that during the normal goings-about of my day it gave way. and no, i didn't buy too small, and the fabric didn't pull while i was driving or reaching for anything.

Review_Title: Big fan, but the snap is a little tricky.
Review: This is a beautiful and classic blouse. magnificent fit and flow. however, the silk is very light and the snap falls off easily; tricky to sew back on since the fabric is so delicate.

I'm super happy with the way these jeans fit. i typically buy ag jeans for fit and quality. this pair is extremely comfy with the right amount of stretch yet still somewhat relaxed. they do run a big large so i sized down and they still fit magnificent... lots of compliments!
Very pretty & shimmery. suitable for slightly clotheier occasions. comfortable fit.
I love the detail on this shirt!  it is sheer, but looks magnificent with a cami.  magnificent unique piece .

These leggings are beautiful and different. the material is very stretchy, sort of a spandex feel. trousery lines definitely show in the back. i found they run true to size; i wear a size 6/medium/28 in trousers or jeans and the size medium fit me magnificent.

Got this top in white and the rust color. other reviewers mentioned it being much too large, so i went with the xs instead of my usual small. it's slightly oversized, but i love that look, and it's still flattering on me. i also didn't find there to be too much fabric. i am very tall and am happy with the length of this. 34b, 126 lbs, 5'10"

Love this blouse! its so darn cute. the fabric is soft, flows nicely and is just completely stunning without being over the top. it falls at the lower part of my hip. the softness of the fabric would make this easy to tuck in. the body of the shirt, sleeves, cuffs and placket are contrasting florals in black and creamy white. the top part is a brownish burgundy color and the flowers/butterflies are embroidered in goldenrod yellow, peach, creamy white, two mauve tones, turquoise and brown. the li
This tunic is flowy without having too much material to make you look bigger.  i love the way it fits.  i'm 5'4 125 lbs and got a small.

I am in love with theses! they are incredibly comfortable and flattering. i have an hourglass figure, and they hug my hips excellently. they excellent for the gym, but also look magnificent with a tunic and booties for fun weekend wear. good + pure are my new go to legging brand. i'm going to order the solid black and other patterns retailer has.
Love this shirt. magnificent shape and lightweight material for hot houston weather. washes up nice but does need some ironing.
I have a similar pair of capris from retailer and when i ordered these i thought they were the same in a different color. these are less flattering and i may not keep them.
I love this top. i wear it all the time.  the problem is that you can tell i wear it all the time as the fabric has started to fade.  i'd still recommend it as it is so comfortable.

This clothe is by no means a statement piece, but if you're in need of a good simple to get you through winter, this is a magnificent option. i'm normally a m or l (busty and hippy hourglass shape) and found it to fit tts in a l. (if you fall in-between two sizes but don't have larger hips or a larger bust like i do, you could probably size down to the smaller of your two sizes.) it goes magnificent with black tights, tall black boots and a scarf. i didn't realize at the time i ordered it that the material is
I'm 5'4 with an hourglass shape. i love this clothe. it drapes nicely, the material won't be hot for summer and the color is excellent for my olive complexion.
My new preferred top to throw on

Review_Title: Love! be careful the color choice though.
Review:
I love this clothe so much that i bought it in 2 colors: one in blue and one in orange. magnificent style, comfortable and quality material. however, the cut is much, much deeper than it appears in the pictures. women with bust should be conscious of that. 

the blue is the better color. the orange looks more like a fluorescent, red-orange. still cute, but not as subtly muted as it appears in the pics. 

overall, magnificent clothe. even better with the sale price.

Review_Title: This clothe is why i love retailer
Review: Everything about the clothe is worth it. it's true the buttons are loosely sewn on, but that's easily fixed. i'm a slim person but broad in the shoulders, so i had to exchange the small for a medium because it has a narrow, fitted construction. large-chested ladies or athletic types should size up.

Loved the look of the blouse online but the one i received has weird pattern placement that i'm not a fan of. mine was mostly cut from the "mum/sunflower" patterned fabric and none of the pretty teal and red pattern. the shirt online as a good combo of patterns-- mine is a solid mrs. roper-all-over-flower print! way overboard!! that said-- the cut is cute and the yoke at the back is a nice detail-- hoping i can exchange it for one that looks more like the online pic!

I don't think the sweater looks like the one pictured. it's pretty and i love off the shoulder sweaters, but i have to say it's a little scratchy and its a lighter grey than what shows on my computer screen. if i hadn't gotten it on sale and with an additional birthday discount i would send it back. it also runs big. i got an xs/s and it fits excellently. im 5'6" and weigh 140. i usually wear a medium in most things and am a size 8. i like it a lot, but i don't love it. it also reeked of patchouli

I am going to disagree with reviewers who say this runs small. i found it very short and wide. that being said, it is meant to be cropped. i ordered a size small and it fit excellently, albeit a little short. for reference, i am usually a size 6/medium in retailer shirts and clothees.

I may regret returning this sweater, because it would be lovely had i been able to wear it as i was when i ordered it.
as i am in a wheelchair temporarily, i find the sweater too bulky in a sitting position.
if you are slender and are looking for vertical lines that are slimming in a style so fashionable now, this is the sweater for you! the neutral colors and the bulky weave i also love because it goes with everything--a go-to sweater-coat.

This top looks adorable in the product photos, so i had high hopes. i think i might be too short to pull it off, but like another reviewer said, i found it to be like a tent on me, billowing out in all directions. it was just overall too big on me--i even considered whether i could wear it as a clothe, but the sleeves were also too billowy on me. i am 5'4", 120 lbs and tried the xs.
Pretty, easy-to-wear clothe. loose fitting. i am typically a size 4, size 4 fit, but i might have been able to go to a size 2 if i wanted it to be more fitted at the chest/arms.

I read the other reviews on this skirt and tried the 4 and the 6 (i'm between the two sizes, typically) in case it ran small. technically it does. the 4 is tighter, but it looks better sitting higher on my waist. the 6 is looser, but doesn't look as good. likely sticking with the 4. the colors are gorgeous and the fabric is light and high quality. it can be clotheed up or down.

Love this shirt and the print. i would wear it all the time if socially acceptable. i've only worn it once but have already gotten so many compliments. there are hints of neon in the coloring that can't really be seen in the pictures. i saw it in store and fell in love and then decided to splurge when i saw it online and couldn't think of life without it.

I tried on the pink in xs in store. it was so big on me. i wanted to love it, the stylist did, but i felt meh... so did another costumer, didn't like it on me. the colors are really nice (and the blue seems really nice too), but the cut was a little wide. fabric is very soft. for reference, i am 115 lbs, 0dd, 26.5 in waist.

Review_Title: Beautiful but too small for me!
Review:
Usually can just buy tiny shirts knowing that they will fit me!  and this one is beautiful but if you have any type of chest it will not work.  i'm a 34d and it
was way too small in the chest area.  it is a beautiful shirt though and i'm very sad that i have to return it.  it will work better on someone else for sure.  so i recommend this beautiful shirt for someone with a different body type from mine!

I disagree with the other reviewer - i thought the fabric of this skirt was high quality, and while it wasn't lined i don't think lining is typical in a sweater material. i also really liked the patter and the swingy bell shape. i usually wear a 6 or 8, but my store only had a 4 available. it fit, but was a little tight in the hips. the skirt was also longer on me then on the model, but i'm on the short side.

I didn't notice this online but it caught my eye in the store. the colors are bright and beautiful. i wear a 10/12 or m/l. i tried the 12 but the bust was too big (i wear a 36c). i ordered the size 10 and it fits excellent. i'm so glad i saw it in the store. i think it makes much more of an impact in person than online.

I almost never buy anything full price here and usually wait patiently for a sale + promotion :) however, this really struck me and i decided to buy it, telling myself it's an investment piece for years to come. it's just so unique and beautiful -- the things that makes retailer unique that aren't as common anymore.

____________
pros:
- very comfortable. i was skeptical because it's all polyester, but it's light and thin and breathable. it feels wonderful on the skin. the lining inside is ver

The straps are long but work ok for me. the material is very soft and the color (pink) is very nice. this is a tank you can wear under almost anything as the soft silky fabric will allow whatever you wear to glide right over it....no sticking!
.unfortunately it hit at the widest part of my hips, so it wasn't very flattering. the point in the back was also kind of odd, and off center. i had to return. pretty color, though.

First off - i love these jeans... they are the exact look i have been searching for, and the bands around the hem are what really sold me on this specific pair. the only problem - which i found with a previous purchase - is that they hit me at the ankle, rather than what is pictured. since i liked everything about these jeans, i decided to so with plan b and had them altered to be about an inch shorter. this involved cutting the hem at the top of the bands and reattaching... the stitching blends

The one i tried on had something wrong with the pockets... one was regular height,t eh other was so low, i could barely put my hand in it. however, the jumpsuit itself is really pretty and soft. color is nice, but hard ot pull off on pale skin like me.  i tried on the xs, but that was big. i would need xxs p if it was made in that size, so i let it go... (looked nice with pinched fabric in the back.

for reference i am 115 lbs, 30 dd< 26.5 in waist.

I am very self conscience of my tummy and this covers it up without being too baggy! there is plenty of room. i originally bought a small then went to an extra small then went back to a small. i wear a small in most things. magnificent nicer looking tee!
Im short (5'2'') so it's a little long on me! but it's super cute and i love it!!

The fabric of these trousers isn't like regular denim, rather it's soft and velvety in texture more like a chino. i love the dark saturated olive green. the pocket placement is very flattering on the rear. normally i wear a size 31 in premium denim and size 30 in paige jimmy jimmy jeans, however in this particular pair i needed a size 29. i definitely recommend sizing down!
I bought this tunic for my mom as a birthday gift. it is very good quality and will look cute for fall too.

Review_Title: Shimmers with gold, silver, and black tones
Review: In accordance with other reviewers, the pictures don't do this gorgeous lightweight sweater justice; the fabric has threads of gold, silver, and black that together make for shimmery elegance--not at all the heather grey in the photo.. i'm 5' 8" 120 34b and the xs (regular) fits excellent--and actually more slimming/fit than in the photo. sleeves are long--which i love. a keeper, especially on sale!

I had been admiring this clothe for over a year and finally treated myself to it for the holidays. first, it is gorgeous and very thoughtfully designed to make you look amazing. where things fall off the rails for me is the fabric choice for the sleeves...they are sooo delicate and evidently snag far too easily. the clothe that i received in the mail had two large snags (one in each sleeve) that were already running a bit. to me that was a huge red flag that i shouldn't be spending so much money o

I'm a huge maeve enthusiast. tried this on in three different colors, and although these types of maeve tops have had sizing differences from season to season, this top is more true-to-size than others have been more recently. the petite size for me was too short to tuck in, but the regular worked excellently. the top is roomy, flowy, and the white version is sheer, but a white tank under it would be excellent. the green umbrellas are adorable! a magnificent way to spruce up your wardrobe for spring!

The pictures of this sweater do not do it justice. i would have passed it over online but it immediately caught my eye in the store. the yarn is soft and cozy and the flair at the bottom adds a feminine touch. zipper is cute. v-neck is just right - it is not too low. i know i will be wearing this sweater a lot - very happy with this purchase! i didn't see the pink or navy in the store.

Review_Title: Pretty but sleeves make it seem large.
Review: I lived the front and back designs but didn't like the fit.

Review_Title: Poofy not good for heavy legs
Review: The color is as pictured. good quality. it's lined. the zipper in the back makes it look updated. i ordered my usual size. small petite size 6. it fit excellently. i'm 5 feet and 120 lbs. hourglass figure. i had high hopes. i have hips and short, heavy legs. the skirt only emphasized my flaws. if you've got magnificent legs you will do well with this. i do own other short skirts. but the fact that is less tailored in look makes it better suited for a younger gal. if you're on the fence give it a try. it
This top is super comfy and casual. the slit/design in the front gives it more of a stylish look than your average white long sleeve tee. would definitely recommend.

This is a magnificent top. soft and cozy fabric, nice and sturdy feeling. it's heavier than i though it'd be so its excellent for the cooler days of spring, and even a chilly summer night. i love that it's long enough in the front for me to feel comfortable wearing leggings. the body is nice and roomy but the arms are a little snug, however, i like that because i think it makes it look less like a slubby sweatshirt. the best part... it can be cleaned in the washer and drier! thrilled with this purchase!

Review_Title: This will not fit bustier women
Review: I so wanted to love the striped peplum top, however i have a petite frame with a large chest and there was completely no support in the top. not flattering in the least for a d-dd cup. will be returning. i imagine this would be excellent for someone with a frame like mary kate or ashley olsen :)

This is a beautiful skirt. i wanted to make sure that i received a size that fit so i ordered two different sizes (pxs and ps). i typically wear a pxs but since the description mentions a side zip and it looked as if the skirt was to fit higher on the waist i thought i should also try a size up. as i mentioned it is lovely. light airy. i just wanted something easy to throw on and look put together with flat sandals and a tank for the hot weather that is coming and for an upcoming vacation to the

Review_Title: We need more vintage retailer style.
Review: The print on this clothe harkens to the old days of retailer. if you miss the fun prints and whimsical styles, playful textures, and conversational pieces - this clothe is for you! at 5'7", 34c, 27-28 waist, i bought the size 4. runs tts. site claims it's a fit and flare but i think it's more of a sheath cut. the thicker canvas like material has stretch but gives good form. i wear mine as a jumper/pinafore with a white shirt sleeve blouse. my only complaint is that - as a clothe - the arm holes are a

I love pj's and other assorted lounging pieces, and this one is exceptional. in fact, i plan to buy the pj bottoms made with the same fabric. i tried them both on in the store, and ultimately decided on the chemise because it is very special.
the fit is tts. fyi: 36c, short waist, broad shoulders, 5'3"
