This is such beautiful material, but the sleeves at the shoulders are terrible -- the gathered material makes it look like i'm wearing shoulder pads. that structured element compared to the rest of the clothe (relatively unstructured) just looks ridiculous. i was so looking forward to this clothe, and now it's going back.
Magnificent structure

Agree with other reviewer that this is massive even for a cape. unflattering overall. i normally wear a size 2 of 4 and bought this in an xs and two of me can easily fit into this with room to spare. unlined and it itches!

Review_Title: Runs small yet very billowy skirt
Review: What is going on with maeve sizing this season? in the past two months, i've purchased two maeve clothees that run very small--particularly at the waist.  having many maeve items from past seasons and other recent retailer purchases, it's impossible to ignore that maeve's sizing is quite off. that aside, the vibrant summer colors and material quality are magnificent. the skirt is lined but billowy and fuller than ideal. strangely, it's a lot of clothe yet not enough at the same time. there bodice h
This clothe is lovely and has a comfy fit. the green color is gorgeous. i felt the sizing was large and sent it back.
Magnificent shirt that is simple with a little something extra. meadow rue does it again...i swear i buy everything they put out...

Review_Title: So good i had to buy another pair
Review:
I bought these to wear to a christmas party with a lacy blouse, but found they were what's been missing in my life. after wearing them nearly every other day, i decided i needed another pair.

feel like yoga trousers but look polished. make your butt look perky and your legs slim. .... maybe i need another pair!

I love this piece! they're calling it a tunic but its plenty long enough to wear without any trousers. i usually wear a small/xsmall in retailer sizes and i definitely went with the xsmall. size down to avoid the potato sack look. i think this piece is so magnificent for fall. definitely a must buy!

This is a beautiful top if you size way down. i normally wear a small in tiny tops. i had to buy an xxs petite in this top. even still there is a little extra material around the sides, but i've received a ton of compliments on the top.

I love these leggings so much i bought them in every color/design!!! they are amazing!
super stretchy and magnificent for an active lifestyle be it pilates, yoga, playing with kids at the park or coffe with the girls.

I purchased this tee in the blue and it is so very cute. its such a soft thin tee and a delight to wear on these hot summer days. i went with xs on this one and i still have plenty of room.. i have paired it with jean shorts, capris and it goes really well with the pilcro hypen chino shorts.
Love this sweater! not too long or bulky,true to size. the fabric is super soft, magnificent quality!
I loved this top . it is exactly what i wanted,

I love this clothe, it's very comfortable, slim swing and very ingratiating. the fabric is light, i like the details of the buttons on the sleeves. overall, i'm pleased and happy for the purchase of this clothe. i will definitely recommend it.

Review_Title: Magnificent style, not so magnificent workmanship
Review: This vest is soft, flattering, and versatile. but both pockets were sewn incorrectly, with broken seams on the bottoms so if you used them, things would fall out. i'm keeping it but had to pay a seamstress to fix it. for the price, i'd expect better quality. recommended conditionally..

Review_Title: This is a very nice top
Review: This top is true to size and fits excellently.  color is very natural.

These days i am more like a 6 after gaining some weight. when i was in my local retailer the other day i happened upon this clothe only in a small/petite. i tried it on and it actually fit me very well. i am 5 foot 6 so i thought the petite might be too short or wouldn't work, but unexpectedly it fit my body type. i think i'll like wearing it best with a pair of wedges or heels. like most other reviews i'm inclined to agree that the regular size has too much fabric going on and probably is s

I'm just not sure about this top... it's very short. i'm short-waisted, and it could stand to be at least an inch longer in front for me. and as another reviewer pointed out, there's no closure in front. i can't imagine wearing it without a tank underneath... one good stiff breeze and everyone would get a peep show. it really seems more like a vest than a shirt. it's cute enough with a tank underneath, but that sort of defeats the purpose of an easy summer top... it's too hot for layers in the s
Tts and very very sleek and flattering. just love for summer. nice light weight. feel magnificent on and not saggy. nice color addition since my other preferred are lighter shade of blue.

I am not really a "print person" but cartonnier gets it right every time - modern prints that lend themselves to many styling and paring options. the charlie trouser, which they do every season, is a magnificent fitting trouser (going up a size is a must as they do run small) with details (stitching, buttons, pockets) that make their trousers look more expensive than they actually are.
i bought these in the blue combo when i saw them at my local retailer store. the blue combo has both blue and black (as well

Just a wonderful shirt -- fabric is so soft, it feels like pajamas, and the blue is just excellent. there's a different blue plaid as a lining, and i almost wish it was reversible. they're both magnificent patterns! wonderful for fall...
I normally wear a large but this had no give through the bust! beware big chested girls!!!

This clothe is completely adorable. runs true to size, i am five foot nine and a medium fit excellent. the denim has a lot of stretch. i can't wait to wear it in the winter with tights and boots! don't wait too long before this one sells out.

Review_Title: Magnificent suit for many body types
Review: I felt compelled to write a review to tell everyone to size up. i am 5'4", 130 lbs, 34d and normally wear a size 4 (give or take). i debated between the 6 & 8 after reading the reviews and went with the 8 and so glad i did! if you're in doubt between sizes even after sizing up, go up one more, especially if you're bigger up top. mine fit *okay* in them but probably could have even done better with a larger cup. what's weird is that they sew in liner cups so you can't remove them without cutting

I loved this skirt. so flattering and such a beautiful fabric. unfortunately after only 2 wears, the waistband stretched out so much that it was falling off me (literally). i bought the right size and it was not too tight. the waist band material simply lost its stretch very quickly. very disappointing.

Review_Title: Nice design but not magnificent quality
Review: I love the design of this sweater and ordered it online, but was disappointed with the quality of the yarn when it arrived. also the color was a little different than i expected from the photo, still a type of ivory, but a little yellow-y. the sweater was solid looking, but the yarn seemed a bit cheap and i'm not sure how well it would have worn over time. flattering cut. i liked how it fit, but for the price and fabric, i decided to return it. unfortunate to lose money on shipping.

This clothe is gorgeous! i ordered it because i was getting other things and there was free shipping., i am 5'3.5" and abt 123 lbs. usually between an xs and s and also between reg & petite. sometimes i have to order multiple sizes to get a decent fit. i ordered a sz small petite and it's excellent. super soft, magnificent colors, excellent length!! love it!

As soon as you get up close to this sweater, you will notice that the bird on the front is of an interesting kind of material-almost like carpet that has been shaved waaaaaaaay down so that the little fibers are sticking straight up and a fraction of a millimeter high. i was not excited about this texture and can imagine it will be a huge magnet for collecting lint and dust throughout the day. the fit was way off on this one for me and was not flattering at all. it wasn't for me at all even thou

I really like the hyphen pilcro chino trousers so i figured i would try the shorts and voila' - i love the shorts too! colors are magnificent and you don't have to cuff them if they seem too short - they're versatile and who doesn't love options?????
This clothe is the best casual find. goes with everything- flips flops, tennys, jean coat. feels little sporty and the orange was a cool addition to my closet.

Review_Title: Very pretty, lovely color, nice fabrics
Review: This clothe is really beautiful, cheerful, the color lovely, the fabric soft and beautiful. i wish it had worked with my body because i really liked the style, fabric, and color. i am 5' 5" with long legs and a shorter upper body, so i needed to buy this clothe in a petite size, but they were sold out of petite smalls and mediums. so i tried the small in a regular size. the armscye (depth of arm hole) is so low that my breast was completely revealed! i thought about shortening the straps entirely

Fabulous fabric, adorable details. fitting is very, very odd. it's non-adjustable in any way. the fabric has no stretch at all around the middle and the underwire of the bra is very stiff which i found painful. the straps were kind of loose, but there is no way to tighten them because of the frills. when i bent over, the shorts exposed the bottom of my butt. i'd get a larger size, but then i can't adjust the straps and they would definitely be too long and leave my breasts very exposed. overall,

I saw this romper online and knew i needed it as i love flannels and i love rompers. it's super comfy. i bought with the intention of wearing it out, not just around the house. i think in the fall it will be cute with high socks and boots but as i just got it, i've been opting for tights. lots of compliments so far. i got a small because i didn't want it to be too short, it fits well.

I should have heeded the previous reviewer's advice. but i'm really short so i thought i'd give it a try. there is something really wrong with the bust. first, it's about 3-4 inches higher than it should be. the bottom trim cut across the middle of my bust. even if i hoisted everthing up in there to fit the cups, they are really only designed to fit cones, not curves. from the side it looked hideous. too bad, because the fabric and fit everywhere else is gorgeous.
This clothe is so much prettier in person! it will be magnificent both for work and play, can't wait to pair with booties into fall.

I really wanted to love this romper and couldn't wait to try it on.   it's super cute and love the material but once on the top portion is way too baggy even after cinching the waist.   if i pulled the waist all the way down it looks smoother and nice,  but if it sits at my natural waist,  the back balloons out and it's unflattering.  it's too bad,  i love the print and ease of this design.
Easy to wear with black or grey. i will wear as a work coat, not necessarily just an outwear piece

I ordered the black 2 months ago, it was on back order, and i jsut received it finally. the fabric is super soft, itried on both xxs and xs and could keeo either one. the "v" in front where it crosses is low, so most people do need a cami underneath, but you could probably do without for ultra sexy look (not my style, but could be done). i plan on wearing this with skirts, deresses and slacks... i saw a commet on the lighter color, not sure, but love this one in black for sure@

I really wanted this to work. the embroidery detail is very pretty. however, the inside of the sweatshirt is a bit scratchy from the embroidery so i would recommend wearing a cami or tank. the sweatshirt is also on the short size. the small hit the top of my jean waist. in the end, i decided to return it:(

I purchased this clothe for my 50th birthday bash!!! it was stunning!!! the fit was excellent. i did buy it a size up, but could have worn my regular size. it is incredibly flattering and elegant. very well made. one of my go to black clothees for the summer!!!

Swingy and just the right weight for the office. the cream is ever so slightly sheer but looks really good with a darker bra, even for the office because you can't really see through it. i'm wearing this all the time this fall and winter with skirts, black trousers, and skinny jeans

I love these trousers. i have worn them a number of times already this season. i am 5' so i did have to have them hemmed. i lost the bottom button in the process but there are still 3 or 4 on the trousers so i don't think they look odd. i also wear very high boots with these trousers so that helps. a crisp white blouse and black leather coat and i felt like a million bucks!

I love this sweater! the sky color is very flattering in person. i love that it looks good open or closed. i bought one for my mom and me. i think it will be very versatile. i think it runs mostly true to size, possibly runs just slightly big.

Let it be known that i hate shopping for jeans. i recently had my go-to skinny jeans rip by my back pocket and new i needed to get something new & better stat. i have a pair of black ag sateens that i got a few years ago, and i decided to try out this pair. i got them in the mail yesterday, and i never want to part with them! they are excellention. they hit excellently on my waist; they're incredibly comfortable and simpleally make you feel like you're wearing the jean equivalent to yoga trousers. they

I love how this clothe is photographed, but when it arrived to my doorstep i was highly disappointed. there seems to be no shape to it whatsoever. the fabric is much stiffer than i was expected i thought it was going to be more like a sweater clothe, but it is not an overly comfortable fabric and it does not move like i thought it would when i put it on. this one is going back.

I don't know why i didn't pay much attention to this tee (the yellow), but i didn't. i saw it in the store, thought it was interesting and kept on going. then i really looked at it online and suddenly i had a bad case of the wants. so when i was in one of my local stores i asked about it, and no surprise, it was sold out. at the suggestion of my sales associate i tried on a solid one just for the size. although i'm small, i have several tla tees in medium, so i tried on a medium and a small. as

Bought the aqua because sizes were sold out. the bright color will be a welcome change this winter among all my neutrals. it's lovely, soft, well-fitting, and i only hope we have a few days in the south so i can wear it. well worth the price. would be a lovely wardrobe addition for any age, changed by what it's worn with...shoes, accessories,

Unless you have the body of the model - tall and very thin and wear a really small size - don't even think about getting this clothe! it's literally a heavy sack. it hit right above my knee in the front and simpleally mid-calf in the back. the material is nice but it's an awful shape!

This was adorable, but looks much better on the lean, flat chested model. i am only 110 lbs and 5'4" but i am curvy and it just didn't do me any justice so i will be returning. i think this would look better on someone more flat chested, because it really accentuates the bust.
The material is horrible, it's heavy and cheap. the skirt does not "flow" as it appears in the photo. instead the bottom part of the skirt just stands out like ruffles. am returning.
This coat looked adorable on. it was also quite comfortable. however, it sheds and left fuzz on every dark surface it touched. sadly, this is a deal breaker for me.

Review_Title: Doesn't look like the photo at all
Review: This arrived this week and i was so disappointed. the proportions are all wrong--- from the empire waist to the dolman sleeves, to the weird texture added to the material. if i could sum up this coat with one word it would be "weird".

I noticed this top on one of the sales associates, and it looked magnificent. she's probably 230lbs and about 5'5.  tried it on and it looked horrible, i even tried sizing down twice. i'm 5'8" and the ruffles started right under my chest. i gave 2 stars bc of the material, it is light, and summery.
Love this color! when i saw this beautiful blue color in the store i had to try them on! so pretty! if you love pilcro chinos--you will be happy with these! same magnificent fit and an awesome color!

This romper is one of my preferred purchases. the material is magnificent, the fit is very forgiving, and it is very comfortable. it is easily clotheed up or down. i purchased a size smaller than i usually wear and it fits well.

I always look for things to hide "parts" without making my "parts" look even more pronounced. this top is much cuter in person than online. it has floral edging around the neck and lace up area i didn't notice. the length is excellent, the sleeve length is excellent and it makes me feel thin (even though it has stripes!). excellent spring summer top.
It is definitely pinned back on the model in the photograph. it made my 5 foot frame look short and wide.

Review_Title: Cute top, but not for me
Review: This top light and airy, which is excellent for spring. i'm usually into these types of blouses; however, this didn't quite fit right on me. it's a little too boxy and too low cut in the front for some reason. i loved the design and really wanted to like it... i just didn't love it enough to purchase it.

I love this duster! i got my usual size and it fits exactly as pictured. the color of the fabric is a excellent neutral and will look good with anything. the knit is open and fairly see-through, this avoids the bathrobe look that a long length sweater can have. bought at full price and i'm not sorry because i bet it will be gone before long!

This top is fantastic. something about it has an ease of elegance and grace. the overall structure and design is aesthetically pleasing and easy to wear. i feel immediately put together and ready for anything. the fabric has magnificent texture and flows well without feeling like the wind will carry you away. i purchased the off-white - it is a bit see-through, but i don't mind wearing a cami underneath.

I was really hoping this clothe would work out, as it looks like it could be a staple outfit for work! the material is very nice, but unfortunately the clothe was way too big. there is a band right under the chest that i would think should be somewhat fitted to give the clothe some shape to your figure, but it was wayyy to big on me (especially considering i am large-chested! i will be returning this.

Loved the look of this top. sadly it runs quite small and was very tight where other non-swing tops in a large do not. the item ran out of stock far too quickly. i normally wear a large but feared that the large would be small and wanted to order up but it was already put of stock. the quality and style are magnificent especially for a larger chest. length is magnificent for taller women.

This clothe is magnificent! it's excellent for a casual look with a denim coat, comfortable for traveling, and can even be clotheed up for a more formal occasion. i wore it on a cross country flight (toronto-british columbia) and was so comfortable with a sweater and scarf to wrap around me if i got cold. the only con i found of this clothe is the back is a bit low leaving your bra showing and being a 32-d i don't feel comfortable going without a bra. i purchased a few of the bralettes to go with it to m
Looks so beautiful.... on a hanger. does not really do anything on a person. beautiful beading but the clothe on is very sack-like. i will be returning it
A magnificent wrap clothe with many buttons, the clothe stays on better than any other wrap clothe i ever owned.

I do not understand how a couple people gave this a bad review. i loved this coat from the minute i tried it on. cute in the picture and cuter on, because it is so comfortable. the fabric is super soft and does not wrinkle (as one reviewer stated). i took it on the plane with me just to keep warm and it was fabulous. looked as good going on the plane as it did coming off. the drape of the coat flows nicely and i love the oversized pockets to stash my phone or lipstick. this coat will carry

This is a beautiful sweater. high quality cashmere was used as it is very soft. as other reviewers stated, the sweater does run large. so i purchased one size down and ordered an xxs, for a excellent fit. i went with yellow, which is a magnificent color. this is not high low, which i love! i am so thrilled, that just as soon as i'm finished writing this review, i'm going to purchase another sweater in red.

This shirt is the excellent go-to; classic white button down, with a twist! the fit is flattering & i would have to say runs a little large. i am 5'4,124 lbs, broad shoulders, with a 36d bust and bought the 2 (outside of retailer, a 36d usually needs about an 8). i was worried what may happen when i wash it because it fits excellently but i washed it in cold & hung it up to dry & it was fine.

Review_Title: Easy to clothe up or clothe down
Review: I completely love this romper. the chambray material is super comfy and easy to wear. i ordered a size up (l ), and i'm happy i did bc it would have been a little too tight in the arm area to squeeze into and gave a little extra wiggle room in the belly area. for reference i usually wear size 8/m and i'm a 34c
Love this skirt! very fun and feminine. it is a magnificent fit and i love the layering contrast of stripes. length goes right to below my knees, which is excellent for me! i am petite and curvy.

Review_Title: Preferred retailer purchase of the whole year!
Review: This sweater vest is the best! it is so versatile! i've already worn it over a clothe and recieved compliments all day. the knit is substantial without being to thin or heavy. i love the little flecks of color in the yarn as well! it makes coordinating easy. i thought the faux fur might be too overwhelming or hot, but thankfully it's not at all. runs true to size. worth full price!

Fits well and appropriate for work or going out! love the pop of red in the beads! could easily be worn with a coat well into fall! i typically wear a 6 and a small fit excellently. not too short- but hits above the knee! this will get lots of wear!

This suit is completely gorgeous but it really will only fit a very short waisted gal. it fit excellently in the body and in the bust but just was not long enough for me to lift my arms up and my size c cup boobs to not pop out. i was very sad to return it :( i am a size 8 with c cup boobs and ordered it in a medium

I'm an avid retailer shopper.
i bought this clothe for my niece, her style tends to run 
bohemian/gothic.
the style, fabric and overall design/quality of this clothe, is something i felt she would like (even though the color is not black).
she loves it - excellent fit. she accessorized it with her usual biker/moto coat,boots, etc.
but it looks awesome on her!

I read all the reviews before purchasing this and took the advice of others on sizing up. i am 5'4" hourglass shape (32d, 27 inch waist, size 28 trouser size) and normally wear a size 4p in retailer clothees. i ordered a 6p and the top was way too big on me. i went straight to an retailer store to try on a 4 regular and the top half was excellent on me. a little too long for my liking (about an inch below my knee), so i re-ordered it in a 4p. this clothe ran true to size for me. i recommend trying it on in

Layered this with a chunky sweater and a pair of kicks. it can be low key or clotheed up with a pair of heels, multi-functionality not just occasional. it's feminine, funky, and fabulous!! i bought the last one in the store!
I love this top. it comes with its own camisole. the embroidery is lovely and the fit is excellent.
I am in love with pilcro trousers. i am typically a petite 26 or 27. i'm a 27 in these khakis. which is could have them in every color and style.
Love this coat!got my usual size medium and is excellent! beautiful quality

I haven't worn these yet but i wouldn't wear them just to "lounge" in. i wear an xs & they fit good & tts. they have an elastic waist but it drapes nice & doesn't bunch like some do. the material is soft & hangs nice. & doesn't seems like it will wrinkle. love the pattern of the black print ones. it's black, tan & white & kind of a paisley print. i think it looks better on than in the picture.

I ordered a sp which is normally the size i wear from retailer i'm 5ft and 129lbs. and there is so much extra material on the bottom part of the clothe. it would make a beautiful summer clothe if it was at least 2inches narrower on the bottom. unfortunately they are out of the xsp which would be excellent. still contemplating whether to keep or return.

I buy everything that retailer sells in chambray. this top did not disappoint. it is so comfortable and the back the way it is slightly lower than normal is very sexy without being revealing. the straps fall off of your shoulders a bit but i do not find it annoying. i am not big busted so i didn't have the sizing issue that others seemed to have.

Very flattering and looks much better on than on the mannequin in store. i an in between small/medium and went with medium which was looser in back and did not show any lumps or bumps. magnificent with jeans, pencil skirts and capris .

I saw this top on a store mannikin and was drawn to it by it's color and print. it looked magnificent with blue jeans on display and a lariat necklace. then i noticed the different design on the back below the yoke. the surprise was its being pleated into very fine pleats. i liked the funky quality this added. the design is a good transitional piece to wear early fall or under a coat. it is machine washable and that finalized the purchase of it. i bought the necklace too. i often wear a small but go

Because of my body type, i never thought i could wear a romper. i tried this on out of curiosity and am so glad i did. it fits well (i did size up because of my thighs), is comfortable, and an alternative to a clothe. the patterned bottom did not accentuate my lower body, which was a worry. i got compliments when i wore this to dinner with a pair of sandals.

There's a reason the model is holding her arms up in all the frontal views. it hides the very weird wide top part of the sleeve that completely destroys and distorts an otherwise beautiful blouse. the print is lovely but the fit is very odd. it's pulls at and is very tight through the bust too. i wear medium or large and ordered size large. if you're less well endowed this might be an okay choice for you. but i have to say this blouse made me look overweight and very wide. returned.

I saw this peasant blouse online and thought it looked cute, but not really enough to spend the money on. i purchased a few other things instead. i happened to go into the store to see a different top in person and spotted this one. it is definitely cuter in person. as with most tops like this, it is baggy and loose. however, probably due to the elastic at the bottom, this one doesn't look overly big and shapeless. just a pretty top that will be excellent for spring. for reference, i am 5'6 115, a
Anytime i see this brand at retailer in a button down, i have to buy it. fit is always so flattering, comfy and the prints are always magnificent!

So sad!  this beautiful clothe which i have been waiting to receive didn't work for me.  i'm a 5'7" hourglass girl and it just made me look big!  but i love the pattern and the way it looks on the photo online!  so sad but will return it!0

Love the design and colors
runs a but large through the middle

Review_Title: The tee that goes with everything
Review: I have worn this to work, errands, yoga. it's a magnificent tee. love it!

Love this top! the colors are so fun and happy, and the fabric/fit are soft and breezy. it is definitely on the boxy side, but not in an unflattering way (in my opinion). super cute in my usual size small.

Knitted and knotted makes such gorgeous sweaters:  this is bathed in lovely, almost impresssionistic color, and the deep ruffle at the bottom is feminine and flattering.  i adored the way there's enough wrap-around to get cozy in it, as i wore it through my day.  i went with the green in a regular medium, which is my normal size:  size 8, 34f.  the 27% mohair enhances the soft feeling and lush look.  as i wore this piece today, i felt that i was wearing something very special.

I'm 5'0 125 lbs and the petite small fits excellently. i love the length of the shorts, not too short and not frumpy either. the waist has a hidden band so it hugs you in a good way and makes the top half slightly blousy, so it's forgiving. will go magnificent with gray booties, black wedges or sandals.

Review_Title: Cozy and excellent for a southern winter
Review: Love this sweater it's excellent for chilly florida evenings....love the loose boxy shape and it's very cozy not itchy!

This runs really big. i usually wear s or m so i got a small but i need the xs in this top and it is sold out. i don't have a store close by (about an hour away) and i hate paying shipping for returns! i will either have to plan a trip to the store or try to exchange for size over the phone. i debated keeping the small but it is really too big .... i love the style though!

The clothe fits true to size and is pretty comfortable. i did look kinda matronly with my 34d chest. it's a good simple to have on your closet, but i ended up returning the one i bought. it didn't feel special enough to keep.

Saw this clothe in the retailer catalog and tried on in store. didn't need a clothe but ended up purchasing as will be wearable for summer/early fall. seems like a print clothe cut and style that will be used for many seasons. outer fabric is a bit delicate/may snag, and a bit wrinkly as another reviewer said, but works with the clothe.
This clothe drapes very well and is flattering to many different body shapes. the colors give it the flexibility to wear from summer into fall. gorgeously designed!

Definitely order down a size. i am almost always an xl (big chest, broad shoulders) but the l in this fits me excellently. well worth the sale price, a fun boho transition piece!
it is a "reverse print" so the inside is brighter than the outside, but i like the blurred paisley print--it's subtle.

the back detail is magnificent and very flattering.

it is quite full and flowy, but in a flattering way, i think. just restrained enough.

I completely love this clothe! very well made, fits like a glove, and very flattering! the fabric is stretchy which makes the fit excellent and comfortable. i will be wearing this to a graduation and i'm sure i'll find many other occasions to wear this clothe.

I'm petite and i ordered the smallest size possible online (5'1" 95lb). i ordered the rain/umbrella pattern which is cute and very "retailer" in my opinion. for those who are experiencing "gapping at the buttons over bust area" - wear a tank inside and problem is solved! hoping they would come out with cuter prints in the future.
Love love love this clothe.  fits like a glove. beautiful details. amazing quality. i'm so happy with this clothe and know i'll have it for years. :)
This top is the excellent staple! the fabric is soft and comfortable. i generally wear medium tops, but the small fits excellently. took the chance ordering online and i am very happy!
Love this blouse, it;s super comfy, looks awesome with jeans. this blouse runs true to size i purchased in my normal size small.

This is a magnificent top and got compliments already...it does have a longer sleeve like the picture, but
really not bad. it's so comfortable and color is fabulous. magnificent with any scarf too.

This looks really cute online. i was super excited to get it and i ordered my regular size in maeve. i got a size 0 (i am 5'4, 114#). the top is very pretty and the fabric is nice but it is very short, it didn't even cover my stomach and didn't come to the top of my jeans. i'm sending it back. maeve usually runs big but you can't tell from the photo and the size chart that it's more of a crop top. disappointing since almost every size is sold out.

No need to be on the fence about this top, it's lovely! what you see pictured here, is exactly what you get, even the color of the top is 100% accurate. for reference i'm usually an xl/16, apple shape, 40 c bust, and this xl does not cling at all to me, so you may even be able to size down. the drape of the clipdot fabric is flattering, and thick enough not to need a cami. all of the fabrics used are nice and soft... and the details! it's going to be a beautiful spring!
Got this shirt in the map design - super cute! it looks magnificent with jeans or chinos in different colors. fun and different shirt. fit just as expected.

I ordered the copper in a medium which i felt was tts (5'4" 145). the color is beautiful and i love the buttons on the shoulders which i really didn't notice in the picture, the material is also very soft. but i have some complaints.. first i felt that the material, while soft, was not very substantial for the price. i purchased another vest from that store that has everything which was $100 less and seems to be the same quality. i also was expecting there to be some way to close the vest beside

Review_Title: Lovely top; peplum hit weird on me
Review: I wanted to love this blouse, but the peplum came too high up on my waist. i have a short torso and i'm busty, so the placement of the peplum just didn't work for me. it is a very pretty color and fit fine in my normal size, but the peplum just didn't work on my short torso. i think this would be a very pretty blouse for people with a different body type than mine.

And the bottom looks like a tutu. first, i have high tolerance for scratchy fabric but this one i could feel it even through long sleeves. there is no way i could wear something that makes my skin itch so badly. second, the peplum part is huge and looks like an exaggerated skirt. finally, the color on the "green one" is darker than in the picture and it does have more of a green than blue tint. back it goes.

This has a lot of extra fabric in the chest area. i was hoping i could button and close that in a way that didn't just have it jutting out. luckily, it's still flattering. definitely bulky. and in the black, it's picking up lots of dust and lint. still a magnificent cut and look, so i'm happy with it overall.
This clothe makes you feel like a bohemian goddess.  falls in the right area and completely adorable.  the clothe is very fragile, handle with care.

I really like the appearance of this item, and it looks pleasing with many different styles of leggings. it does run a little large. i am a "true to size" small, and this hangs on me a little, but i love the design of the back. it is so soft and comfortable!

I was so disappointed when i received this top. the color is some washed-out faded version of the picture shown and the cut is much fuller than it looks in the picture. the back is cute but not worth the awful, drab actual color.

I love that these are a nice thin stretchy material (not in a bad or cheap way) because they are excellent for the warm weather as well. i got the color grey in a size 29. i usually wear a 29 in stevie's so they were tts. maybe a bit tight in the beginning but they do stretch a little with wear. i did try on the size 30 but they were a little big around the waist. for reference i am 5'6", 145lbs, size 6/m. the fit of stevies are excellent and hugs in all the right places. i have wider calves and it
Love this sweater so much i purchased the grey and the pink. so far no issues with the stitching.

I wanted to love this. i have been looking for a poncho-type sweater for our cold midwestern winters. the cream colored one that i really wanted sold out instantly and i missed the window for the xxsp. i ordered this in the xs/sp (smallest size available). i am 5'1" and 108 lbs with small shoulders. the neck opening is huge. my collar bones and a seciton of my upper back were exposed. this would not keep me warm due to so much exposed skin on my neck, back, and shoulders. i suppose i could get a

These are fabulous leggings for cold days. i am a teacher who has to do crossing guard duty in the mornings and finally i have something stylish that also keeps me warm! love them and i highly recommend. only con is that they are about 1/2 of an inch shorter than i would like.

I would never have bought this top from the online photo but happily came across in in my local store. i bought it in the hot pink gingham check and it is so cute and fresh. will work well for hot summer days when i may want to wear rolled up sleeves as it is very lightweight and gauzy. i bought my usual xs/0, (5'7", 32b, 115lbs), and whilst it is looser on me than the model, i would still say that it is tts - maybe a little fuller in the back than i would like, but i will wear mine partially tu

Review_Title: Comfortable but you need good undergarments
Review: I love the swing and the pretty color of the clothe. it's fun to clothe up or clothe down. the fabric is a little thin so you will need good undergarments if you have lumps and bumps.

This caught my eye in the store last week, and i decided to try it on. it's the excellent lightweight coat. the photos here show it as activewear, but i think the details on it allow it to be much more versatile. it's very flattering and i found it to run true to size.

Review_Title: Not magnificent for those with a little extra...
Review: I love everything by cloth & stone so was excited to see that they made a clothe. hooray! i ordered it in the xl, which is my usual size in their shirts. when i tried it on i was so sad to see that it barely fit around my tummy and hips! i am a true size 12/14 and the xl just barely gave me enough room to move. my chest also caused the dreaded "button gape." it is clear that they cut the clothe for people with a stick straight figure. so disappointing!!
Fits well (true to size), very stylish and comfortable. i'm going to have to buy these in more colors!
Prior reviewer nailed it with the summary of this clothe. it definitely needs heels. i'm 5'4", 120#, 34d and this is a size 36. i usually wear a size s or 4 with most retailer stuff.

I wear this out, but it's also a super comfortable to lounge around the house in. i measure 35" 28" 40" (6 through the top, 10 in the bottom). i ordered a medium based on comments from other users concerning the top and it being constricting. i didn't find that to be true, but for a closer fit i probably should have ordered the small. overall, this is a fun clothe to wear.

I tried this on at the store and am coming online to order it in petite. i'm 5'1" and the length hit me just below the knee in the regular length so i'm hoping it will hit just above the knee in petite. it was very cute, might run a bit large but simpleally true to size. size down if between sizes. it has a little bit of sparkle beading around the neck which is nice.
I love retailer sweaters! always magnificent quality and design, this one is no exception. i have the navy blue one and it fits well, true to size.
Love this clothe and so does my boyfriend. took my usual size 2 and it's a little snug but the 4 would have been too big.

Review_Title: One of the best denim dusters!!
Review: I was out of town when my coat arrived, and was so excited to get home and try it on!!  i haven't worn it yet, but we've now got the weather for it...and i can't wait!  i'm 5'7" and heavier than i'd like, but the xl fit excellently!

I bought this in xl and it fits just as shown. i could size down to a l and it would still fit because there is a lot of flow to this top. so, if you want a more tailored, but loose fit, then size down.

 but, it isn't boxy. and, the deep v is sexy, but not immodest. and the pocket looks like silk, but it's just polyester. the pleating in the back gives this movement or move-ability, like when you drive. there isn't much pull. 

it's a thin light material and very cool for hot, humid summer

Really magnificent shirt, i made the mistake of ordering normal size (xs) and it was way too small. this is more like ordering in clothe shirt size- so think 4, 6, 8, etc, definitely going to have to send back and order up to s or m. will be a keeper once i get the right fit!

What a fabulous find! i purchased the grey and it looks magnificent with different shades of blue jeans. i am 5'9" 136lbs and wear a size 6..... 34 c and the medium fits wonderful. was worried it would run short, as i am long waisted, but fits just a bit shorted then pictured. i love tucking the front in and letting the back hang out.

At 5'4" i typically order petite clothing...i was unsure of this clothe/tunic-shirt from the photos online, the reviews and the hi/low hem. i ordered xs and pxs (about 118#). both fit as far as shoulders and through the body but the pxs was way too short on me to wear as a clothe without any leggings. the length of the regular xs works magnificent and i feel is appropriate for someone my age! it is buttery soft and so comfortable. i ordered the suede wrap belt to go with it. also, the sleeves are too ti
Magnificent quality, i didn't expect the neck to be so wide but it still looks nice.

I purchased this in the "purple" which is more blue than purple, but you can definitely see the purplish hue depending on the light. it's a beautiful, rich indigo color. it's very comfortable. i usually go for more fitted styles, but i was pleasantly surprised at how flattering this top is even though the body of the shirt is more loose fitting. i'm very excited to wear this top this summer. i haven't worn and washed it yet, so i am hoping the color and material will hold up after washing. i am
This is such a nice little sweater to add to a clothe or tank. fits true to size and i love the tie and hook and eye closure. quality.

Review_Title: Beautiful tiered tank with embroidery for summer
Review: I bought this tank to go with the navy wide legs trousers shown in the picture.  i bought this top in a 12 and could have gone a size down.  i'm very small chested.  i think that for someone with a larger chest it is probably more true to size.  i wanted the extra length, so i'm keeping the 12.  i'm 6 ft, 175 lbs and usually wear a medium or large (10/12) in retailer tops. the layering of the top is very pretty, as is the embroidery.

I had my eye on this coat (in moss) for awhile. i was afraid the vegan leather wouldn't feel natural or soft but i was wrong. it's wonderfully soft - so much so that every time i wear it and tell someone it's vegan leather, they feel compelled to touch it and can't get over the quality. the detailing is magnificent and the back adds a special, interesting touch. it's become my go-to coat and works just as well with jeans as it does with a nice clothe. and who doesn't love getting a compliment every

The review above titled "so disappointed" couldn't have said it any better. the clothees from last year are excellent. i probably wear them at least once a week. i was so excited to see this vibrant blue color and fully expected the same quality as last year. i'm generally an xs or s in clothees (however i have xxs from last year's version), and the xs in this one is lifeless. it's heavy, hot, doesn't have the same nice shape as last year. i may cut out the integrated lining just to lighten the dres
This clothe is breathtaking! it is super lightweight and will be the excellent addition to my suitcase for summer travels! can be clotheed up or down with jewelry & heels.

I think this will work well on very busty hourglass figures,or very petite frames; but on my athletic build this shirt did me no favors. i have one of those body types where my biceps are very muscular, and my shoulders are broader than my hips (w/a 34b chest). i typically take a m or a l in most retailer tops, and, had i kept this, i would have gone with the m.
----------
this shirt hit my arm at the low point of my bicep (~1" above my elbow) and made my arms look huge. fyi, the v neck is very de

Love this coat. it fits very well - i'm 5'6" and typically wear an 8. it is a bit broad in the shoulders like the other reviewers mention, but that's part of its tailored look. this gorgeous coat breaks up any boring winter outfit. so happy with this purchase.
Love this--the chunky ribs, the retro striping, the conservative neckline. all of it. comfy, casual 70's-on-the-slopes vibe. leaving the house in it today wich maroon cords and chunky boots. so cute!
Bought this on sale and wore it to work yesterday with black skinny trousers and leopard flats with a big gold necklace. i'm busty and have to be careful with peplum styles, but this one does well.

This blouse is so much cuter in person! and it's more golden than yellow so it's not as bright which makes it easier for blondes to wear. i tried it on thinking i'd never be able to pull the color off but loved it enough to try, and wow so excellent! i had to get it and it was on sale. love this and happy to add it to my antro collection!

This is such a magnificent top for spring and summer. i've worn it with shorts, capris, and jeans, as well as layered it under a denim coat. it brings an element of whimsy to any outfit. it's comfortable and really well made.
This skirt is a keeper. magnificent quality. beautiful color. magnificent fit!

Cute romper, love the pattern but the material seems cheap and flimsy, and is staticky! for the price it should be better quality. also i'm fairly short and hits high on the leg. not sure how anyone taller could make it work.

This top is light and swingy with a bold pattern that looks even better in person. the neckline is very high, which was a surprise for a summer tank, but it's cut well. nice surprise: on seem pockets! wore it today for the first time and received many comments. a keeper. fits true to size and excellent for my petite build up top.

Magnificent news if you missed out on this tank last year! this s the exact style and cut as last season's buttondown tank released by c&s. 

super flattering fit, not too poofy. it *is* semi-open in the back and the slit goes as high as the last button. super sweet for summer and goes with virtually everything. i reeeeally wish they had this one in more colorways. it's grrrrr8!

for reference i'm 5'6" 103lbs 34a 25 in jeans and i tried on an xs. last year i purchased an xxs petite and it fits exa

I love everything about this sweater. it is very well made, beautiful material and such an effortless way to pull it all together. it runs large which was unfortunate for me as i bought the xs petite and i really need xxs in this one, but none are left. i am 5 ft. tall and weigh about 96 pounds. i can wear a 0 but not in this sweater. it runs very well and i highly recommend it. hope they make more in this style. it is so fresh looking and so comfortable.

I bought this in a petite size s after trying on the regular size in the store. it was a good move because the proportions in length and width are more flattering. the pattern is busy but works well with patterns in the same color group. it has no finished seams on any edge but that makes it drape nicely. it is a soft, soft fabric, almost fleece-like but not plush.
This sweater was far better than expected. very soft, and flattering. it's light to wear, but keeps me cozy in my freezing office. looks super cute with jeans and boots.

I'm 5'2-5'3 which is supposed to be the max height for pieties in retailer (former employee) and while the bodice hit right, the skirt was insanely long. not even with heels is this gonna be right. and no discount towards hemming? i'll wait until this hits the sale rack, which it will because concensus is, it's way too long.

I ordered my usual xs petite, and it fit like a glove (115lbs, 5'1.5"). the v cut a little low, making this clothe almost too sexy for work. cut is extremely flattering, and the coloring being so neutral is a step away from simple lbd. the length was pefect. material is stretchy, amking this slim fit comfortable.
Unique pattern. got lots of compliments! magnificent fall accessory!

This top is completely beautiful. i especially love the richness of the black and burgundy one! i am typically a size medium but purchased the large because i wanted it to fit a little bigger and longer - i was going for more of a tunic-style. if you're broad-shouldered like i am, you may opt for a bigger size as well because the sleeves can look a little silly if its too small.

These trousers look beautiful when you first see them. it goes downhill from there. the waist is very small in relation to the rest of the trousers. it felt fine when pulled up, but it is a struggle. i could get past that, but when i looked in the mirror, i could see right through them. no lining and not very thick material for this price!!! a real bummer, especially since it was a birthday gift.
The price is high and i have to dry clean this? no thanks.

Super cute. cotton is substantial enough not to show bra lines, but light enough to be summery & breezy. i misread "xs" and tried it on, thinking it was a medium, & oddly there's barely any difference among the xs, s, and m sizes--the buttons didn't even buckle out across my bust on the smaller sizes--so, this top could be a nice ego boost if you want to size down (i got the m anyway). armholes not too big, ruffle hides any tummy flaws. magnificent with jeans, shorts, and skirts--like a excellent white

This is such a lovely clothe -- and it looks magnificent on! like other customers, i like the petal hem and the top part, which is stretchy, is soft and not clingy.
 
i think the only drawback is that the color isn't as rich a green as it looks in the pic. i've attached a pic for comparison and contrast purposes.

i'll be wearing this way into the fall!
Comfortable, decent quality and very casual

I bought this at my local retailer store. i bought the last one and when i walked out of the clotheing room a lady asked if i was buying it..uh yeah! this is so cute with jeans or trousers and booties. i bought the yellow. its lightweight and excellent for work or weekend. ive received many compliments. the arm holes were small for me, i bought a size 6, normally i'm a small or xs in most tops. i am 5-2, 130 lbs, petite and fit, the 6 regular was excellent for me, i was ok with it a little longer.

The material, deep color and design are gorgeous. however, the clothe is just too bulky for my 5'2" and 110lb frame. i ordered a 0p, and it just wasn't flattering on me. it's somewhat tent-shaped so the fact that it's not at all fitted and has a thick lining made me look larger than i actually am. i'm so disappointed because the clothe really is beautiful otherwise.

This vest is beautiful and exactly as shown in the model shot. it is soft, warm, and drapes beautifully...excellent length on my 5'7" frame. the leather detail along the edge is a nice high-quality touch. i will say that it is pretty itchy especially around the neck, but wearing a shirt with a collar like it is shown seems to help that issue. the dark color is navy in the print (not black)...overall i think this is gorgeous, but the full price feels a little ludicrous...i think i may wait until sa

It was bit on pricey side but it was love at first sight! i couldn't let go after i tried it on..it is soft, lightweight, moves with me, keeps me warm (not just from top up)..it feels silky to the touch and is very versatile and stylish..

runs true to size and it expands a bit the more you wear it ...

This top is fabulous! so comfy and the lace at the top is just right. it does run a little big but drapes so well it looks fine...i got the plum but tempted to get the ivory,,,especially at the sale price! a steal...

I just received the acacia swing tank and when i pulled it out, i felt like it was christmas day all over. it hangs nicely and felt luxurious on my skin. even my husband was dazzled. the detailing of the flowers is delicate and feminine. the cutaway gives you a sexy, casual chic appearance that you can clothe up or down. i can't wait to unveil this new piece at work.
The fabric is magnificent and the cut is flattering. i have dds, so it pulls a little in the middle. you can just cut from the inside to release the pulling thread.

I was looking for a holiday clothe to wear to the nutcracker and what is more appropriate than a tulle skirt?! the tulle lays fairly flat so it's flattering rather than being poufy. the top is a thick material, but not quite sweater material. since the top is warmer, it should be fine for winter even with short sleeves (and a cute cardigan or furry coat#. i'm going to sparkle it up a bit with a necklace or belt, but it also looks fine without extra accessories. fits true to size, i'm typically a

I love the design of this blouse and the pattern, but the colors are a bit darker than in the photo. the quality is pretty poor. i feel like its a snag away from being ruined and thrown away and for this price it is just not worth the purchase. sending it back :( 
it comes with a tank top; just to let others know.

This is a thick jacquard fabric and the colors are stunning. this would be best for very thin petties or tall women. i'm 5'4", 125#, 27/4, and it was just too much fabric so my waist looked thick. the length was magnificent though. sad it didn't work out

I usually wear a size xs or s in retailer tops, ordered this top in an s and it was so wide on the sides and huge it fit like a tent.  not even remotely flattering.  i thought about ordering it in an xs, however, i could tell the xs was still going to have way too much fabric.  back it goes.

Review_Title: A magnificent addition to any wardrobe
Review: I bought the clothe in mango. i love the color. it is very vibrant. the fit is magnificent and i imagine getting a lot of use out of this clothe during the summer months. my only complaint is that i expected the fabric to be a little bit heavier. i find it to be kind of thin.

Review_Title: Color is too muted and material is odd
Review: It does run a little small. my regular 2 fit but snug. the colors were drab and the material felt like straw. the lining is really silky and nice. just didn't work for me .

This skirt is lovely and fits excellently. the print on the front provides a magnificent contrast to the back of the skirt and stands out. the material is thick enough to take you from fall to winter easily. and the fabric is structured enough to highlight all the right curves. a magnificent purchase.

I bought this on sale thinking it was a magnificent deal, but when it came in i found it to fit like a totally unflattering sack. the pattern didn't help anything, looking totally faded and washed out...the fabric and overall quality is nice, but the fit and pattern are just so..ugly, unfortunately. had to return it.

Tried this clothe in a small. i am 5'6", 135lbs, 34c. the small was huge - the sash helped some, but looked like a potato sack on me. also, i noticed the fabric was piling slighly in the store. i had high hopes for this clothe but left this one in the store.

Review_Title: Tracy reese $$$ - if want to splurge
Review: I'm 5'6", 34b/32c, apprx 125#, & lift weights so i have bigger/muscular lats, back, arms. my lower half i wear sz 25 mother, ag, or 7 mankind jeans, but upper is more med (4-6 sz). hips apprx 35", waist 28". my tops: i don't like things tight. i ordered medium, top fits excellent, but waist/hips i have take in as more like a rigid/stiff, gunny sax cottony type fabric, not super light chiffon as photos appear. the under lining super short in front and top of calf in back, but lining follows the she

I tried this on in the store - i tried regular medium which was way too big except in the chest where it was really tight. the material was a little itchy on me (but maybe its because the chest was tight). the color is lovely (pink). im sure someone will love it but if you are petite, i would order the petite and maybe size up if you are busty.

I felt like i was taking a risk by ordering these without trying them on, but i am so happy i did. they are soft and solid without being thick or stiff. incredibly comfortable. i have a larger hip and booty and these fit magnificent. no grabbing at all and without making the top too big or loose.

I was excited to try something by this designer and decided to order size large. unfortunately, this top just looked very odd. cute from the front but it wings out in the back where the sleeves meet the arms. the fabric makes an odd poof in that area. i do have a large bust and it didn't pull anywhere in the front. i expected it to be soft and drapey but the cotton feels very coarse and doesn't drape well. it covered my behind in back. unfortunately it made me look wide from the side view. i hav

I love this skirt, the colors and the softness. i am little disappointed though that the skirt shrunk quite significantly in a cold water hand wash after the second time of wearing. i don't know if it is the material but i followed the instructions for washing. i am going to keep the skirt because i love it so much and hope that it might stretch a little out with wear and go back to its normal size. despite the shrinkage, i highly recommend.

I tried this topper sweater on at the store but wanted to wait for it to go on sale so i just purchased it with my extra thirty percent off and think it's such a nice deal. i really like how this one is soft, well made, has nice long sleeves and how adorable the inside lining is. the lining matches the print inside the pockets that peak out a bit. i didn't find this one too boxy for me as it's a topper after all. there are no closure buttons or clasps but i think it's a magnificent piece to throw on w
Excellent top! the color is completely beautiful and the fit is better than i imagined it would be! love!!!
It is the excellent shirt that looks and feels magnificent. i wear a size 4 and it fits excellently.

I ordered my usual size 6 from retailer and it fit excellent. for reference i am 5'8" and 137 pounds. unlike the other reviewer i did not have trouble getting into or out of clothe. it buttons down the middle so you just need to make sure you undo them enough to get past your chest;) i really like this clothe. i think it's beautifully made. is it my preferred clothe i've purchased from retailer, no but still a nice clothe:)
I just love this. well made, nice fabric and looks just magnificent over trousers or jeans. im very pleased with this quirky piece and got it on sale too!

It's a phenomenal wardrobe peice. quality, comfort, versatile. clothe it up or down, belt it or not, boots or shoes. i'm 5'3", 115ish lbs, small fit my 34d chest beautifully. a magnificent buy - have fun with it!

I am returning. i really liked the appearance in the photo and i love aqua, but the biggest problem for me is the shape. it's pretty boxy and it's hard to tell from the photo, but it has a batwing shape. i also wish the lighter portion were more ivory (less yellow in it), but that's based on what looks better against my skin tone. i found it to run true to size, but i thought it was unflattering (made me look wide).
I tried this on today and i wish i had taken it home. for me it was true to size, and the star print was excellent. flowy but not in maternity way at all. i'm gonna have to go back for this one!

I tried these jeans on in my regular size and they seemed way too big, but still kinda cute. i went one size down and suddenly they were the most adorable, comfortable jeans that i've every had (and i have a lot of jeans!). i love them! they are very soft with gorgeous fading around the pockets. they are button fly which is unique. i got them on the sale on sale price and they are well worth every bit and more. i plan on wearing them with boots although high heal shoes should be beautiful with t

I'm so in love with this skirt. i sized up to a 4 (i'm typically a 2 in maeve) and it's pure excellention. i had to steam it after getting home from the store because it wrinkled up pretty quickly. wore it with my copper birks and a chambray top but i can see this being clotheed up for work as well. took off a star due to his easily it wrinkled.

I loved this top. i paired it with he ag stevie short and jasper and jeera beaded sandals. look was super cute and casual. i love the fact you can adjust the fit in the back with the lace up detailing. flowly tank without the maternity look. i went with the lavender color and it looks magnificent with my olive skin. i had no problem with sheerness when wearing a nude bra. for reference i am 5'6'' 132 lbs and went with the small.

It's just as cute in person as it was in the picture. the material is very, very soft and 'sweater like'. i ordered my usual size and it fit fine, but i usually wear my clothees a bit looser. i liked it well enough to return it for a larger size.

This sweater is so much cuter than the online picture makes it look! i think the model is wearing it too large. anyway, this runs kind of big, so size down. it's kind of short in the front, but it hits at a nice, flattering spot. love it.

Love the fabric & lace on this top. like other reviews said the arm area is tight where the lace meets the fabric which makes the fit uncomfortable. sadly this top is going back. if you have very skinny upper arms this top will fit fine.

Review_Title: I expected color to be different.
Review: This coat is beautifully made and for $800 i expect no less. however, i should have checked other resources prior to buying. the color on this website is nothing like actual color of coat. i was expecting a nice dark red/wine as depicted on these photos. however, it is a bright magenta/dark fuscia more on the purpleish side that does not go so much with my wardrobe (even though i am a pink-loving person haha). i had hoped to pair it with the same skirt shown here and the peony sweater that was i

I am 5 8", 130 and i usually wear a 4 in tops like this from retailer but the fit of this one was not good for me. though the styling and details of the top are lovely, it was small through the shoulders and very large everywhere else. looked too much like maternity. i love the shape of this kind of top but to be flattering it actually needs to be fitted through the bust and upper body and then flare in the right places and this was pretty boxy all around. too bad - so cute!

Beautiful summery clothe with bright fun print. i think this was well worth the sale price i paid. it lays nicely and is flattering. i went down a size from my normal 8 to a 6. however as other reviewers have said, the arm holes/halter top is too blousy and no matter how tight i tied it or type of bra i wore, you can see bra on the sides. i'm going to get this tailored and then it will be excellent. can't wait to wear this on my vacation!

I ordered the xxs p and it is almost big, so between true to size and big. it is both flattering and stretchy. the waist comes in nicely, the sleeves are not annoying, and the sparkle add to the lbd in my opinion. length was right above the knee.just. i am 115 lbs, 30dd, 26.5 in waist for reference...

Love these trousers! the print is very different, a little quirky, but black and light golden brown mixed together so very versatile. i have very thin legs and these are actually tight on me so maybe too slim for some.good length. they actually hit right at the ankle.
Doesn't feel like cotton jersey. feels like a thin version of the seamless cami. it's not soft as i expected. it's much thinner than expected too.
The color of this cardigan is beautiful, and the material is very soft.

Review_Title: I wish it was the same clothe in the store
Review: I liked the look of this clothe online, so i called my local store and had them hold it in a small and medium because of the reviews. i am a 34dd, and had no issues with the bust on the small clothe. it's a pretty, feminine clothe and i'm glad they had the 20% off sale when i decided to buy it. the reason i'm writing a review is because the clothe here is not the same as the clothe in the store. the clothe in the store is pictured in the "get the look" photo. the clothe in the store has cap sleeves, wh

I bought this clothe in a regular xs. i am 5'3" and 108 pounds. i have a long torso so the regular would fit better than the petite. although the overall fit of the clothe was good, the straps could have had about an inch taken out and the pockets gaped open! in the photo, the mode's arms are laying over where the pockets would be, which fall on the seam and when i tried this on, the clothe fit beautifully but the pockets gape open on the sides and it looks like little wings from the front. the dre

I just received this clothe and i feel like a goddess in it! it is excellent for graduations, weddings, romantic dinners, tropical va cations....heck, i'll wear it to the grocery store! i love it that much!

i am 5'7" with a 34c bust.....i have this clothe in a size 4 and it fits very well. this clothe is slim cut from the shoulder down to the waist. the clothe length hits me at the lower calf, just like the model online. i think the armholes are cut a little high...this being said; this clothe would

I purchased this top in a regular small and unexpectedly, it fits me very well (i'm 5'2", 34b, 26 waist, 36 hips). the hem falls about two inches longer than shown on the model. i like the v-neck the most because the ruffles are not too much, and it's not too low cut. i purchased the white color because i think the pattern is unique and it's brighter for spring/summer. i think skinny jeans and ankle boots or wedges would make the look very stylish. by the way, the fabric is super soft (but not w

I'm 5' 120 lbs. i'm posting a photo. one lady was concerned about it being ok for the over 40 crowd. i wore it was a cami under. see pic. it is comfy. it has pockets and fits beautifully. i ordered a 6petite. it's a little long on me. buy i still like it and am enjoying wearing it.

Review_Title: Beautiful but not for those who are short waisted
Review: I saw the orange/tangerine colored version of this sweater and loved it. it looked beautiful on top. the chiffon material at the bottom of the sweater is a lovely detail. sadly, the bottom portion of the sweater made my hips look huge and i felt i looked pregnant. i weigh 111lbs. i am petite and small boned. i think it was because i am short waisted that this style did not suit me. i wish i could look good in this! it is completely exquisite in color and texture.

I purchased this based on previous reviews. the quality of the clothe and the print is excellent. the clothe fit me excellent in the front however there were so much extra fabric in the back that it made me look extremely large. i understand it's a shirt clothe however the back would need to be taken in like 6 inches. for someone who is looking for a more boxy full coverage clothe this is more for them

I love everything about this tunic clothe. it's versatile and can be styled a few ways: loose like a shift, blouson when cinched, or eliminate the liner and wear as a layer over whatever you want. all the little details make it stand out and give it a glamorous bohemian vibe. there are tiny beads, sequins and subtle micro pleating. the fabric is airy and quite delicate (be careful.) the drawstrings at the waist are adjustable for both sides. slip is tts and the outer clothe has a subtle oversize d

Just as pictured, this little top is just too cute! the fit is exceptional, and quite flattering. another very feminine top, and the yellow color is excellent! i love pairing yellow with black, of course...but also with reds, blues...and it looks magnificent with white 'pedal pushers'!!! i think they call them 'cropped' now a days! at any rate...this is a first rate top that i highly recommend!

I was skeptical when i saw it online. i was not sure about the white background. but it had good reviews and the cut seemed to be what i looked for so i gave it a try and ordered online. i ordered s and xs. i was really surprised how well this clothe fits. i am 5.4 and about 126 lbs, pear shape. the fabric is thicker and lined but not too heavy. the cut is slimming, flattering and structured. i decided to keep the xs size. i hope i can find more clothees like this one in retailer.

Beautiful fabric and beautifully made, but the pockets ruin it... and i love pockets. you cannot see from the photos, but they protrude from the sides a few inches beyond the skirt, and look strange and unflattering, especially from the back. they are unfortunately placed right below the hips, and the effect is like those french bicycle baskets, "panniers." if they were smaller and in the front, the clothe would work. i am usually a size 4 and both the 2 and the 4 fit me well ? not too snug or to

I purchased this shirt to wear postpartum so i could easily be comfortable but still cute. it will work well for the fall with some cute jeans and booties. i cannot wait to wear it....any day now!  magnificent choice.

Love this product; got them in the coral and they are comfortable, easy, flattering & versatile.
clotheed up or down, they always look good, they hang beautifully, and their ease & comfort make them my go to staple in this southern heat!

I debating this clothe for a long time. i just was hesitant because it is very form fitting. i think this clothe runs true to size. after reading other reviews, i was debating ordering a 6 (i'm normally an 8). and i am glad i went with the 8. it is form fitting. the material is just completely beautiful and not stiff. it is a bit thicker, which will be nice in the fall. colors are true to the pictures shown and length falls as shown on model.

I am not a bright clothing person but adore this top. if this is the right red for you i highly recommend.! it is a beautiful bright red no orange tones so really works with my skin tones. it is a very comfy shirt and although it is a stretchy fabric it did not show any lumps or bumps in the upper back. has a beautiful flow to it and looks not only magnificent with jeans but really cute with a patterned sweater pencil skirt i bought at retailer a couple years ago and always with a good old black pencil

This is a lovely blouse. it has an empire waist type cut, which camouflages tummy and hips nicely (especially after a large holiday meal!). i'm usually between a small and medium (4-6) and didn't really notice much of a different between the two sizes.

**note: it does not come with the camisole shown in the photo, but any black or white standard camisole would work.
This is a very cute tunic, but it is slit so high on the sides. i really like the fit, but i think i'm going to return it because it is slit so high.

This clothe is my first retailer purchase in several years. i saw it in the window and had to try it on! i'm quite small, usually a size 0, 2 at most, and 34b at the top. i had to size up to a 4 in this clothe for it to zip up and be moderately comfortable.

i love the 50s vibe of the volume at the bottom. the cotton is nice - glad to see retailer go back to offering natural fabrics!

very pretty color, and print.

As most other reviewers stated, the skirt does run a bit large and long. however, it is nothing a tailor can't fix! i plan on getting it taken in to fit higher up on my waist to make it both smaller and hit closer to below my knees rather than mid-calf. the elegance of the skirt can be clotheed up or down depending on what top/shoes you pair it with. it feels well made and the coloring is much better in person than in the picture!

Very feminine, fun and if you like this style i highly recommend. i am a 6/8 and both fit the same so i went with the 6- 36c bust 29 waist-short torso. fabric nice and light and i need no cami! very attractive blouse and very retailer.

I love it! i was hesitant to spend so much on a suit, but it's well worth the money. i'm 5'3", 140 lbs, and my stomach is my biggest problem area. i ordered a size 8 and it's a excellent fit and very flattering.

While the clothe is pretty, it's a lot more boring than it seems online. the box top is actually a completely separate piece, which is kind of neat - you can choose to remove it or not. the box top is very wide (much wider than on the model) and very unflattering! also, the clothe is a stiff silk fabric and doesn't flow like you would think it would. returning it!

I saw this in store, but they didn't have my size and i balked at the price. however, i kept thinking about it and once i received it from online i now think it's well worth it. the quality is very nice and it fits tts. i like that the arm materials is stretchy. i've worn this with jeans, but will also wear it with a skirt to the office. it's got enough weight to function as a light spring coat. the color matches the photo and is a nice neutral to go with many things.

Even though this shirt is incredibly thin, i love that i can wear it multiple ways throughout the year. it can be used as a swimsuit coverup, with white jeans in the summer, over skinny jeans and with a sweater in the fall/winter. this is a magnificent piece to own!

I was in love with this top from the moment i put it on. it is of high quality, with layers to ensure the top isn't sheer. the embroidery is so pretty and the top looks way less grandma in person. i ordered the petite xxs and it fits excellently. i really appreciate that the underarm holes are just the right size and don't show off any of my bra, which sometimes happens with sleeveless tops. i can wear it with jeans and boots or with a pencil skirt and heels and it looks magnificent with both outfits. o

I know this product description says oversized but that's an understatement. i ordered a small and tried it on and i looked like a little kid in their father's coat. i don't even think an xs would have worked. i'm 5'6" and about 135 pounds for reference. i will say that the embroidery on the back is very cool and this coat is overall a cool concept but it's just way too big.

I love this shirt! i wore it to a friend's baby shower and received a lot of compliments on it. the neckline and shoulders and very flattering, but then i'm not very busty, so maybe that's why it worked for me. the material is hand-wash only, but well worth it for such a unique, pretty top. i also didn't get any weird smell from this shirt nor did i think the material was too stiff.

After reading the glowing reviews i was excited to buy this on sale. i'm tall and lean, but found the clothe looked slightly awkward and off on me compared to the model pictures. firstly, the top has a strange transition to the skirt, with extra fabric you have to either blouse over the skirt or bunch together. if you blouse it and lay flat, it invariably gets bunched as you wear it. this bunching changes the aesthetics of the color blocks, creating less clean lines. i also found the blue, black

These shorts are just beautiful. with that said, they were expensive, but made reasonable when i snagged them in the online sale! they do also run large, and they seem to be made for short-waisted bodies. i will be bringing them back to my local store to (hopefully) exchange for a smaller size. fingers crossed that they still have them in stock!
Love this top. fits true to size. not to boxy,, sleeves are so cute! looks very rich. a must have in your wardrobe!

Review_Title: Sweet and fun without being too young
Review: 5'7", 135lbs, 34c, 27-28 waist. typically wear between a 2 or 4 in maeve. bought an 8 in this. blouse is incredibly sweet - the white is beautiful but i opted for the black bc it seemed more internship appropriate. the front and back are completely different lengths - not a traditional high-low. the fabric has little to no give and the back has buttons running down. size up 1 or 2 sizes to avoid popping buttons! gorgeous with jeans or pair with some fun cigarette trousers (cartonnier, for exampl

I generally don't write bad reviews, but there is a real discrepancy between the quality of this kimono and the cost. the design and colors are magnificent, but the fabric is ripping on all the kimonos on the rack in my store where the manufacturer's tag is at the back of the neck. the material is very thin, so there are other small holes beginning throughout the garment. i shop at retailer all the time, and this is not a $98 item of clothing.
It runs a little large, i got a small and it was still a little large in the shoulders (but maybe that is just my body type). otherwise i love this clothe!

Review_Title: A magnificent, classic t-shirt with flare
Review: I was looking for a classic, white t-shirt that wasn't too big (i.e. a tunic) or too fitted. this was excellent! i love the irregular hemline and the fit. it's not too tight, but not too big either where it looks messy. just a excellent little tee for any wardrobe. runs true to size. i'm a 34d, size 10 and ordered the medium - it fit magnificent!
The quality of this coat is outstanding. color combination is very chic and sophisticated. coat is warm but not bulky.

I am 5'4, 34c, with a pear shape. this clothe fit me excellently in a medium (30 inch natural waist). i had to use a safety pin to keep the bosom from gaping too much, so a smaller chested person would likely not have any issues. however, the material and design were excellently pinup and work appropriate, so i was willing to make adjustments for it.
Horrible fit not true to size again aline outside of the clothe and a very tight camisole underneath
Love these new jeans. they fit excellent and are extremely flattering. they look magnificent with a crop style top and flats!

This top is super cute and comfy! just wish they would have made more xl's - ran out fast! i am 5'10 and usually wear an 8-10 top in retailer, so i purchased a large in this top to get the length and look of the model in the picture. it was too short and didn't fall like the picture, i tried to exchange for the xl and it was already sold out! bummer! was looking forward to wearing this all summer! 4 stars for running out of a size so quickly! please make more!!

Review_Title: Sadly nothing as shown on model
Review: The models pose and description are misleading. this top has completely no shape to it. the front of the shirt is kind of like a slub shirt texture, plain black. the back print is nice,just more faded than shown in picture. the entire design has no form. it is huge. also cheaply made.
I am 5'6" and typically wear a medium. i purchased this shirt in a small. it is big on me. not very flattering but just a cute shirt to wear on a saturday afternoon.

This is a magnificent top. it does run a bit large but it's intended to be flowing. i got so many compliments the first time i wore the top and its actually quite flattering! magnificent purchase, especially on sale!

The fit on these is good for my hourglass shape, and the fabric quality and comfort is good too.i think the rinse is just not as nice in person- the orange stitching is pretty bright too. i bought. a pair from br a couple months ago that are almost identical in quality, fit and color that i got for less than half the price of these. i am going to return these and see if they have something better , but will only buy in store from now on.
