This is stunning. even more stunning in person. the crochet is divine. every inch of it is beautifully detailed. it's got a bit of weight to it and the crochet is very high quality. i am normally a l or xl, and i have curves. this is why this unfortunately did not work for me. it fits more like a shift with a little more aline room. on the right shape, it will be excellent. if you're curvy, size up. if you're lean or narrow, you might want to size down. the length is heavenly for tall gals, but wi

My 16 year-old daughter fell in love with this when we saw it in the store at the beginning of the summer, but it was much, much too expensive. when i saw it on sale at the end of the summer, i jumped on it. she loves it.

These are nice jeans for the price. they are tight at first but do stretch out so i am glad i went with my normal denim size and didn't size up. i wish they didn't have a button fly but it didn't bother me enough to return them.

I love designs that are flowy/drapey in the front, so this hits the mark when tied in the back. has lots of visual interest. but i agree with the other reviewers.. the slip is super small. clothe fits true to size, if not a bit large but the slip is one full size smaller. and you must wear a slip. overall, i'm pleased with the look.

It's pretty, floaty, feminine; the photos don't do justice to the prettiness. but the photos also don't show an asymmetrical hem. i understood it runs small so i got two sizes, to be safe, and even my larger size was strangely short-waisted, and i'm short-waisted to start with. maybe i could've lived with that, but both the clothees i received have an uneven hem unlike any i've ever worn or seen before. it's not longer on just the sides; the hem is longer in one spot on the front, and one in the

I completely love this vest. it fits extremely well and falls nicely. i find the collar/lapel billows or flaps out and away from the interior of the vest and i wish they were sewn or secured down. when you tie the string around your waist, the lapel doesn't lay flat, but if you style it like the online model and tie the string off to tighten around your waist, you get a very flattering look. the color and fabric is magnificent quality and really nice in person. i'm overall really happy with this vest.

Review_Title: Magnificent fit, nice summer color in the lighter denim
Review: The lighter tinted denim is a faded blue-grey that will go excellently with most of my wardrobe, and is more summery than the usual dark denim i wear. these feel like stretchy jeans to me, not leggings. i wear size 28 in most jeans and these fit tts. really nice.

I love the sparkled fabric and intricate design on the back. i had trouble with the front because the cowl exposed a bit too much, so i wore a tank top underneath. ordering a petite may have helped with the cowl.

I felt inspired to write a review as soon as i put this on. the vest fits so well, and the thick fabric feels amazing. love the pockets! like the previous reviewer, i feel like i'll be able to wear this with workout clothes or with a clotheier outfit. it has an ever so slight racer back, so probably would look weird with sleeveless tops that come all the way to your shoulders, but i can already think about so many ways i want to wear it. the draping in the front also falls really nicely. magnificent bu

I was debating getting the petite vs. regular sizing. i ended up going with the regular sizing for the addition couple of inches in length. it is very comfortable and not at all a sweatshirt but more of a heavyweight, wider long sleeve.

I completely love this top. i managed to snag one that had been returned to a store, so i didn't have to order it. i love the cute and the overall boho feel to it. i feel like it's true to size, as i'm normally a medium in retailer.
Very comfortable shirt, light weight top with lovely floral colors. magnificent for spring/summer with white jeans. love everything one september makes!

The fabric is beautiful.  didn't wrinkle so much after 8 hours in a suitcase.  as opposed to the other reviewer mine arrived neatly, stripes match nicely.  i am kind of thick waisted and the size 6 was still excellent for me - i am currently 130 lbs, 34-28-35.  love the colors and the fabric, a nice cotton twill, lined, pockets, pretty bow belt.  i am not a fan of the size zipper style but it is not a deal breaker.  glad i have them !!

With all the white clothees to choose from this year, this was the one i settled on. it is comfortable, the quality is good, especially in the edge detail, it's machine washable (which is a must for me and white), and it is easy to clothe up or down. i am 5'7", 125lbs and found my usual size small to fit tts - it is loose fit like the model shot. easy throw on and go clothe with cute details to boot :)

This is the excellent peplum. it floats a bit but doesn't stick out and is super flattering. that's why i kept mine even though the front seams were like an inch off, and the peplum pleat is crooked. geeze retailer. this is why i can't justify buying much of anything unless it's on sale. quality in recent years has gone wayyyy downhill.

True to size
neckline is not too low so it's magnificent for work
got the red and it's a lush deep color
quite happy with this purchae

Review_Title: Fun twist on a versatile piece
Review: I love this blazer so much i bought it in both colors. i'm 5'7", 120 pounds and bought the size 4 which is excellent. initially when i tried it on in the store i thought i needed the 6 because it was a little tight in the arms and shoulders. the 6 was too boxy on me and i'm so glad i went with the 4. it stretched, especially the arms, and fits excellent. i love how i can clothe this down (with a graphic tee and jeans) or clothe up (with a blouse and cropped black trousers).

Thin for this late in the season, but the colors are so pretty. i'm going to layer it over a long sleeve t, top with a cardi and pair with leggings. runs large. love the the unconnected slip. 5 stars.
Love the fabric, so soft and comfortable. it gives a very flattering silhouette. love those trousers.

I wanted to love this clothe but sadly returned it.  i think it would be more appropriate for someone younger.  it runs very large but its not clingy so forgiving of anyone with chunkiness (such as myself).  i guess i just thought the blue was a little too unexciting (for me).

This is a pretty clothe, although it runs smaller and the colors aren't as vibrant as on the website. the waist ran very small for me in a size 10 which is my normal size and normally runs looser in the waist area as i have an hour glass figure. this probably will look very nice on someone smaller.

I really love how comfortable and versatile this clothe is. the midi length is excellent for booties or flats, and the cowl neck is loose and fluid, so it lays well. the only complaint i had, and it's minor, is the tulip skirt doesn't stay closed well when i walk or sit, which reveals more inner thigh than i am comfortable showing. i have to be very mindful of the skirt all day (i teach high school).

Got this in the white and it fits excellently. just the right length and enough detail on the shoulders. i'm 5'6" and 120 (usually an xxs or xs for tops) and the xs fits just right, not too loose not too tight. i like the style since it emphasizes my shoulders and balances nicely with cropped jeans (i'm pear shaped). material is slightly clingy but it adds to the drape nicely (wouldn't work well if it was fitted, but it's not).

Saw this online, but it said the store was out of stock. imagine my surprise when i went to my local store and found it in both a small and a medium in white.. i tried them both on, but not a lot of difference in the sizing. the small had a smaller head/neck opening causing it to be a bit tough to remove without getting makeup on it, which the small did. the medium fit very very close to the small, but a smidge bigger at the neck. the shoulders of both seemed to fit the same, with maybe a tad mo

These give an amazing slimming effect and i love the dark wash and fit on the waist. only negative is that being 5'4 and a size 30 the length of the trousers is a few inches too long for me. i still love them but will have to wear heels with them always.

This top is gorgeous and flattering for spring. the fit is beautiful. one thing - i find that the seam that goes across the stomach does chafe a little bit. however, with a light tank underneath this is no issue at all and the top is well worth it.

This top is very cute and is made out of soft material that isn't clingy at all. and you don't have to be stick thin for it to look good. i don't like to show my arms normally but this top is very flattering all around. i love it!

Review_Title: Magnificent clothe but runs very small
Review: I had to return the 2 for a size 4 and it is still snug in the ribs. i am very petite and usually wear size 0 and xs. the regular length hits me excellently above the knee as i like. the previous review to order up was good but i'm writing to say i had to go up 2 sizes. i am 5'5" 110 lbs, small frame.

Review_Title: Meh... not doing it for me
Review: Maybe if i sized down to a small i'd like them better.. they look ok from the front. but it seems like the leg was cut way too wide. there is exceess material in the back and leg hole. they are not all flattering to my rear end. overall kind of shapeless and the fabric is prone too wrinkling. too expensive (with the added shipping fee for an online exclusive) for the lack of structure and simplicity.

Finally a clothe that ticks all the right boxes: mostly natural fibers, lovely details, fantastic pattern placement, and an easy fit that doesn't require alterations. 
.
the dark blue cotton is similar to my embroidered floreat 'sunless skies shift' from around 2008 which looks like new after so many years (but required alterations even in petite). 
.
i'm 5'2", currently 33-25-37 (30d/32c bra). the size 0 regular fit me and ended just below my knees. a bit low cut, and a tiny bit below my nat

Review_Title: Love it sadly has to go back
Review: This sweater is one of a kind just like many pieces from retailer. the design is super cute the color is excellent and others dont like the sheer material however for me since it's not see through i really like it. the reason for a return is they sent me the wrong size..ordered a small (i checked my order) and i got a xs petite. so sad since large is the only size left.

I tried this in the fish print and the pallas stripe. i did not like the fit of the fish print, but the stripe is excellent--so try more than one color if you are interested in this style. also try more than one size of course. i almost always order up in a swimsuit, and this time was no different. the medium fit magnificent, although i am a xs-s according to the size guide. i am a 34b for reference, but i think my rib cage is somewhat wide. i do not like to feel constricted, but i still want the top to

I ordered the purple color and the first time i wore it, i received multiple compliments on it.  i noticed in the prior reviews that it runs big so i ordered an extra small instead of my usual small.  it fits well other than the two buttons at the top of the neck are very small and difficult to button.  i'm tempted to order the red color.

This clothe is beautiful - the pictures do not do it justice. i love the fabric and overall feel of the clothe - light and airy. i have very broad shoulders and i did not feel like it look good on me so i am sending it back. too bad for me! i think the clothe is excellent for weddings, parties and even everyday wear.

Lots of seam and stitching details make this even cuter than the picture's initial impression. fabric drapes nicely. the sleeves are a little tight if wearing something long-sleeved underneath. overall very unique!
This clothe is wonderful. fits excellent. very comfortable. wonderful colors.
This clothe is gorgeous! it is a little sheer even though it has many layers.

Review_Title: I'm wearing the hadley tunic for my birthday!!!!
Review: Love this top! tried on a small in the store as it was the only size the had. the sales person ordered me a medium on line. i am wearing it tomorrow for my birthday! the stretch fabric is very flattering.

This actually might be my preferred thing that i have ever owned.  the coat is so beautiful and so cozy coat. i agree that the pics do not do this amazing piece justice.  for reference, i am 5'7 140 lbs and bought the large to allow a bit of room for layering.

I purchased the floral patterned version and get complimented every time i wear it. i found it to be pretty true to size, even after washing. it's a little sheer, so you'd definitely want to wear a camisole underneath for work. it's a magnificent top for spring/summer!

Quirky tunic length top. has a windowpane print on the inside and the grey plaid looks like flannel but is cotton. the red burgandy embroidery adds punch and it has a boho flair. size down one size runs big.

So i typically avoid jumpsuits, rompers, etc. but there is always something that still makes me try them! and every time i'm disappointed. inevitably. which is such a bummer! so i knew this time wouldn't be any different, plus there was only an extra small available to try. which i'm definitely not an extra small, usually a medium maayyyyybe a small. but i kid you not, it fit excellently!! it was super flattering in every way!! the material is so soft, and light weight, but still thick enough. i a

I needed a white denim trouser and this one fits fine. it isn't as slimming as i had hoped for because it isn't a stretchier denim. but, my husband says he likes how they look and they do fit. trousers are not easy for me. i have a generous booty and thighs and a small waist. quality is good.
This skirt is adorable. i like it because its different and i like this length. the cactus look gray in the picture, but they are green.

I love this sweater - i've gotten compliments on it every time i've worn it! i have the moth color and it is oh so cozy, yet not too big or too heavy. i pair it with black leggings, black booties and a crimson-colored scarf. it's nice as it can be magnificent for day-to-evening. getting the other two colors asap! the medium fits me excellently.

Excellent for the summer weddings that i am attending. i am 5-1, 119#, 32dd and usually a sp. i tried on a regular s and xs in the store, and the s was huge. i ended up ordering the regular xs instead of the petite xs when the 20% off sale hit because i liked the extra length. magnificent bra coverage...it is not too long at the armholes, or too low in the back. i will take it up a bit in the top seams just so it doesn't have quite so much decolletage, but it is wearable as is. this is much more of a ro

Review_Title: Dangerous beads on back-will rip upholstery
Review: Nice clothe, but the leather seats of my car were ruined when the sharp metal beads on the back made deep scratches~ not fun at all. now i must carefully take them out, bad design feature.

Perhaps i purchased the wrong size. i will return to a store and try on the small. the medium just looks a little sloppy on me. i completely love the length and the color. will likely exchange for a smaller size and wear it all spring and summer.

Review_Title: Soft and cute as can be!
Review: This is an adorable top that i find to be extremely comfortable. i don't usually buy prints but this one is so feminine and looks magnificent with dark wash jeans. i am a 36d and the medium was a excellent fit.

I'm glad i listened to my instincts once again regarding maeve maxiclothe. the stretchiness of this knit jersey fabric allows me to comfortably size down from my usual medium/large since the fabric relaxes so much as you wear it. i adore the color, pattern, slim profile and cut in arm holes. wearing this makes my short self feel statuesque and sofisticated.

Review_Title: Fantastically stunning but try before buying
Review: Like the other reviewer, i was super lucky to find this clothe at my local stores. i tried both the medium and the small. usually at retailer, i wear a medium. however, this clothe in a medium did not look flattering on me. it hung off my shoulders and the material was too loose in between the velvet tiers, making my bottom look bumpy. when i tried on the small, the clothe fit and flattered me excellently! by far the best clothe i ever owned. i truly recommend you try this clothe on before purchasing. fo

I am completely addicted to tunics. so, when i saw this on sale, with an extra 30% off, i went for it. i'm glad i did! it's completely beautiful. i love the opposing stripe patterns, the hi-lo feature (very subtle), and the tie back. so cute!

if you're petite like me, though, you may want to wear something underneath--it does cut a bit low in the chest area.

A beautiful shawl but not practical. i was impressed with how elegant/romantic it first felt/looked.  however, after 5 minutes of wear, it would not stay on my shoulders. the design is very awkward and despite several attempts with different tops/tanks underneath, i kept running into the same problem. lovely for the first 5 minutes of wear and then awkwardly/annoyingly wouldn't stay on my shoulders. the neckline is undefined and it just fell off. not a magnificent design. disappointedly returned it.

Gorgeous but just too short in length for anyone with a long torso.  i sized up to get more length, but then the neck opening was way too big and hung open to expose - well, everything up top.  wearing a cami would be an option but would take away from the clotheiness of the top.  i had to leave without this item, but was disappointed because i love the colors and cut otherwise!
Mutliple layers of buttery softness. i bought the blue and it's true to size. it is soo soft, i could wear this to sleep. it drapes beautifully. highly recommend it. now i want to buy all the colors!

I really like the sundry brand. however. this is thin and to me out of character for an retailer tee. it look adorable in picture. however the coloring is way off. the navy is almost black it's so dark and the kaki stripe is a green. it's nothing like i had hoped it would be. fabric in very thin and more like a pajama top. so disappointed. it will go back. i do not make it a habit to bash a product. however with tax, shipping and 83.00 price tag. 103.11 is completely terrible.
This is a magnificent sweater. magnificent color and style. i love that it's a little retro. can be worn with jeans and tights. highly recommend. it does run a little big, but not by a lot.
I have always bought interesting, pretty, wearable clothees for my daughters at retailer. now the clothees are just retro funky. sad to see.

This clothe was built for my body to disguise it's flaws. i did have to size up because i am broad shouldered, busty, with a tummy pooch and no hips. this clothe skims along all that mess and makes me look slimmer. received the package today and am wearing it right now, i'm so happy! i ordered size 10, my stats are 5'3" 145# 36dd.

I live in south florida so i'm always looking for sunclothees that will be flattering (but not too clingy or hot), and that i can take from day to evening with accessories. when i pulled this out of the box and walked around in it, it met all my criteria, and as an added bonus, my husband said, "wow! you look magnificent! where'd you get that clothe?" i'm shocked because as an earlier reviewer said, this clothe doesn't seem like much - it's not even lined. but it's comfy, flattering (in all the right pla

Review_Title: This is a magnificent casual clothe!
Review: I love this clothe. it is very cute and comfortable and magnificent for football games / everyday wear. it is a little long, which is magnificent for me since i'm taller.

I wasn't sure about this clothe because some of retailer's cloths can make a women appear older before her time. i have to say that is not the case with this clothe. i ordered it with the green and mint patterns in my normal size 2. this clothe could not have been more beautiful on. i'm 5'6 115lbs and it fit excellent. the colors really compliment my dark hair and fair skin. i won't even need sunless tanner. i highly recommend this clothe and placed the designer on my list to try out again.
I completely love the look and fit of these trousers. what is even better is that they don't stretch out while wearing them. i will get a lot of use out of them!

Really beautiful clothe, too special for me as a guest at a wedding. i think this can be used as a wedding clothe in an informal intimate wedding. it is shift clothe, so not accentuate your body which is to be expected. it is running small. with my athletic body especially up top, the chest/arms are tight. i could have gone a size up but the body might be too big. i unto lately returned.

I love this clothe. length falls as shown on model. i'm not sure if this fits true to size or not. i am normally a medium and kinda wished i would have ordered a large. i find that the neck is too tight and have to loosely tie it. also, the lining is smaller inside and it ends up causing the arm hole areas to roll inwards. so i feel like the back end up being sort of cape like. it's rather weird. the large may have too much material though. but overall, i still love this clothe minus those few fla

Having read all the reviews, i still (bravely) ordered in a size 2 (i can be a 0 or 2 in this brand)...first reaction? adorable style. second reaction? who was the model for this? i am pear shaped, and not short waisted, but the waist is low, and the top is snug...afraid a 4 would be too much top, but don't relish constantly pulling the clothe down to keep the waist where it should be. am going into my local mall store, to see if they do have a 4...perhaps that will be better. really hesitant to
These shorts are super comfy and the color is awesome!

I love this clothe. i live in maxi clothees versus shorts in the summer and this is the excellent cut, weight and quality. i did have to order it in petite or else i was stepping on the bottom (unless really high heels). i am 5'5", so i would say that it runs long. offer this cut in more colors!!

Magnificent fit, a little stiff. i typically wear a 4, and was able to take a 2 in this skirt, though a 4 would probably have been fine! it's just a fun skirt, with a little shimmer to clothe up an outfit.

I loved this the minute i saw it in the store but left without buying it.  i called the store an hour later and asked them to hold it for me so i could get it the next day. :)

i love it.  it's still a little too warm to wear it in nyc yet but i will soon. i'm thinking 40-50's is the excellent temps for it.  

i rarely say this but i don't think the photos of the coat above do it justice.

I saw this online and loved it, then when it was on sale i went into the store and tried it on and i couldn't resist. the only size that was left in stores was an xs petit and i didn't think that it would fit me because i am usually a regular s/m but it was super comfortable and very stylish. it wasn't too big or too small, it fit me just right without any awkwardness.

The color says red but it's more like a rust. i'm 5'3" so it was long and would need to be tailored and the fabric is so thin i was afraid it would rip if it got caught on anything.

finally returned it without it making it out the door :(
I really wanted to love this top, but there is way too much fabric. it looks nothing like the pictures. it was more like a maternity top vs. a swingy top. i'll be returning this one.

Review_Title: Beautiful and unique but didn't work for me
Review: Ordered the xsp (5'4" about 118-120#, athletic build)...this was huge all over. big in the armholes, too much fabric hanging in the skirt (cream fabric) front and back, not flattering at all from the sides and as long on me as it shows on the model. i love the idea of this and for the right body type (of course) this will be beautiful. it also would not be a very versatile piece for me...the top sweater part is quite thick (lovely) and heavy. in oklahoma this would not work for very many weeks..

Like another reviewer mentioned, this shirt is way too short. i'm only 5'2" (xs) and there is no way this top would tuck in like on the model. also, the quality isn't magnificent as it's very thin and there are strings hanging from some of the seams in the front. it's a shame b/c the print is really pretty and there is this cute little bicycle charm on the tag which makes it feel more unique. sadly, it's going back!

This is one of the best tops i've ordered. it fits well, it can be worn clothey or casual. what is pictured is what you get. if you are considering this top, it can be worn all year round! the price is not outrageous, and the quality seems it could last for more than one season.
This clothe looks magnificent on me. it gives a slender appearance which hides a lot and it's easy and comfortable to wear.

Review_Title: Kinda cute, but elastic too tight around the legs
Review: These felt like they were cutting off circulation around the calves. i tried pulling them lower to reduce the tightness but that made them way too droopy between the legs. an alternative would be to clip the elastic, but ultimately decided to return.

This is a excellent saturday t shirt for the colder days. magnificent fit; not form fitting with no elastic or rayon, soft cotton with magnificent details. im 5'8 140 ish and the medium fit magnificent. i bought a washed denimy blue in the store but may be coming back for more colors now! the white was to sheer for my taste though

Love love love this tunic. it has panels that don't really show up in the picture but the panels make it lay really nice. it's magnificent over leggings and skinny jean cords. could even wear it with opaque tights. it's magnificent for work, play or evening. i bought the navy blue with the heart print. i love it so much i'll probably get the green and the red when they go on sale. this is a pricey top. for reference i'm 5"3 128lbs. 32ddd fits magnificent all the way around and the length is excellent - mid-thigh an

Finally a jumper that works for me! i am 5'6 but i have a long torso so most jumpers ride up in an uncomfortable way. this one is excellent. the material is light and excellent for warm weather. the top is very adjustable for all different chest sizes. i personally think the trouser length looks better if you are under 5'8" because it comes down closer to the ankle but then again if you have long thin legs you might not mind the bottom hitting at your calf. i can't say enough good things about this jum

I read the previous comments and was skeptical. i love the clothe! it's fitted on the top and flowy on the bottom. i didn't find it too big or maternity on the bottom half. the print is really pretty with flecks of blue that brightened up the clothe.

Retailer is known for their unique designs and this one does not fail to disappoint. i usually wait for items to go on sale but knew i had to have this one in my collection due to the fact that it can easily be worn with a pair of trousers. the actual shirt is a bit shimmery which you can't tell by looking at the photo. i didn't mind it and thought it was actually a plus! i just think it is a bit too expensive, because although it is nice quality, i don't feel it is worth the price tag. pretty
Just purchased it in store - very soft and cozy, magnificent neutral color too. i am usually s, but bought it m just to have it slightly oversized.

As much as i buy from retailer, this is my first review. the pictures do not accurately show how large this clothe is in person. i wanted something that was a bit flowy, but this was a reminder of little house on the prairie. the most unflattering clothe ever and since it's only available online, i'm not interested enough to try a smaller size.

Love these jeans. fit magnificent. i've had other colored denim from ag that stretched out too much, were too thin, but these are a nice thicker fabric. i ordered the red and the moss, and the red fit a little better than the moss in the same size. not sure if the dye process affects the fabric but the red pair seemed a bit more substantial. the moss is magnificent too though, so i may keep both.

I am so glad i had read the other reviews of this coat which prompted me to order. magnificent fit and cut with a hint of stretch, nice styling details, magnificent vintage color. i wasn't in love with the price but after receiving the coat i would gladly pay the price again. will definitely be in my wardrobe rotation for years to come!

This is a very beautiful and well-made skirt. it looks a little like ribbon material. it is very think and lush, and the pockets add a little extra special to it. the waist band is very sturdy and it wears very flattering. even putting my hands in the pockets feels very thick and silky. i am 5'1" with a 27in waist and the size 2 fit really well, just above the knee.

As other reviewers have pointed out, this coat is way prettier in person than it is in the photos. i can wear it with just about anything. the fabric is soft and lightweight, and drapes really nicely. my only complaint is the photos make the taupe coat look like it has just a hint of peach/mauve, but in person it's a pretty standard beige. i would have liked that hint of color.
I really love this rose-pink color. the trousers fit like a glove. the cuff is not sewn up, so you can lower the cuff to where you like it.

I was pleasantly surprised by the quality, cut, and softness of this clothe. it can be clotheed up or down, with or without leggings/tights, and is cute with boots or flats. my only complaint is that the sleeves are not near as long as what is shown in the photo. i'd say more like 3/4 sleeves. thankfully there is elastic at the cuffs, so the sleeves can be pushed up, and the the material can slightly drape over the elastic.

This is such a pretty top.  i love the mix of patterns. the colors are beautiful!  it really looks magnificent on.  the peplum is very minimal in this top.  the entire top itself is somewhat oversized, but in a pretty way.  i bought this in a large and probably could have gone with a medium, but didn't want the length to be any shorter, so i'm sticking with the large.  for reference,  i'm 6ft and 175lbs.  i usually wear a size 10/12 or medium/large.  also, i didn't notice a puckering between the two m
Excellent way to add warmth in transition weather
I bought this late in the season and love the way it fits and looks.

Review_Title: Just as soft and stylish as the trousers
Review: I was very happy to see these longer length shorts (i have 2 pair of the shorter ones and loved them last summer) so i ordered them immediately. i am curvy and wear a 29 in pilcro and ordered the navy, which is a lovely color and will go with everything. i think they fit magnificent and i like the fact that they are a looser style. i will buy more when they go on sale.
The fit and feel of this top is lovely. magnificent shirt to layer. fits magnificent, i get compliments every time i wear it.

This is a lovely, romantic skirt that hangs nicely. it is lined except for the ruffle on the bottom. as others have said, the waistband is stretchy and molds to your shape. it is high waisted. i called the store to hold a size 4 and 6 for me to try. when i got there, i finally settled on a size 2, so it runs a bit large. i have a 25 inch waist and 36 inch hips. if this fits your style, give it a try, you won't be disappointed.
Very soft fabric. does begin to ball up due to boucle material, very common

I really like the look of these socks, and have become obsessed we over-the-knee socks for winter this year. they are very tick which is nice for keeping warm and for durability for a long lasting product. my only complaint is that they are very difficult to get over the knee. this can be a magnificent thing, because they certainly do stay put-which is a huge problem with over-the-knee socks. however, by the end of the day i was pretty sure i was going to lose a leg from poor circulation.

i am still
I sew and therefore i can tell when something is cut and designed well. this top hangs beautifully and the colors are very pretty. it's cotton.

I first tried this clothe in my usual size 4, and thought it was a pretty fabric but boring and not particularly flattering.  i later read the positive reviews and the next time i was in the store i tried it in a 2, and it was so much better!  very pretty shape.  uiu might want to size down because the shoulders were set a little wide apart and bodice was gapping in my usual size.  for reference, i'm 5'6", 125 lbs.
Cute little sleep mask! the elastic band is wide so it doesn't ever feel like it's digging into your head. does a very good job keeping out light.

Review_Title: Boxy, navy color looks darker than pictured
Review: I tried this sweater on in the store. i love the design and was hoping it would look as good on me as it does on the model. first off i should point out that the navy color in the featured photo looks much lighter than the sweater does in person. some of the photos accurately represent how dark the blue is (it almost looks black) but the featured photo shows it more like a medium navy. secondly, anyone looking to purchase should know it is very warm. if you are buying to wear mostly indoors you

This shirt fits really well- i ordered a size small and it's definitely a bit form fitting. i was a little bit hesitant to purchase this at first- for a tshirt it's a pretty hefty price. but the quality and cut are really quite attractive and worth every penny.

I bought this in the grey as shown in the photo as i'm not fond of horizontal stripes and i felt the striping would distract from the floral accent of this tee. the gray is light and as pictured in the photo.

i bought an xl and the fit is tailored, with some loose flow to it. it is not boxy or big on me.

the fabric is a soft, soft, thin cotton knit and very cool for hot, muggy summer days....esp. in the southern us where it can be pretty intense. since i bought the gray, it's not sheer, al
Magnificent with leggings and skinny jeans! it's comfortable too!

I ordered this clothe in a size 12. i'm 5'9'' and 180lb. i usually wear size 14 but the 12 fit beautifully. the material has a nice stretch to it so that i think it would still fit whether i gained or loss 10 lbs. when i pulled it out of the box i immediately thought it read "grandma", but was pleasantly surprised when i put it on. it is snug in the waist and flares out nicely from there. it hits me on the knee exactly as it does the model in the picture. i plan on wearing this maybe for christma
Nice fit, wish it was a little longer but i really do like it and feel good when i wear it

I'd been looking for a replacement for my faux leather coat and this has surpassed my expectations. well-made, lovely color, very soft, flattering cut. it runs small so i sized up from my usual petite xs to a petite s. it's warm and the lining is very pretty. hopefully it'll hold up to daily wear. i'd definitely recommend it as a magnificent coat to take you from fall - spring. i got the plum color.
I love this shirt. the colors are just as depicted. the material is gorgeous and the top is very flattering. fits true to size for retailer small (i'm normally a medium outside of this store).

This suit is well made, and is so darn cute. i usually wear a 6, but i am a size 8 in this (8 us size, although the main tag is australian size. they send out based on the us size ordered). the only issue i have is that i have a long-ish torso compared to my size, so it's ever so slightly tight in the crotch, but not enough to make me send it back. i have small boobs, so the extra padding is nice. i'm and athletic 5'6" and 130 lbs.

I ordered this for my mom in color "blue motif". i could not see a difference online between the colors "brown motif" and "blue motif" - both looked grey to me. in real life blue motif looks grey with a very light bluish tinge to it. it looks like grey wool and light grey-bluish fiber was interwoven, but you have to look very closely to see that. i guess i would have prefered a pure white or cream color but that is a matter ot your pesonal taste i guess. the cardigan style is an oversized one. t
It's not as form fitting & hour-glass shaped in real life as on the model. i think they must have clipped it in the small of her back so it does not look so boxy. otherwise it's nice.

This is my third clothe by this designer. i love his work. this will be the most versatile and classic of the three.
i love how wearing his clothees makes me feel... my best and comfortable. unique and well made.

While i love this top ( beautiful color and pattern) i found it to be a bit short.  if it were a few inches longer i would be thrilled.  i'm 5'8 ,  curvy, and have a long torso-- so that may be the problem. i will say that within 2 hours of wearing this, i had 5 strangers stop me and comment re: how pretty it is. i am keeping it :)

Have to disagree with previous posters. i found just one of these on the sale rack in my local retailer (someone returned it from online) and it was adorable on. got many compliments in the clotheing room area. other customers asked if there were more available but it's turns out it's an online exclusive. it does have a zipper. i recommend sizing up not because it runs small (i think it's pretty true to size) but i think it looks better a bit loose/drapery. fabric is soft and pretty. tailoring is f
This magnificent weekend staple is the excellent lightweight coat. it has a roomy, comfortable fit but the drawstring helps you create a bit of a waist. got lots of compliments on the embroidery.

I love off the shoulder looks and had high hopes for this top. unfortunately the folded top portion doesn't stay down at all. i found myself pulling at it all day and eventually gave up. the material is also not the best.

The shirt brings back the '60s look of appliquã©d patches on shirts. it is a quality piece with a bit of humor. the length is shorter than usual for chambray shirts but also very comfortable . it could be left open as a light coat over tees and tanks. fabric feels good on skin.

I stared at this clothe for a long time online and finally went into the store and tried it on. it is a beautiful quality and material. note that it is ivory, not pure white, which is exactly what i was looking for. the fit is more of an a-line and it is slightly long which is part of the style of the clothe. i am taking it with me to a beach vacation in mexico but i plan to wear to many more occasions because this could easily be clotheed up or down. just don't wear it to a wedding since it is a w

I bought the red motiff in my usual size of xxs petite and it was huge. at first i thought they had mistakenly sent the wrong size but this was sadly not the case. the fit is definitely "sack-like" as other reviewers mentioned. i had to return.
Cute comfortable top. fits well and will look magnificent with skinny jeans.

Review_Title: Bettors off the shoulder top is a must!
Review: I fell in love with this top online and was even more pleased when it arrived. it's pure romance in a top. i went to the store and they didn't have it in yet, so i ordered it at the store. free shipping if ordered from store. i was extremely thrilled with everything about this purchase.

Review_Title: Nice design but high maintenance fabric
Review: I like the style and the design of this culottes, but the texture of the fabric will caught on any rough surface. i had a few loose loops for just one wear... so it will be nice to wear for work or shopping , but not good to go to the park or play with kids...

Review_Title: Magnificent top - wish it came in more colors
Review: This tank is well made and the top part is doubled (partially) so you can get away without wearing a bra (if you wish). i'm 5'1 and tried on the standard xs in store because xxs was not available. it was a little bit longer on me than on the model pictured. the pin-tucked area fit well, not too tight or loose and the bottom part was flowy which i don't mind. i expect this top to shrink in the wash a tad which would make it excellent for me. i opted for the white vs. the black because i love the pi
This looked really pretty but i think i am just too short for it. a little on the wider side. would look good on someone taller

I like this top. it provides a nice pop to the fall/winter dark wardrobe pieces. the picture gives off a blue hue, but the top is black, kind of a dusty black. the picture also gives the impression that the leaves are turquoise, but they're actually more green. at any rate, it is nice addition to my very dark winter wardrobe. i cannot wait to wear it with white denim like the model and something in the green family. i definitely recommend it.

This tank is super soft and very well fitted. it fits true to size. the lace is so pretty in front but what makes this unique is the lace on the back of the top. it is a unique design and good quality!

What a clothe! the print, the feel of the fabric, and the overall fit of this clothe, it definitely has the wow factor! i plan on wearing this clothe to the kentucky oaks this year. i typically wear a 6 and sometimes a 4 in retailer clothees. i'm 5'6'' 130 lbs 32dd and took a 6 in this. i could probably even try the 8. it fit a bit tight in the bodice for me but i'm not sure if it warranted a size up. it is pricey but i see this being a closet staple and one of my preferred maxi's yet.
The embroidery details on this top are beautiful. the material is soft and a really good quality. my first time wearing out and i received so many compliments! i love it!

I thought this top was purely elegant. i'm 5'4", and 135 lbs. i ordered a small and it fits excellently. i thought the fabric was soft, but somewhat sheer on the top. it goes magnificent with just about any trouser.

I saw this online and loved it. i wanted to wait for a sale and a promotion, but this tee-shirt sold out in the color holly. completely sold out but for petite. i bought a s and a m. the small works. it is comfortable. it can be clothey or very casual. i bought the white and the carbon. it is a different style on a tee. if you notice the front neck and the bottom of the back you will see what i mean. i recommend this highly. i can't imagine anyone not liking it.

Review_Title: Love the look for the holidays
Review: This velvet t-shirt is excellent for the holidays! i usually wear a size 12 top, or a l, but i ordered up and got a size xl. it is very tight around my chest (36c) and armpits, and the v-neck sometimes spreads apart a lot if i move my arms around a lot. but other than that, it looks magnificent, just runs small. if you are a size 14 or larger, i don't think that this will fit.

I don't usually have the best luck with trousers from retailer but something made me try these on. i am so glad i did! i love the fit and the fabric, they are so soft and comfortable.. i loved them so much that i bought an additional pair of the grey wanted the turquoise but they were sold out of my size so i settled on the sand... i will definitely try other styles of the pilcro.
Love this soft sweatshirt. the peplum makes it a little different and the quality is magnificent. go to piece for spring. loose fitting but true to size in shoulders.

It actually is a pretty good t-shirt, but i wish that i had known that "white" actually means oatmeal with bits of grey and beige. i bought three and will now need to return them all. hopefully i can find it in other colors i like.

I love this clothe and would have bought it on the spot without hesitation if i just had an event to wear it to! i am plus sized (18 trousers, 16 clothe, 5' 7", 36-38 ddd) and i never size down but i was able to with this clothe because it is so flowy. the clothe hit just below my knee and the only fit difference i saw when i tried on the petite is that it was slightly shorter (still no thigh showing). this would be flattering on completely anyone! if you are worried about bulges this clothe will give y

When i ordered this all the petite sizes were no longer available. i tried the xs. it was actually a nice length for me (5'4") and even the arm openings were not too large which is a plus. i expected all the extra flow and material on the back of the tunic but there was too much fabric on the front too...very unflattering. if it had been a closer fit on the front i probably would have kept it. the color is very nice but the fabric is pretty standard...nothing that makes it stand out. it is very

I'm 5'5" 120 lbs and bought this in size medium because i have long arms and was afraid that the cashmere would shrink even if i hand-wash and dry flat (because let's be honest--i doubt i'll ever send it to the dry cleaner). it's loose through the body and arms, but the sleeves are the excellent length. the term "bell sleeve" is no exaggeration. the sleeves are billowy and voluminous and i can see them getting in the way while washing my hands or doing dishes. i guess i will have to reserve this s
Regarding the product, high quality materials and overall make. extremely comfortable and flattering cut. i'd love this in all the colors of the rainbow.

I agree with the other reviewer, the picture does not do this coat any justice at all. the material drapes beautifully and is easily cinched or opened up for slightly different looks. i kind of consider it more of a cardigan than a coat and plan on wearing it over everything. i tried it on over workout gear and it looked magnificent than wore it over jeans and a chunky sweater and it looked awesome. very versatile and flattering.

Don't be fooled by the image; unless you have a c/d chest, this romper has masses of draped fabric right around your middle--exactly where you want it least! very unflattering and rather expensive for the poor quality. back it goes!
This price is amazing and goes with everything! fits magnificent! so glad i made this purchase.

About a month ago i purchased the pilcro hypen chinos in moss size 28 petite. i loved the color and fit so much that when i saw free shipping being offered i decided to get another pair. this time i ordered the color ?pink? and of course size 28 petite. well the color really isn?t pink and unlike the moss color it does not look the color online. the color is more like salmon or apricot definitely not pink. what bothered me more is the fit. this pair was too big. it?s mind-boggling why the sizing

Just a warning. i am always a 6 or 8 and even the 8 was so tight in the waist i could barely out this on. if you don't have a super tiny upper waist, this won't fit well. too bad, because it's super cute, if a bit sheer.

I'm 5'5 and 130lbs and i was swimming in the small. the arms are very boxy, the sleeves too long, and and it just wasn't a flattering fit at all. the color and design on the front are both nice. the sweater is made in china and very, very itchy. i own wool sweaters and wear them with layers, but there was no way this was going to be comfortable. very disappointed, especially given the price, but perhaps that's why there are so many left at the end of the season and on sale. this one is going bac

I love this little number. the quality is terrific, the weight is excellent, and the cut is superb. i love the way it fits and looks in the arms. i ordered my usual xxsp and it is excellent. i like that it is cool and flowy, without looking like maternity attire. i have the bright turquoise and i am going to order another. i was about to order what looks like a yellow one, but i noticed the color is labeled "chartreuse". can anyone tell me if this is more yellow or green in "real life"?

I have been dying to try a mara hoffman bathing suit, so i went for this one. unfortunately, the design of the bathing suit is not like what they sent me. the middle where the tops meets the bottom, is squared off, not like that v that it looks like in this photo. it also makes for important side boob/sagging on each side. i was very disappointed.
This shirt is very flattering on. it's excellent to wear to work and also in a casual setting. it is rather short so it would be best to pair it with high rise trousers!
This clothe is beautiful. even my husband complimented it several times. true to size. due to the button closure in the back, you might have to size up if you are larger in the chest.

Review_Title: Runs big but cute buy on sale
Review: Loved this shirt but it runs pretty big. i'm normally a sm/med due to bust size (34ddd) and ordered a small based on other reviews. could have gotten an x-small. debating going to exchange. i ordered it in three colors bc it was on sale. better quality than some at retailer.

This clothe is to die for. it's exactly as pictured, beautiful quality and extremely flattering. all the lace and lining make it a slightly heavier clothe - i can imagine it getting really warm after a while in the summer sun. but it would completely be worth the bit of sweat to wear this gorgeous clothe.

I have been eyeing this top for a couple weeks and finally found it in my store. it was a good sign when i saw our stores in-house stylist wearing it! i completely love the fit--it's soft and stretchy and fabric is nice quality. i'm typically a medium, sometimes large--i bought the medium and it's excellent. i could have gone down to a small as well. the large was way too big (for reference i'm 5'8", athletic, 150lbs). this top is going to take me everywhere this summer! worth a try!
The sleeves are fitted which i love. works with a belt or without.

These beauties offer such sweet respite from low-rise skinny jeans -- hallelujah! completely love the high waist and elongated line. i'm 5' 7' and the 25 are a magnificent fit. very slimming, and already i've clotheed them down with an off-the-shoulder top and wedge espadrilles and clotheed them up with a silk blouse and heels. the design is very retro-fabulous, the quality top notch. love these and look forward to having them as a "forever" staple in my denim repertoire. i've been searching far and wid

Finally saw this clothe online. i have to say that it looks better in person. the model might be too tall for this clothe. i am 5'4''. it's right to my ankle. the color is in a nice off white. the material is a good quality. the overall cut is nice. it's a kind of classic feeling.you could wear it for a long time without going out of style.

I love the patterns and the colors! easy to clothe up or down.  i ordered a small and just ordered a can to compare them. the cut is magnificent as the sides still meet even though there's no closure. it's a good weight for this weather and winter! i live in sweater coats where i am and this is a magnificent addition.
it's a little itchy, that's the only flaw.

I love this clothe.   i believe the picture on-line doesn't show the unique pattern and design.   it does have an interesting design.    add a long vest, statement necklace, and boots - you will be quite fashionable.
Very cute everyday tee. usually run between an xs or small with retailer and was happy i chose the extra small. a magnificent updated on a classic strip tee.
Amazingly soft, thin and super warm! this a classy staple with an amazing swing fit and worth every penny!

I really wanted to love this shirt. the fit was magnificent, and the fabric just felt beautiful. luxurious, soft and flowing. but the collar was frayed... in addition, the little keyhole area fabric also had to be carefully handled to make it look smooth and not like bad workmanship. i put it aside to return it, then this morning went to have another look at it, wanting to talk myself back into it. but i can't overlook the fact i'd be ordering a new shirt that would look time-worn. it may be only this

I bought the silvery blue tunic. it is very light grey with a hint of blue. it is so shapely - coverage without being boxy or maternity-like. it covers your bum excellently and looks magnificent with a dark pair of skinny jeans. the color can really take you through autumn, winter and even spring depending on where you live. i love the sleeve length, too.

This clothe is so much better in person! i got the petite size (i am 5'2") and it seems to run a bit smaller than the regular size- i have a fairly large bust so i went up a size and it seems to fit excellently. love the colors and vintage design! i can't wait to wear it for a wedding i will be attending!
This clothe is beautiful. it is longer than it looks on the model (i'm 5/5) but drapes beautifully. it is excellent for a wedding or a special event. i love it!

I ordered this online expecting more of a heavier sweater. its really more like a t-shirt which is actually fine. its super comfortable and it's really cute. my only complaint is that it is pretty short. i'm 5'7" and i would love it if it were just an inch or two longer in the torso. other than that it's a magnificent shirt.

I received this tank today and i fell in love with it immediately! i am petite (5'3"/36b/108 lbs) and purchased this in the only size left, which was a small. yes....it is very billowy (but i do a half tuck into my trousers and that solves the problem excellently and looks magnificent!!) i have very well toned arms and the way this is cut just accentuatea this! yay!! the fabric is soft and the overall look is super feminine!!! so very happy with my purchase! plan on wearing with jeans shorts/cropped jeans/

I just got this top in the mail and love love love it! i thought it was on the pricey side for a shirt, but couldn't help but purchase it full price because i love anything pineapple print! the metallic print is cute and chic from day to night. i also love the open shoulders, making this design different and excellent for summer. i'm only sorry that i didn't see this top online until i already returned from my vacation in maui! very comfortable and easy, worth the price!
I love this shirt! i received many compliments on it when i wore it to work with a skirt.

Review_Title: Lovely but smells like last purchaser's deodorant.
Review: I am returning the clothe because it smells heavily of the last purchaser's deodorant and perfume. it was actually nauseating to put on. i am disappointed with retailer that i was sold this clothe, full price, in this condition. otherwise, the clothe is lovely. it is true to size. i am 5'5" 110 lbs and the size 0 was excellent.

I really loved the pattern on this shirt and the colors were nice too. something a little different than a plain white shirt. however, it was a little boxy on me and the material was kind of stiff (i am realizing that i am a sucker for soft material?). if this goes on sale, i may purchase it again, but i did end up returning the shirt.

I received this top today and though the color is not white as shown in the pic, it's a beautiful top. its more ivory as mentioned. the lace is like a lining(covering the entire body except the arms) underneath the ribbed fabric. like the other reviewer mentioned the lace is not itchy but soft and very pretty! i totally love it!!! this is my new preferred top in my wardrobe!!

I love the feel of the fabric and design of this clothe.  i look forward to changing the look with cowboy boots or fringed booties. i also like the option of wearing it opened over a white tee and jeans. worn loose or belted, it can be different every time you wear it. it does run large so you may want to size down.

I've been wanting to try on this clothe since it popped up online, we visited san francisco this weekend & i finally got my chance. it fit magnificent & was flattering! i am currently pregnant & it worked with my growing belly but will also look good when i do not have a belly. i would definitely recommend! <3

These trousers are magnificent, as is the case with most c of h jeans.  they are a excellent length if you are 5'5" or shorter (i.e. you don't need to cuff them several times).  i love the relaxed but chic look.  they run large so definitely size down at least one size.  so happy they were on sale!

Review_Title: One of the best fits for an retailer shirt
Review: I love retailer clothes, but i've often ordered shirts in an xs that i really needed an xs petite in because of the length and fit through the bust, but they didn't have any petites in the size i needed. i'm at 5'1", 114 pounds. i got this shirt in xs (not petite) and am thrilled with the fit. the material is formfitting enough to look like a petite, and it doesn't drop below my waist line. i'm thrilled with my purchase!

I love this clothe! i generally wear size 10 and the medium fits excellent. i'm a curvy lady and this clothe fits magnificent. i've received many compliments on it and might even get another pattern because i love it so much!

I purchased the 0p online and it was so incredibly short on me it wouldn't even serve as a tunic!! it was also so tight in the bust area that i could not pull it down because there is completely no give in the material. the berry color was not as bright as it had appeared online but in fact was a very muddled color that seemed to make the material look even more cheap. i would need to size up considerably to have good fit without give in the bust and arms and judging by the structure of the dres

As another reviewer mentioned the quality isn't here.  they pilled in the thighs after wearing once and stretched out so much at the end of the day i was pulling them up constantly.  such a bummer because i love this brand.

Review_Title: Agree with others; not for long torsos
Review:
Like others, i think this is just lovely on so many levels. however...
____________
pros:
- magnificent color, will match with many things.
- magnificent design at the sleeves and overall.
- the "v-neck" part isn't too low.
- fabric is pretty comfortable and breathable for the most part.
_____________
cons:
- it is boxy/wide. for my height and weight, the medium fit well, but i noticed it made my torso look shorter. plus, i'm a 36c (not huge, but to retailer's standards, i've had issues with things b

I adored this suit - the style, the colors, the thick quality of the fabric...but unfortunately the bottom seams cut into my groin and backside so much, it was practically painful! i'm 5'7', 128 lbs, and usually wear a size small, but was advised to size up. even with the medium i tried on, everything fit well but the length, though i've never thought i had a long torso. sizing up to a large would make the bust way to large for my small b chest. was so sad to return this suit!

I waited six weeks for this clothe to arrive and was so disappointed. loved the skirt part of it. but the top, which i guess i didn't see in photo was pleated as well, made my bust look huge and it puffed out on sides. would have been a wonderful summer clothe, flowing and cool.

Adorable... too chilly now to wear alone & too cute to cover it up! my navy parka or jean coat will prob be ok w/ it though. size 6 fits me excellently & looks pretty much on me as in the pic. love plaid & cotton blend tops anyways. ruffles - adorable, & i'm not too big on that but do love this look. when i first removed this top from the packaging it had an odd 'smoky'-like odor, but it's the dye i think. after hanging it for a few days the smell disappeared. i have in mind to wear w/ the pilcr

3 tags sewn in, 2 small (about 1'' long) and 1 huge (about 2'' x 3''). very itchy so i cut them out. then the thread left behind was plasticy and even more itchy! how can you make an intimates item with such itchy tags? not comfortable at all! also - i love bralettes and wear them all the time including to work. i am a b cup. however, this one is so thin and flimsy that it gives no support even to a b cup - so for me this would only be a lounging bralette - if it wasn't so itchy!

I just got this in the mail the other day. i was really excited and then crushed. one, buttons go all the way down and not what is in the photo. it takes it from hip whimsy to granny old lady sweater and then the minute i put it on it started pilling. it looked old and i wore it about 6 hours. i also used the roller lint remover on it and it pulled off one of the eyes on the snail. it is soft and felt comfy but look raggy and therefore it is going back. too bad but not what i bought and then not

I read the previous reviews, but decided to try it out since retailer was having 40% off sale items.
it looks very flattering on me, and magnificent fit for my body type.
i would recommend.

This coat is really beautiful, and pictures don't do it justice. it runs very large. i'm normally an xl or l in sweaters, but because of the balloony shape, i actually took a medium - even then it looks like i'm being enveloped, so i prefer to wear it unsnapped.

Just a heads up - this is a romper - trousers and not a clothe! you can't tell from the pictures. i ordered thinking it was a clothe but it's actually ... culottes? i'm not sure what you would call it. the pull on styling was awkward and the sash was bulky. it definitely goes back!

This top completely fell short for me. i was so excited for it to arrive yesterday and upon opening the package i knew immediately that it was not what i was expecting. in the images online there seam up the middle of the shirt isn't even noticeable but in person it is very prominent...and not in a good way. the peplum is a lot fuller then pictured as well. did not work well with my large bust (34d). returned.

I can't rate this with enough stars or numbers! magnificent fit, can't see up the sleeve, excellent length, just right amount of fabric for draping. i am 5'3" and 130lbs. fits like a dream and when i got it home from the store....it goes with all things in the closet!!! my one reservation is it only comes in one color. let's get on it designers! we need a lipstick red for summer and coral and navy and black and white. i don't need any other top! this one has magnificent cool fabric and you don't need to wear
Love this top...bought in 2 colors...white and the orange. fun change to regular t-shirts....sized down because its flowy.
I would buy these pajamas in every color if offered. they feel wonderful to the touch and even better on!

Review_Title: Gorgeous, vintage inspired and elegant clothe
Review: This is by far one of my preferred clothees i have tried on in a long time. i am a 2-4, the small was tts and so flattering. i think this would be better for someone taller with a lean frame, though its not super tight and the material has a magnificent weight to it, it isn't lined and could definitely show figure flaws. for me it skims my body elegantly and was very comfortable through the bust, waist and hip (34c/26/36). it fits me like the model in the image. the one down side is that it is pullover
Was scared at first to order this product, when i tried it on i was amazed on how good it looks. fits just like the model picture, and the material is awesome.

I stopped into retailer the other day for some "window" shopping and as soon as i saw this cardigan, it was love and i had to try it on. the sleeves run long on me but i'm on the shorter side so it was to be expected. everything else about this cardigan is amazing. i ran errands yesterday and it was the excellent weight for our cooler autumn weather. love this cardigan.
The shirt can be a little boxy, so make sure to order your size! the peplum is a magnificent length in the back.

This is my preferred weekend coat! it is so cute, soft and comfortable! the interior is an extra soft cotton that feels like my most preferred soft tee-shirt?? it is true to size. the best features are the versatility of the neck, pockets. and a little longer in the back - magnificent over leggings/yoga trousers. i ordered 2 sizes just in case the sizing was off - an xxs and xxs. i am a 2 petite and the xs is roomy enough for a sweater or sweatshirt under it. the xxs looked and felt magnificent too and had a m

This clothe is beautiful! runs a little bit large. i usually wear a small or medium. i took the petite small in this clothe. i am 5'3" and ordered in petite sizing and i am so glad that i did. the only complaint that i have is that there is no liner and although the clothe has some dark colors, it is very sheer, very see through.
This sweater was unflattering me, very boxy and did not fall on me like the model. soft fabric and looks nice off, however this one went back.

I loved the cut of these trousers and the button accent on the pockets. however, the material was quite thin and the quality was not magnificent- there were multiple snags along the seams. additionally, at 5'8, 130lbs i was swimming in the size 4. i would have tried sizing down if the quality was better.

I am a big fan of ag, i'm sure i have 15-20 pairs. i will say that i have rejected some of their offerings in the past because the fabric has been weird: denim that is so stretchy it doesn't look like real denim, fabric is so thin it shows every lump or bump etc.. so i'm always cautious, especially with their stretch twill. that aside, these particular jeans in this gray color are awesome. ag nailed it: magnificent color, supportive, slimming fabric, magnificent length and rise. a job well done ag! 

howe
I took this too to the register thinking it was marked down to same price as another tee by the same brand. it wasn't so i ended up paying way too much for a thin tee. will probably return.

The first thing i noticed upon receiving this clothe is how soft it is and the fact that it wasn't wrinkled coming out of the packaging bag- an excellent quality! my next surprise was to find that it is fully lined with a very nice soft knit and felt awesome on. i ordered a size small and it fit excellently- it was fitted through my waist and hips (37 chest, 28.5 waist, 37 hips) and dropped straight from my hips just like i like. i was afraid it would be too sheath like for my figure but it is perf

I had my reservations given that i'm petite (5'2", 108lbs) and it's midi style. i'm glad that i took a chance. i bought the red motif and it's beautiful. it's wrinkle-free right out of the package. the color is vibrant and the style is classic and effortless. fits true-to-size. magnificent for work with a black tee as shown in the picture.

It's navy and red--the photo looked black to me. so i couldn't use with black skirt that i had planned to pair it with, but it's cute with jeans and maybe white shorts next summer. the front gapes open when you sit down, so i'll either have to pin it or sew a snap there unless i want the world to see my bra. also a little short waited for me--i'm 5"11", so i wish the wrap hit a little lower, but not enough that i didn't keep it. it is flattering blouse. the shoulder ties add a little extra flair
This is cute with the shoulder detail. i ordered a medium- will be returning for a small. i'm kind of in between small & medium.

This clothe is as cute as represented in the picture. the adjustable ties on the sides allow your clothe to be form fitting or a looser, more casual look. the colors of the clothe and the beading are beautiful. the clothe looks magnificent paired with a pair of black ankle boots!

Review_Title: Much shorter than in photo - shoulders tight
Review: Fabric is not as rich as shown in photo. clothe much shorter than shown in photo. shoulder area is tight and really doesn't blend with the material below. this isn't going to work on very many people - pear shape...just not what i've come to expect from retailer.
I have several lilka pj bottoms and i'm glad to add these ones with the adorable bird print to my collection! tts, soft flannel, striking colors, only wish they had pockets!

Review_Title: Gorgeous blouse, stunning color and pattern
Review: This is a gorgeous high quality blouse. the color is stunning in person; i don't have anything like this color in my wardrobe. i'm an xl in retailer tops, and purchased this blouse in a 16. i am busty but the top still fit well. i have large upper arms but the sleeves fit fine; i wish they were a bit looser but that is my personal preference and probably doesn't apply to most people. if you're very thin and not busty you might be able to size down, but i'm honestly just not sure. i'm happy to say

I ordered these in my usual pilcro petite size 6. they were impossible to button, which is interesting 'cause i also ordered the pilcro wide leg chinos in the same size and they fit excellently, as usual. but it ended up being ok because i don't care for the speckled, slightly rough material or the contrasting piping. back they go!

Magnificent fit! for reference, i am 5'7", 160 lbs and bought a size medium. there is a piece of fabric that acts as a cami underneath to prevent any unwanted reveal with the lace up. soft fabric and falls beautifully!

I loved the multi stripe pattern, buttons, pockets and a-line shape .  i agree it runs small. i sized up from my normal size 4 to size 6.  it sits at my belly button which i like.  i can tuck in a thin shirt comfortably.  the pockets kind of sag/pooch forward and don't lie straight through the course of the day but not enough to really bother me.  i  straighten the skirt by pulling up.  magnificent buy on sale. i'm 5'2", 115#.

The cut and color of the clothe is awesome. however, the biggest flaw is the zipper. i only got to wear this clothe once until the zipper broke..sad day especially at the price. there also were a number of loose threads. i recommend waiting until it goes on sale. you'll want the extra money for a tailor to fix that zipper.

I love this shirt! it's such a beautiful striking color, yet still simple enough to not take the spotlight. the peekaboo shoulders are totally cute. i bought another one of these when it went on sale. so now i have two just in case;) haha

Review_Title: Very pretty, didn't like the pattern
Review: I wanted to like this top so badly because it has so many interesting pieces to the blouse. ultimately i didn't keep this because of the bell sleeves, and the pattern going across the body just wasn't flattering on my full figure. i went down a size to help reduce the amount of fabric draping in the back, but it didn't make up for the pattern that i just didn't like. if you are interested in this blouse, i recommend it because it might work out for someone with a different figure than mine

This tank runs very true to size. i ordered my usual size 8, which fits like a glove. couldn't go any smaller. very pretty fabric which is lined above the peplum. i personally like the higher peplum, but it's a personal choice. magnificent purchase!

As in previous reviews, this top can be worn in many ways. it could even be used as a pretty bathing suit cover-up. i like it with my cropped cotton spandex leggings which i have in many solid colors. i plan to wear it unbuttoned with my classic style spandex tanks i have in various colors & prints. the complete look says 'summer' & feels cool & comfy in this warm weather. even hubby loves the look! 5'3", 117#. i bought my usual size small.

This clothe is so beautiful on. purchased in black motif and it can definitely be clotheed up or down. material is lightweight (excellent for summer) and the clothe washed up beautifully in the washing machine. i always wear an xs in maeve and the clothe fits true to size.

Got the black but the orange it very pretty too the black fabric has a sheen to it; almost like snakeskin. as other reviewers have mentioned, it does run small and the armholes are cut in a bit. overall it is a more interesting than a simple lbd.

I received this today and totally bummed it's not cold enough where i live to where this yet. this style of sweater is what initially hooked me into retailer. it looks like one you'd have up in your closet for years. good quality, feels nice, and i love the detail on the sleeve. kind of wish they'd put a little detail on the back, maybe a peek a boo detail of a small flower or another ladybug but overall i'm very pleased.
Comfortable. flattering. i agree with other reviewers that this is magnificent piece. i purchased the red one and it is beautiful. fits tts.

This cape/poncho item is totally amazing. from the moment it whispered over my head as it slipped past my hair, i knew i had to have it. this piece is magical. it feels like you're wearing a blanket (the warmth factor), but the length is so excellent that it doesn't overwhelm you, nor does it make you look like a tank. the colors are amazingly saturated and the quality is so worth the price. the model is wearing it with light brown, but i tried it on over black leggings in the store and it works w
These trousers run large than the true size. it is so comfortable and can be clothe up or clotheed down.
Adorable & comfortable. i'm 5'3" and 115 lbs and ordered an xs. it hits at my knees & is loose fitting, but not tent like.

This beautiful, soft, swingy, clothe is oversized on me.  usually when someone reviews that a clothe runs large but their body type is opposite mine, i pick tts and 90% of the time i'm right.  not so in this case. the outer clothe is very wide and the amazing super stretchy under slip is too large also.  debating on sizing down because of potential shrinkage after laundering.  i bought m and my stats are 5'3" 140# 39/28/35.  clothe ends just above my knees.


agreeing with the previous reviews th

Just wanted to let readers know that the clothe doesn't flare out at the bottom like it shows on the model. for me, that's a good thing. it definitely sways and swishes, but doesn't flare out. you definitely have to wear a slip with it, not because it's see-through at all (it's not), but because of the static. 

also, this is the excellent clothe for belt-lovers.

I was excited to receive this top because i love the design, but was very disappointed when it arrived. i thought the embroidery would be striking but it's not. the material is a t-shirt knit which also added to the disappointment. it was not flattering at all.
Magnificent fit, comfortable and stylish. easy to clothe up or down, excellent item for any wardrobe.

I bought this online. this looked like a sweater that was accidentally shrunk in the dryer, when i received it.

i will be returning this.

I swooned over this clothe when it first came online. i had never worn a petite size before so i wasn't sure about the fit. i am curvy (34dd-27-42) and normally wear a size 8 clothe, but the 6p fit me like it was made for my body. i think this is because the clothe runs large, but i really really enjoyed the fit. the quality of the lace is evident immediately and the color is more of a cornflower blue, which i adore. the lace feels like a soft cotton, but has a lot of strength to it. cannot recomme
Magnificent clothe. fits excellently. will be excellent in the winter and with leggings.

Very light weight and soft fabric. i bought the blue but did not try green or grey. i love blue with my skin tone and am afraid green may make my skin look yellow. did not see the green in my store though. very comfy and flattering clothe. runs tts.
The first time i wore it, felt wonderful. had it cleaned and then the back end stated pilling. very disappointed with the price and quality. wish i could return for my money back. sad
Bought this in green at my local store and fell in love with it! i also tried one in pink and it was a bit sheer which is why i opted for the green color instead. very nice and feminine.

This is an amazingly soft and gorgeous sweater. i typically avoid this brand because most of their pieces run smaller on my frame however this not only fit excellent but it is a beautiful color as well! i prefer transitional pieces that can be worn multiple seasons and this one is just right.

The ruching on this suit is super flattering. i ordered the medium -- i am 5' 6", 150 lbs, and usually a solid "medium" in most retailer items -- though i would definitely recommend sizing up with this guy. i was able to get it on (and it certainly held everything in place), but since it is a one piece, pulling it on was a bit of a struggle and i certainly could have used about an inch more fabric from top to bottom. i will be returning and exchanging for a large.

I saw this in the store and purchased it right on the spot (didn't even see the reviews until now). i can wear either a small or x-small in retailer but for this top, the x-small was a better fit as it draped nicely and was still very loose on me (i'm 5'4, 125 lbs, 34b). i was worried that the opening was too wide but it was excellent. i like the elbow length sleeves and the fact that the blouse is lined which mean it's not sheer and don't have to wear a camisole. i usually stick with the classics i

I'm usually a 12, or size l in retailer and when i tried this on, buttoning it up from the bottom, i was so excited...until i reached the chest. it was way too tight in the bust and i am not that big in that area - it was painfully tight on my 38d chest. it's also unlined, which makes it not very useful for anything other than the warmest times of year. it's a shame because the skirt is swishy, and a good length - many trenches are too short, or not wide enough on the bottom for a fuller figure. i
Very cute print! love the mix of the colors on this sweater. looks magnificent with jeans!! throw it on over a tshirt and you are set.

Very happy i purchased this coat - although to me it is really a coat. it fits wonderfully and is so soft. i appreciate the uniqueness - not the usual dull winter shades of black/gray/navy. although i live in minneapolis much of the winter & it will not be warm enough once the temps drop beyond 20 degrees, it is excellent for the in-between 21- 50 degree days. i am a size 6 (5'5", 135 lbs). tried the small & medium. the s was a bit snug in the hips so chose the m and it is just right.
Like another reviewer said this was too baggy up top. the bottom length was good but arm holes were big and top was just too large. i'm 5'5" 110 lbs and got xs. returned.

Review_Title: Magnificent for nursing mother! (very low cut)
Review: Very soft material, probably will pill quickly but it is super comfortable. it is also very low cut; it works excellently for me for breastfeeding because each of the front panels can be easily pulled to the side. a cami underneath is required, the model definitely isn't wearing a bra. i'll be wearing a nursing tank under this. definitely a good print for summer.
Adorable! very pleased with the quality of the fabric and the very comfortable fit. i'm sure i'll wear this with jeans, as pictured, but can also see it with a breezy summer skirt.

This is a magnificent, easy-to-wear clothe with lovely beaded detailing all over the front bodice and ladder lace trim running the length of the sleeves. easily clotheed up or down. i usually wear petites but ordered the regular size based on previous reviews, and the slightly longer length was excellent for me (it hit just above the knees). there were a few beads that were coming a little loose, so i did have to secure those but it wasn't a big deal for me as i'm pretty comfortable with light mending, et

This is a beautiful and versatile skirt. i love the layered detail, length, and flattering cut. 

the fabric is a 80% cotton/20% linen blend. it's a thick weave with tiny nubs here and there. the skirt was made in turkey.
